original: The view of the sea is just as you remember it.
translation: Вид на море ровно такой же, как ты его помнишь.

original: It's probably the only thing that hasn't changed since you left Aurinax.
translation: Возможно, это единственное, что не изменилось с тех пор, как ты покинул Ауринакс.

original: Returning to this house has brought back several memories that you have…[p/] complicated feelings for.
translation: Возвращение к этому дому пробудило множество воспоминаний, к которым у тебя...[p/] сложные чувства.

original: These feelings are even more confounded by the blatant vandalism committed by Gavin and Wyatt.
translation: И эти чувства становились всё более давящими, когда ты наблюдаешь за погромом от Гэвина и Уайетта.

original: …Honestly,[p/] you'd rather leave this place as soon as possible.
translation: ...Серьёзно,[p/] поскорее бы покинуть это место.

original: Several weeds and plant life have grown since you were last here.
translation: Тут выросло множество растений с тех пор, как ты был тут в последний раз.

original: It doesn't look like anyone has taken care of the yard for the last few years.
translation: Не похоже, что кто-то заботился о саде за последние несколько лет.

original: ...But you suppose that's more your fault than anyone else's.
translation: ...Но ты понимаешь, что в этом больше твоей вины, нежели кого-то ещё.

original: Tyrion: What can you tell me about Justin Waye?
translation: Tyrion: Что ты можешь рассказать про Джастина Вейя?

original: Tyrion: According to a few witnesses we spoke to,[p/] you used to be friends.
translation: Tyrion: Согласно нескольким свидетелям,[p/] вы были друзьями.

original: Wyatt: "Friends" is kind of pushing it.[p/] We used to hang back in the day,[p/] but we don't no more. [mind="It was weird when he started talking to us again. I thought he left for good."/]
translation: Wyatt: "Друзья" взято с потолка.[p/] Мы часто зависали в прошлом,[p/] не более. [mind="Это был странно, когда он вновь заговорил с нами. Я думал, он ушел в поисках хорошей жизни."/]

original: Tyrion: ...But he started talking to you again.[p/] Why?
translation: Tyrion: ...Но он снова начал с вами общаться.[p/] Почему?

original: Wyatt: ...! [mind="They already know...?"]
translation: Wyatt: ...! [mind="Они уже знают...?"]

original: Wyatt: H-[p/]he just needed some of the old gear that he left at the house.
translation: Wyatt: Е-[p/]Ему было нужно забрать его старые примочки, которые он оставил тут.

original: Tyrion: ..."Old gear"?[p/] What kind of old gear?
translation: Tyrion: ..."Примочки"?[p/] Какие именно?

original: Wyatt: Y-[p/]You know.[p/] His thieves' tools.
translation: Wyatt: С-[p/]Сами знаете.[p/] Орудия вора.

original: Wyatt: All the tools you need for lockpicking and safe-cracking.
translation: Wyatt: Все инструменты для взлома замков и открытия сейфов.

original: Tools for lockpicking [i]and[/i] safe-cracking?![p/] Why would Justin need those?
translation: Инструменты для взлома [i]и[/i] открытия сейфов?[p/] Зачем Джастину это пригодилось?

original: Tyrion: What would Justin need lockpicking and safe-cracking tools for?
translation: Tyrion: Зачем Джастину понадобились все эти инструменты?

original: Wyatt: W-[p/]Well,[p/] he needed to get the gold that he owed your boss.
translation: Wyatt: Н-[p/]Ну,[p/] ему нужно было вернуть золото, взятое в долг у босса.

original: So, he owed gold to someone...
translation: Значит, он задолжал золото кому-то...

original: Wyatt: Word has it that he was working for the merchant that owns the refinery.
translation: Wyatt: Я слышал, что он работал на торговца, владеющий фабрикой.

original: Wyatt: I guess the owner trusted him a lot.[p/] Justin said that he had a way to get access to the safe in the guy's office.
translation: Wyatt: Полагаю, начальник ему сильно доверял.[p/] Джастин сказал, что у него был способ получить доступ к сейфу этого чела.

original: Wyatt: Justin was always a wiz when it came to breaking and entering.
translation: Wyatt: Джастин всегда был спецом, когда дело заходит о взломе и проникновении.

original: Wyatt: He even had tools that could crack magical locks.
translation: Wyatt: У него даже были штучки для взлома магических замков.

original: Wyatt: Getting the gold out of that safe would've been an easy score for him.
translation: Wyatt: Заполучить золото из сейфа было бы легче лёгкого для него.

original: Wait...[p/][s/] Justin was planning to [i]rob[/i] Dracogen?!
translation: Постойте...[p/][s/] Джастин хотел [i]ограбить[/i] Дракогена?!

original: Wyatt apparently thinks that you were sent on behalf of someone.
translation: Уайетт, очевидно, думает, что вас послали от чьего-то имени.

original: And from what he's said so far,[p/] Justin owed a non-trivial amount of gold to this person.
translation: И учитывая всё им сказанное,[p/] Джастин задолжал неприличную сумму золота этому человеку.

original: If this person was some kind of criminal,[p/] could [i]they[/i] have been the one who sabotaged the guard rail?
translation: Если этот человек - кто-то из преступников,[p/] мог ли [i]он[/i] быть тем, кто саботировал защитные перегородки?

original: Tyrion: Did Justin tell you [i]who[/i] he owed his debt to?
translation: Tyrion: Джастин сказал тебе, [i]кому[/i] он задолжал?

original: Wyatt: A-[p/]Ah![p/] Nah, man.[p/] H-[p/]He didn't say nothing. [mind="They might whack me too if I tell them the truth."/]
translation: Wyatt: А-[p/]Ах![p/] Не, чувак.[p/] О-[p/]Он ничего не сказал. [mind="Похоже, они проверяют меня. Если проболтаюсь - прибьют."/]

original: So, he [i]does[/i] know.
translation: Значит, он [i]знает[/i].

original: Tyrion: There's no point in playing dumb.[p/] Just tell us what he told you.
translation: Tyrion: Незачем играть дурака.[p/] Просто отвечай.

original: Tyrion: Did he give you a name?
translation: Tyrion: Он назвал тебе имя?

original: Wyatt: U-[p/][s/]Uh...!
translation: Wyatt: У-[p/]Ух...!

original: Celeste: Answer the question.
translation: Celeste: Отвечай на вопрос.

original: Wyatt: T-[p/][s/]The Eyetaker![p/][s/] He owed gold to the Eyetaker!
translation: Wyatt: Г-[p/][s/]Глазохват![p/][s/] Он задолжал Глазохвату!

original: "The Eyetaker"...?[p/] That must be some kind of criminal nickname...
translation: "Глазохват"...?[p/] Должно быть, это некое прозвище...

original: Why does that sound so familiar, though?
translation: Но почему это звучит так знакомо?

original: ...Either way,[p/] you need to find out who this "Eyetaker" is.
translation: ...Ладно,[p/] тебе нужно узнать, кто этот "Глазохват".

original: It might be best to ask someone else.
translation: Лучше расспросить кого-то другого.

original: Wyatt: ...
translation: Wyatt: ...

original: Wyatt: Hey, man...[p/] Do I know you?
translation: Wyatt: Хей, чувак...[p/] Я тебя знаю?

original: Wyatt: You look kind of familiar.
translation: Wyatt: Ты выглядишь знакомым.

original: Tyrion: No...[p/] You must be mistaken.
translation: Tyrion: Нет...[p/] Ты точно ошибся.

original: Wyatt: Huh...[p/] Alright.
translation: Wyatt: Хах...[p/] Ладно.

original: You'd rather keep the past buried,[p/] especially from someone like him.
translation: Тебе спокойнее держать прошлое похороненным,[p/] тем более от него.

original: Wyatt: Man,[p/] I guess there're all kinds of people in this city.
translation: Wyatt: Чувак,[p/] в этом городе живёт множество разных людей.

original: Wyatt: I never knew someone like [i]her[/i] was involved with them.
translation: Wyatt: Никогда бы не подумал, что кто-то, вроде [i]неё[/i], свяжется с ним.

original: Celeste: ...What was that?
translation: Celeste: ...Что ты там сказал?

original: Wyatt: N-[p/][s/]Nothing, ma'am!
translation: Wyatt: Н-[p/][s/]Ничего, мадам!

original: Wyatt: Hmph...[p/] Justin was always too big for his britches.
translation: Wyatt: Хмпф...[p/] Джастин всегда думал о себе выше крыши.

original: Wyatt: He gets some cushy job at the refinery,[p/] and suddenly he's too good to hang with us.
translation: Wyatt: Заполучил непыльную работёнку на фабрике[p/] и, внезапно, начал снова с нами зависать.

original: Wyatt: Well, look where that got him.
translation: Wyatt: Ну, вот, к чему это его привело.

original: Wyatt: One word from the Eyetaker,[p/] and he comes crawling back to the life.
translation: Wyatt: Одно слово Глазохвата и он вернулся к жизни.

original: Tyrion: How do you feel about the Dracogen Trading Company?
translation: Tyrion: Что ты думаешь о Торговой Компании Дракогена?

original: Wyatt: Hmph...[p/] They're just another group of rich dudes.
translation: Wyatt: Хмф...[p/] Очередные богатенькие ребята.

original: Wyatt: Sure,[p/] they talk about making the city better for us commonfolk.
translation: Wyatt: Разумеется,[p/] они много говорят о том, что делают город лучше для простолюдин.

original: Wyatt: But I'm sure they're no better than von Sanctus.
translation: Wyatt: Но я уверен, что они не лучше вон Санктусов.

original: It would be best to ask someone else about The Eyetaker.
translation: Лучше расспросить кого-то ещё про Глазохвата.

original: If you overplay your hand,[p/] Wyatt might realize that you don't actually work for them.
translation: Если надеяться на авось,[p/] Уайетт догадается, что ты не работаешь на него.

original: Tyrion: What can you tell me about [i]this[/i]?
translation: Tyrion: Что ты можешь рассказать об [i]этом[/i]?

original: Wyatt: S-[p/]Sorry, man...[p/] I don't know nothing about that.
translation: Wyatt: И-[p/]Извини, чувак...[p/] Я ничего не знаю.

original: He appears to be telling the truth.
translation: Похоже, он говорит правду.

original: You arrive at the old abandoned house.
translation: Ты пришел к заброшенному дому.

original: Upon looking at the home that you left behind,[p/] you're struck with a flood of memories.
translation: Смотря на дом, который ты оставил позади,[p/] тебя накрывает волна воспоминаний.

original: Those memories were once happy.[p/] But now,[p/] they only fill you with grief.
translation: Когда-то это всё было радостным.[p/] Но теперь,[p/] они сулят лишь горечь.

original: Celeste: T-[p/]Tyrion?[p/] Are you okay?
translation: Celeste: Т-[p/]Тирион?[p/] Ты в порядке?

original: Tyrion: ...Yeah.[p/] Let's look around.
translation: Tyrion: ...Ага.[p/] Давай осмотримся.

original: You wipe your eyes and begin looking around the house.
translation: Ты протираешь глаза и осматриваешь дом.

original: Suddenly,[p/] you hear the sound of glass breaking.
translation: Внезапно,[p/] ты слышишь биение стекла.

original: You rush to look for the source and see two young teenagers throwing rocks at the side of the house.
translation: Ты побежал в сторону звука и видишь двух подростков, кидающих камни в сторону дома.

original: The shattered remains of a window are lying on the ground.
translation: Разбитые осколки окна валяются на земле.

original: Wyatt: Hah![p/][s/] Nice shot, Gavin![p/]
translation: Wyatt: Хах![p/][s/] Отличный бросок, Гэвин![p/]

original: Gavin: ...
translation: Gavin: ...

original: One of the teens,[p/] apparently named Gavin,[p/] notices you approaching.
translation: Один из юнцов,[p/] окликнутый Гэвином,[p/] заметил твоё присутствие.

original: Gavin: ...We've got company, Wyatt.
translation: Gavin: ...У нас компания, Уайетт.

original: Wyatt: Huh?
translation: Wyatt: Хах?

original: You stare blankly at the broken glass lying on the ground.
translation: Ты безучастно смотришь на разбитое стекло на земле.

original: You're at a loss for words.[p/] You feel like you [i]should[/i] respond.[p/] But nothing comes out of your mouth.
translation: Ты потерял дар речи.[p/] Ты чувствуешь, что [i]должен[/i] ответить.[p/] Но ты молчишь.

original: You suddenly find yourself quickly approaching the two teens.
translation: Внезапно, ты начинаешь быстро идти в сторону двух юнцов.

original: Gavin: Eh...?[p/] What the hell do you want?
translation: Gavin: Э...?[p/] Че тебе надо?

original: Gavin: Agh![p/][s/] What the hell?!
translation: Gavin: Агх![p/][s/] Какого черта?!

original: Before you even realized what you were doing,[p/] you threw a punch straight into Gavin's face.
translation: Не успев даже осознать свои действия,[p/] ты бросил суровый взгляд в глаза Гэвина.

original: Your eyes are slowly tearing up.[p/] You can only see red.
translation: Из твоих глаз медленно текут слезы.[p/] Всё краснеет.

original: You grab Gavin by the collar and pull his face close to yours.
translation: Ты схватил Гэвина за воротник и поднёс его к своему лицу.

original: Tyrion: Get.[p/][p/][p/] The [i]hell[/i].[p/][p/][p/] Away from my house.
translation: Tyrion: Пошли.[p/][p/][p/] К [i]черту[/i].[p/][p/][p/] Из моего дома.

original: Celeste: T-[p/][s/]Tyrion?!
translation: Celeste: Т-[p/][s/]Тирион?!

original: Gavin: Oh?![p/][s/] You want to go?!
translation: Gavin: Ох?![p/][s/] Хочешь, чтобы мы ушли?!

original: Wyatt: Ha![p/] If you came looking for trouble,[p/] you sure found it.
translation: Wyatt: Ха![p/] Если ты искал неприятностей,[p/] ты их нашел.

original: Celeste: U-[p/]Um...[p/] Okay.[p/] Let's [i]all[/i] calm down and just-.
translation: Celeste: Э-[p/]Эм...[p/] Так.[p/] Давайте вы [i]все[/i] успокоитесь и-.

original: Gavin: Stay out of this, you little shit!
translation: Gavin: Не мешайся, ты, жалкая мелюзга!

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ...

original: Celeste: ...Excuse me?
translation: Celeste: ...Простите?

original: Gavin: What?![p/][s/] You got cotton in your ears or something?!
translation: Gavin: Чего?![p/][s/] У тебя пробки в ушах или че?!

original: Celeste: Yes, actually.
translation: Celeste: Да, так и есть.

original: Celeste: Why don't you go and repeat what you said?
translation: Celeste: Почему бы тебе не подойти и не повторить, что ты сказал?

original: Gavin: I [i]said[i/], "stay out of this"!
translation: Gavin: Я [i]сказал[/i] "не мешайся"!

original: Gavin: You[p/][p/][p/][p/][s/] [i]little[/i][p/][p/][p/][p/][s/] shi
translation: Gavin: Ты[p/][p/][p/][p/][s/] [i]жалкая[/i][p/][p/][p/][p/][s/] мелю

original: Tyrion: ...Celeste?
translation: Tyrion: ...Селест?

original: Celeste: Yes?
translation: Celeste: Да?

original: Tyrion: ...I'm sorry for losing my temper back there.
translation: Tyrion: ...Извини, что потерял самого себя.

original: Tyrion: I...[p/] didn't mean to drag you into this.
translation: Tyrion: Я...[p/]  не хотел тебя впутывать в это.

original: Celeste: It's okay.[p/] Our emotions get the better of us sometimes.
translation: Celeste: Всё в порядке.[p/] Иногда, наши эмоции берут над нами верх.

original: Tyrion: Celeste?
translation: Tyrion: Селест?

original: Celeste: Yes?
translation: Celeste: Да?

original: Tyrion: I think you [i]might[/i] have overdone it a bit.
translation: Tyrion: Мне кажется, ты [i]немного[/i] перестаралась.

original: Celeste: Nah.
translation: Celeste: Не.

original: Tyrion: Celeste?
translation: Tyrion: Селест?

original: Celeste: Yes?
translation: Celeste: Да?

original: Tyrion: I don't think he's breathing.
translation: Tyrion: Похоже, он не дышит.

original: Celeste: Come on.[p/] Just give him a second.
translation: Celeste: Да ладно.[p/] Дай ему секунду.

original: You suddenly hear the very bruised and broken form of Gavin sputtering and wheezing on the ground.
translation: Внезапно ты слышишь, как сильно избитый и изломанный Гэвин плюётся и хрипит на земле.

original: It looks like he's finally regained consciousness.
translation: Похоже, он наконец-то очнулся.

original: Celeste: See?[p/] He's perfectly fine.
translation: Celeste: Видишь?[p/] Он в полном порядке.

original: Gavin: AGggGGgGggGGggGGGgGgGGGGGh...
translation: Gavin: АГГгххгГХххххГХХххххГГГГХХх...

original: Celeste: You're [p/][s/][i]fine[/i].
translation: Celeste: Ты[p/][s/] в [i]норме[/i].

original: Wyatt: ...
translation: Wyatt: ...

original: Wyatt is staring wide-eyed at Celeste.
translation: Уайеет выпучил глаза в сторону Селест.

original: From the shaking of his legs,[p/] it looks like he wants to run away.[p/] But he's too frozen by fear to move.
translation: Учитывая его трясущиеся ноги,[p/] он хотел бы сбежать.[p/] Но он застыл в страхе.

original: Celeste: Don't bother running.[p/] Even with a head start,[p/] I can easily catch up to you.
translation: Celeste: Даже не пробуй бежать.[p/] Даже с быстрым стартом,[p/] я тебя поймаю.

original: Wyatt: ...Eep!
translation: Wyatt: ...Иип!

original: Celeste: Anyways,[p/] these two are probably Justin's former "delinquent friends", right?
translation: Celeste: Так или иначе,[p/] это двоя, вероятно, "друзья-беззаконники" Джастина, да?

original: Celeste: ...Are you okay with talking to them?
translation: Celeste: ...Ты сможешь с ними поговорить?

original: Tyrion: ...Y-[p/]Yes.[p/] O-[p/]Of course.
translation: Tyrion: Д-[p/]Да.[p/] К-[p/]Конечно.

original: With your emotions in such disarray,[p/] you completely forgot why you came here in the first place.
translation: С таким беспорядком эмоций,[p/] ты почти забыл о том, зачем вы вообще сюда пришли.

original: Tyrion: ...Would you two happen to know the young man who died at the refinery yesterday?
translation: Tyrion: ...Вы двоя, случайно, не знаете молодого парня, который вчера умер на фабрике?

original: Wyatt: ...! [mind="These guys are after Justin?! But he's already dead!"/]
translation: Wyatt: ...! [mind="Эти ребята пришли за Джастином?! Он он уже мёртв!"/]

original: "After Justin"?[p/] Was there someone with a grudge against him?
translation: "За Джастином"?[p/] Неужели кто-то строил козни против него?

original: Wyatt clearly thinks that you were sent on someone's behalf.
translation: Уайетт явно думает, что тебя послали за ним.

original: It wouldn't hurt to play the part to get more information out of him.
translation: Может, получиться получить больше информации, если подыграть этому.

original: Tyrion: We're not going to hurt you.
translation: Tyrion: Мы не навредим вам.

original: Celeste: Uh...
translation: Celeste: Ух...

original: Tyrion: ...We're not going to hurt you [i]anymore[/i].
translation: Tyrion: ...Мы [i]больше[/i] не навредим вам.

original: Tyrion: We'd just like to ask you a few questions about Justin.
translation: Tyrion: Мы просто хотим задать несколько вопросов о Джастине.

original: Wyatt: Y-[p/]Yeah![p/][s/] S[p/][s/]-sure, man![p/][s/] Whatever you want!
translation: Wyatt: Д-[p/]Да![p/][s/] К-[p/][s/]конечно, чувак![p/][s/] Всё, что хочешь!

original: Celeste: Alright,[p/] you two talk.
translation: Celeste: Хорошо,[p/] вы пока говорите.

original: Celeste: I'll work on popping Gavin's shoulder back into place.
translation: Celeste: Я пока попытаюсь вправить плечо Гэвина.

original: …It's a little disturbing how nonchalantly she says things like that.
translation: ...Немного настораживает, с какой беззаботностью она это говорит.

original: Another nightmare overtakes your sleep.
translation: Очередной кошмар пришел в твой сон.

original: You clutch the note tightly in your hands as you read it.
translation: Ты крепко сжимаешь записку в своих руках, читая её.

original: "I'm sorry, Tyrion..."
translation: "Мне жаль, Тирион..."

original: "There were so many things that I wanted to tell you.[p/] So many things that I wanted to show you."
translation: "Есть ещё множество вещей, о которых я хотела тебе рассказать.[p/] Так много вещей, которые я хотела тебе показать."

original: "But I'm afraid that I can't do that now..."
translation: "Но, боюсь, я не смогу этого сделать теперь..."

original: "I need you to be strong now."
translation: "Тебе нужно быть сильным."

original: "This world is bleak,[p/] merciless,[p/] and unforgiving."
translation: "Это мир суров,[p/] беспощаден[p/] и непростителен."

original: "But I've seen you.[p/] I know how bright the light within you is."
translation: "Но я знаю тебя.[p/] И я знаю, насколько ярок свет внутри тебя."

original: "Use my eyes.[p/] Peer beyond the Divine Gate as I once did."
translation: "Используй мои глаза.[p/] Пройди через Древние Врата, как однажды это сделала я."

original: "Use it to reclaim the future."
translation: "Используй их и исправь будущее."

original: Tyrion: Her "eyes"...?[p/] I...[p/][s/] I don't understand!
translation: Tyrion: Её "глаза"...?[p/ Я...][p/][s/] Я не понимаю!

original: ...It doesn't matter.[p/] All you have to do is stop the execution.
translation: ...Уже не важно.[p/] Всё, ч то тебе нужно сделать - остановить казнь.

original: If you can just distract the knights long enough,[p/] you can save her and run away.
translation: Если получиться отвлечь рыцарей,[p/] ты сможешь спасти её и сбежать.

original: You'll have to abandon your home...[p/] But at least she'll still be with you.
translation: Придётся покинуть дом...[p/] Но, по крайней мере, она всё ещё будет с тобой.

original: As you try to sprint towards the gallows,[p/] a knight grabs your arm and pulls you back.
translation: Как только ты подбежал к эшафоту,[p/] рыцарь схватил тебя за руку и начал тянуть назад.

original: Knight: Hey, kid.[p/] You can't cross this point.
translation: Knight: Хей, пацан.[p/] Тебе сюда нельзя.

original: Knight: H-[p/]Hey![p/][s/] Stop that!
translation: Knight: Х-[p/]Хей![p/][s/] Прекрати!

original: You fruitlessly try to break his grip by striking him with your bare hands.
translation: Ты отчаянно пытаешься вырвать из его хватки, отбиваясь голыми руками.

original: But he barely feels anything through his armor.
translation: Но он не ощущаешь этого через свою броню.

original: You continue delivering blow after blow to him,[p/] but it does nothing.
translation: Ты продолжаешь наносить удар за ударом,[p/] но это не помогает.

original: Your knuckles start to bleed.
translation: Твои кулаки истекают кровью.

original: Irritated by your behavior,[p/] the knight pins you to the ground.
translation: Устав от твоего поведения,[p/] рыцарь бросает тебя на землю.

original: Knight: Damn kid...
translation: Knight: Чёртов ребёнок...

original: You desperately struggle against him to no avail.
translation: Ты отчаянно борешься с ним, но всё тщетно.

original: And from this position,[p/] you have no choice but to watch what's happening.
translation: И с этого места,[p/] у тебя нет выбора, кроме как наблюдать за происходящим.

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]Wait![p/][s/] Stop!
translation: Tyrion: О-[p/][s/]Остановитесь![p/][s/] Хватит!

original: You make eye contact with your mother one last time.
translation: Ты в последний раз обменялся взглядами со своей матерью.

original: Her body goes limp.[p/] You stare blankly at the hanging body.
translation: Её тело обмякло.[p/] Ты смотришь на повешенное тело.

original: Tyrion: N-[p/]No...[p/] This isn't-...
translation: Tyrion: Н-[p/]Нет...[p/] Только не-...

original: Tyrion: M-[p/]Mom...?
translation: Tyrion: М-[p/]Мама...?

original: You clutch her note tightly in your hand.
translation: Ты сильнее сжимаешь записку в своей руке.

original: You feel a comforting yet fleeting warmth from it.
translation: Ты чувствуешь тело, что всё ещё исходит от неё.

original: Tyrion: ...Mom!
translation: Tyrion: ...Мам!

original: Celeste: T-[p/][s/]Tyrion?!
translation: Celeste: Т-[p/][s/]Тирион?!

original: Tyrion: C-[p/]Celeste...?[p/] I...
translation: Tyrion: С-[p/][s/]Селест...?[p/] Я...

original: You snap back awake.[p/] It was another nightmare...
translation: Ты резко просыпаешься.[p/] Это был очередной кошмар...

original: You notice that tears are streaming down your face.
translation: Ты заметил, как слёзы текут по твоему лицу.

original: You quickly try to bring up your sleeve to wipe them away.
translation: Ты быстро пытаешься протереть их своим рукавом.

original: ...But you realize that Celeste is firmly gripping your hand.
translation: ...Пока ты не замечаешь, что Селест крепко держит тебя за руку.

original: Tyrion: W-[p/]Wha-...?[p/] Why are you-?
translation: Tyrion: Ч-[p/]Чт-...?[p/] Почему ты-?

original: Celeste: A-[p/][s/]Ah![p/] S-[p/][s/]Sorry!
translation: Celeste: А-[p/][s/]Ах![p/] И-[p/][s/]Извини!

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ...

original: Celeste: Um...[p/] You were...[p/] shouting in your sleep.
translation: Celeste: Мм...[p/] Ты...[p/] кричал во сне.

original: Celeste: But you seemed to calm down a little whenever I held your hand.
translation: Celeste: Но ты выглядел немного спокойнее, когда я держала тебя за руку.

original: Celeste: So...[p/] I've been...[p/] doing that.
translation: Celeste: Так что...[p/] Я...[p/] так и сделала.

original: Tyrion: Oh...
translation: Tyrion: Ох...

original: Celeste: ...Tyrion, are you okay?
translation: Celeste: ...Тирион, ты в порядке?

original: You're not.
translation: Ты не в порядке.

original: Celeste: You've been acting weird since we arrived in Aurinax.
translation: Celeste: Ты всё время вёл себя странно с тех пор, как мы приехали в Ауринакс.

original: Tyrion: ...It's nothing.
translation: Tyrion: ...Ничего такого.

original: Celeste: It's [i]not[/i] nothing!
translation: Celeste: Это [i]не[/i] "ничего такого"!

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ...

original: Celeste: ...Does it have something to do with your mother?
translation: Celeste: ...Это как-то касается твоей матери?

original: Celeste: For the past two nights,[p/] you've been calling out for her in your sleep.
translation: Celeste: За последние две ночи,[p/] ты постоянно звал её во сне.

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ...

original: Celeste: Please.[p/] Just talk to me.
translation: Celeste: Прошу.[p/] Поговори со мной.

original: Celeste: ...I'm your friend,[p/] aren't I?
translation: Celeste: ...Я же твой друг,[p/] верно?

original: ...You never even realized it.
translation: ...Ты никогда не думал об этом.

original: You didn't have many people in your life after you left Aurinax.
translation: У тебя не было много знакомых в твоей жизни с тех пор, как ты покинул Ауринакс.

original: You only had Ms. Tymora.[p/] And she never wanted to talk about what happened...
translation: У тебя была только Мисс Тимора.[p/] И она никогда не хотела говорить о случившемся...

original: But Celeste,[p/] she's been there since you started your career.
translation: Но ещё есть Селест,[p/] которая была с тобой с начала твоей карьеры.

original: Of course she's your friend.
translation: Разуметься, она твой друг.

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ...

original: Tyrion: ...It all happened a long time ago.
translation: Tyrion: ...Это всё случилось очень давно.

original: Tyrion: We lived here together in that old house.
translation: Tyrion: Мы жили в месте в том старом доме.

original: Tyrion: My mother was a merchant...[p/] and a mage.
translation: Tyrion: Моя мать была торговцем...[p/] и магом.

original: Celeste: Your mother was a mage?
translation: Celeste: Твоя мать была магом?

original: Tyrion: But I guess the gift of magic skipped my generation...[p/] [i]I[/i] could never use it.
translation: Tyrion: Я полагаю, дар магии пропустил моё черёд...[p/] [i]Я[/i] не могу ею пользоваться.

original: Tyrion: ...About ten years ago,[p/] my mother's business partner was found murdered.
translation: Tyrion: ...Около десяти лет назад,[p/] товарищ по работе моей матери был найден убитым.

original: Tyrion: And they found traces of magic at the crime scene...
translation: Tyrion: И они нашли следы магии на месте убийства...

original: Celeste: They thought that your mom did it...
translation: Celeste: Они решили, что это сделала твоя мама...

original: Tyrion: Ms. Tymora was my mother's defense attorney for the trial.
translation: Tyrion: Мисс Тимора была её адвокатом на суде.

original: Tyrion: She did everything she could to get her acquitted.
translation: Tyrion: Она делал всё, что могла, чтобы оправдать её.

original: Tyrion: ...But she could never find the real culprit.
translation: Tyrion: ...Но она так и не нашла настоящего убийцу.

original: Tyrion: They found her guilty of first-degree murder.
translation: Tyrion: Они признали её виновной в убийстве первой степени.

original: Tyrion: I tried to stop her execution...[p/] But...
translation: Tyrion: Я пытался остановить казнь...[p/] Но...

original: Your voice starts breaking.
translation: Твой голос начал срываться.

original: Celeste: Tyrion...
translation: Celeste: Тирион...

original: Tyrion: ...I'm sorry, Celeste.
translation: Tyrion: ...Прости меня, Селест.

original: Celeste: ...What?
translation: Celeste: ...Что?

original: Tyrion: Coming back here has brought back so many memories.
translation: Tyrion: Возвращение сюда пробудило так много воспоминаний.

original: Tyrion: I thought...[p/] that I'd already moved on from what happened.
translation: Tyrion: Я думал...[p/] что я уже смог пройти через случившееся.

original: Tyrion: If I could just keep saving people as an attorney,[p/] then maybe I could put all of this behind me.
translation: Tyrion: Если бы я мог продолжать спасать людей, как адвокат,[p/] может тогда я смог бы отпустить всё это.

original: Tyrion: But I'm back in Aurinax...[p/] And those feelings are still so fresh in my mind.
translation: Tyrion: Но я вернулся в Ауринакс...[p/] И эти чувства так свежи в моей голове.

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ...

original: Tyrion: It's like I'm still the same powerless child from ten years ago.
translation: Tyrion: Словно всё тот же беспомощный ребёнок десять лет назад.

original: Tyrion: I know that I've been taking that out on you.
translation: Tyrion: Я знаю, что вымещал всё это на тебе.

original: Tyrion: I'm really sorry...
translation: Tyrion: Прошу, прости меня...

original: Celeste: Don't be...[p/] I get it.
translation: Celeste: Не нужно...[p/] Я понимаю.

original: Celeste: I know what it's like to lose someone like that.
translation: Celeste: Я знаю, каково чувство потери такого человека.

original: She does, doesn't she?
translation: Она точно знает.

original: Celeste: When my dad was murdered,[p/] you were there for me.
translation: Celeste: Когда мой папа был убит,[p/] ты был со мной.

original: Celeste: If it weren't for you,[p/] I would’ve still believed that he died hating me.
translation: Celeste: Если бы не ты,[p/] я бы всё ещё верила, что он умер, ненавидя меня.

original: Tyrion: Celeste, I-
translation: Tyrion: Селест, я-

original: Celeste slowly clasps your hand within hers again.
translation: Селест снова медленно сжимает твою руку.

original: It feels warm and comforting.
translation: Так тепло и приятно.

original: Has this been the warmth you've been feeling for the last few nights?
translation: Было ли это тепло тем чувство, которого ты ощущал за эти ночи?

original: Celeste: So,[p/] just let me be here for you.
translation: Celeste: Так что,[p/] позволь мне побыть с тобой.

original: You can feel yourself dozing off.[p/] You have to snap yourself back awake.
translation: Ты чувствуешь себя сонным.[p/] Ты пытаешься не заснуть.

original: Tyrion: S-[p/]Sorry.[p/] The last few days have been a little tiring.
translation: Tyrion: И-[p/]Извини.[p/] Последние несколько дней меня измотали.

original: Celeste: It's okay.[p/] Just focus on falling asleep.
translation: Celeste: Всё хорошо.[p/] Просто попытайся заснуть.

original: Celeste: I'll stay with you for as long as you need me to.
translation: Celeste: Я останусь с тобой до тех пор, пока я нужна тебе.

original: Celeste: *yawn*
translation: Celeste: *звает*

original: Celeste: ...I'm also feeling pretty tired, though.
translation: Celeste: ...Хотя я тоже чувствую усталость.

original: Celeste: I'll just rest my eyes a bit...
translation: Celeste: Я просто прикрою глаза...

original: For the first time since you arrived in Aurinax,[p/] you finally receive a good night's rest.
translation: С твоего первого прибытия в Ауринакс,[p/] ты наконец-то смог хорошо поспать.

original: You wake up the next morning feeling well-rested.
translation: Ты проснулся следующим утром хорошо отдохнувшим.

original: You feel almost a little [i]too[/i] rested.
translation: Возможно, даже [i]слишком[/i] хорошо.

original: You feel really reluctant to leave the comfort of your bed.
translation: Тебе точно не хочется покидать столь уютную постель.

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ...

original: Tyrion: Celeste?[p/] Are you there?
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特？[p/]你在吗？

original: Your hand feels warm.
translation: 你的手感到一阵温暖。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: You can feel your heart stop.
translation: 你感到自己的心跳停止了。

original: Tyrion: ...C-[p/]Celeste?
translation: Tyrion: ……塞、[p/]塞莱斯特？

original: Celeste: Ugggggggh...[p/] What do you want?
translation: Celeste: 呃呃呃呃呃……[p/]你想干嘛？

original: Her eyes slowly open as she wakes from her equally restful sleep.
translation: 她的眼睛慢慢睁开，从同样安稳的睡眠中醒来。

original: She drowsily scans her surroundings.
translation: 她带着困意环视周围。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: ...!
translation: Celeste: ……！

original: You both dart out of the bed.
translation: 你们俩都从床上冲了出去。

original: Celeste: U-[p/][s/]Um...[p/][s/] So...
translation: Celeste: 呃、[p/][s/]唔……[p/][s/]那么……

original: Celeste: You...[p/][s/] seem to be doing better.
translation: Celeste: 你……[p/][s/]看起来好多了。

original: Celeste: Y-[p/][s/]You're okay, right?
translation: Celeste: 你、[p/][s/]你还好吗？

original: Tyrion: Y-Yeah...[p/][s/] Thank you for last...[p/][s/] night.
translation: Tyrion: 是、是的……[p/][s/]昨晚……[p/][s/]谢谢你了。

original: Poor phrasing.
translation: 措辞不太对。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Aster: Hello?[p/][s/] Are you there, Mr. Cuthbert?!
translation: Aster: 哈喽？[p/][s/]你在吗，卡斯伯特先生？！

original: Celeste: AGH![p/][s/] What the [i]hell[/i]?!
translation: Celeste: 啊！[p/][s/]什么<u>鬼</u>？！

original: Your soul nearly jumps out of your body.
translation: 你的心脏都要从嗓子眼里跳出来了。

original: You suddenly hear Aster's voice.[p/] And it's extremely loud.
translation: 你突然听到了阿斯特的声音。[p/]而且还非常大声。

original: You look around to see where he is,[p/] but he's nowhere to be found.
translation: 你四处寻找他在哪，[p/]但他已经不见了。

original: Tyrion: A-[p/]Aster...?
translation: Tyrion: 阿、[p/]阿斯特……？

original: Aster: Ah...[p/] Thank the Scaled Lord.[p/] I've finally gotten through to you two.
translation: Aster: 啊……[p/]感谢鳞甲领主。[p/]我终于联系上你们俩了。

original: Celeste: What?![p/][s/] Where are you?!
translation: Celeste: 什么？！[p/][s/]你在哪儿？！

original: Aster: I'm using a spell to speak with you right now.
translation: Aster: 我正在用法术跟你说话。

original: Aster: I apologize for contacting you in this manner.[p/] But I was worried that something had happened to you two.
translation: Aster: 很抱歉用这种方式联系你们，[p/]但我害怕你们俩出事了。

original: Tyrion: R-[p/]Right,[p/] of course.
translation: Tyrion: 是、[p/]是的，[p/]当然。

original: Tyrion: Anyways...[p/] What do you want at this time of day?
translation: Tyrion: 总之……[p/]这个时间点你想要什么？

original: Aster: This "time of day"?
translation: Aster: 这个“时间点”？

original: Aster: Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] It's 3:00 PM in the afternoon.
translation: Aster: 卡斯伯特先生，[p/]已经是下午三点了。

original: Celeste: What?!
translation: Celeste: 什么？！

original: : 3:00 PM?![p/][s/] You missed the entire morning!
translation: :下午三点？！[p/][s/]你睡过了整个上午！

original: Aster: I hope everything's okay…[p/] Did something happen?
translation: Aster: 我希望一切都没事……[p/]发生了什么吗？

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: N-[p/]No, everything's okay.
translation: Tyrion: 没、[p/]没有，什么事都没有。

original: Tyrion: A-[p/]Anyways,[p/] if it's already this late,[p/] we should head over to the refinery.
translation: Tyrion: 无、[p/]无论如何，[p/]既然都这么晚了，[p/]我们应该前往精炼厂了。

original: Celeste: Yes![p/][s/] The investigation!
translation: Celeste: 是的！[p/][s/]调查！

original: Celeste: Let's do that![p/][s/] Immediately!
translation: Celeste: 让我们开始吧！[p/][s/]就现在！

original: Celeste immediately power walks out of the room.
translation: 塞莱斯特立刻冲出了房间。

original: You quickly follow after her.
translation: 你也赶紧跟在她后面。

original: Aster: If you're heading to the refinery,[p/] do you mind if I meet with you two?
translation: Aster: 如果你们现在前往精炼厂的话，[p/]你介意我跟你俩见个面吗？

original: Aster: There's...[p/] something that I'd like to ask you.
translation: Aster: 有些……[p/]事情我想问你一下。

original: Tyrion: S-[p/]Sure...
translation: Tyrion: 好、[p/]好的……

original: Aster: Wonderful![p/][s/] I'll see you at the town square!
translation: Aster: 好极了！[p/][s/]我在广场那里等着！

original: You quickly meet Aster in the town square while you walk to the refinery.
translation: 去精炼厂的途中，你们和阿斯特在广场迅速见了一面。

original: You and Celeste walk to your destination with purpose...[p/] a little [i]too[/i] much purpose.
translation: 你和塞莱斯特步行时都心有所想……[p/]想得有点<u>太多</u>了。

original: It's almost as if you're both trying to distract yourselves from something.
translation: 就好像你们俩都在试图分散注意力，不去想某件事。

original: Every time you make eye contact with Celeste,[p/] she quickly glances away.
translation: 每次你和塞莱斯特发生眼神接触，[p/]她都马上把视线移开。

original: Things are a little awkward.[p/] But you much prefer this over the tense mood between you two yesterday.
translation: 你们俩之间有点尴尬。[p/]但比起昨天的紧张气氛还是好得多。

original: Tyrion: A-[p/]Anyways Aster,[p/] what was that spell you used earlier?
translation: Tyrion: 总、[p/]总之，阿斯特，[p/]你稍早用的法术是什么？

original: Tyrion: It let you speak with us without being there.
translation: Tyrion: 你不用在现场也能跟我们说话。

original: Aster: Oh, that?[p/] That was a [b]conjuration[/b] spell.[p/] It's called "[b]Send Message[/b]".
translation: Aster: 哦那个？[p/]那是一种[b]召唤术[/b]。[p/]它叫“[b]通信术[/b]”。

original: Tyrion: ...I just feel a little bit uneasy that you can just contact us out of the blue like that...
translation: Tyrion: ……你可以这样突然联系我们有点让人不安……

original: More importantly,[p/] you're a little worried about what he might have [i]seen[/i].
translation: 更重要的是，[p/]你有点担心他可能<u>看见了</u>什么。

original: Aster: D-[p/]Don't worry.[p/] The spell is perfectly harmless.
translation: Aster: 别、[p/]别担心。[p/]这个法术是完全无害的。

original: Aster: I can give you the parameters if you'd like.
translation: Aster: 你想要的话我可以把参数给你。

original: Hm...[p/] It looks like it only facilitates communication.
translation: 嗯……[p/]看来这个法术只有辅助语音通话的功能。

original: He definitely didn't see the embarrassing state that you two were in.
translation: 他绝对没有看见你和她之前的尴尬情况。

original: Celeste: By the way...[p/] I'm not trying to be rude...[p/] But...
translation: Celeste: 还有……[p/]我并不是想冒犯……[p/]但是……

original: Celeste: Why are you following us?
translation: Celeste: 你为什么要跟着我们？

original: Aster: O-[p/]Oh,[p/] yes.
translation: Aster: 哦、[p/]哦，[p/]是的。

original: Aster: I was still trying to think of the proper method to ask you...
translation: Aster: 我还在想怎么问你们比较好……

original: Aster: B-[p/]But,[p/] you both seem to be on edge at the moment...
translation: Aster: 但、[p/]但是，[p/]你们俩现在看起来都很紧张……

original: Tyrion: What did you want to ask us?
translation: Tyrion: 你想要问我们什么？

original: Aster: You already told me about the traces of [b]transmutation[/b] at the refinery.
translation: Aster: 你们已经跟我说过精炼厂里有[b]形变术[/b]的痕迹了。

original: Aster: But the trial yesterday really highlighted the significance of that.
translation: Aster: 昨天的审理更是充分强调了它的重要性。

original: Aster: I can't simply stand by if I was a witness to a murder...
translation: Aster: 既然我是谋杀案的目击者，就不能坐视不管……

original: Tyrion: And...?
translation: Tyrion: 然后……？

original: Aster: ...May I join you on your investigation?!
translation: Aster: ……我可以加入你们的调查吗？！

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: You're questioning his motives...[p/] for a [i]variety[/i] of reasons...
translation: 你思考着他的动机……[p/]原因有<u>很多</u>……

original: He was the only other mage that was at the scene of the crime...
translation: 他是犯罪现场唯一的另一位法师……

original: And between him and Rika,[p/] you definitely trust Rika more.
translation: 在他和里卡之间，[p/]你当然更相信里卡。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Alright,[p/] I see no reason why not.
translation: Tyrion: 行，[p/]我觉得可以。

original: Celeste shoots you a concerned look.[p/] You subtly gesture for her to keep an eye on Aster.
translation: 塞莱斯特对你投来担心的目光。[p/]你示意她注意着点阿斯特。

original: She nods in acknowledgment.
translation: 她点点头同意了。

original: Aster is your prime suspect right now.[p/] And he [i]has[/i] to be aware of that.
translation: 阿斯特是你现在的首要嫌疑人。[p/]他<u>肯定</u>也清楚这一点。

original: But if you keep him close to you,[p/] you might catch some dissonant thoughts through the Eye.
translation: 如果能把他留在自己身边，你可能会透过荷鲁斯之眼捕捉到一些不和谐的想法。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Well…[p/] It's been nice catching up with you, Rika.
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……[p/]很高兴和你见面，里卡。

original: Tyrion: ...But, I think it's time for us to get going.
translation: Tyrion: ……但是，我想我们得走了。

original: Celeste: What?![p/][s/] But we just got here!
translation: Celeste: 什么？！[p/][s/]我们俩才刚到！

original: Mosourika: ...
translation: Mosourika: ……

original: Mosourika: It's okay.[p/] I'm sure you're pretty busy nowadays.
translation: Mosourika: 没关系。[p/]我想你们俩最近一定很忙。

original: Mosourika: I won't keep you any longer.
translation: Mosourika: 我不会要求你们留下的。

original: Mosourika: But be sure to write, okay?
translation: Mosourika: 但是记得写信，好吗？

original: Mosourika: Don't just go and disappear like last time.
translation: Mosourika: 不要再像上一次那样消失了。

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] I'll stay in touch.
translation: Tyrion: 好的……[p/]我会保持联系的。

original: Mosourika: You'd better.
translation: Mosourika: 你最好是。

original: You exit the café and make your way to the local merchant's guild to rent a carriage.
translation: 你们从咖啡馆离开，前往当地的商人工会租马车。

original: The city streets seem a bit more crowded than usual.[p/] It's a little difficult to make your way through them.
translation: 街道比平时还要拥挤一些。[p/]在人群中很难穿行。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: Hey...[p/] Tyrion?
translation: Celeste: 嘿……[p/]提利昂？

original: Tyrion: ...Yeah?
translation: Tyrion: ……怎么了？

original: Celeste: Um...
translation: Celeste: 呃……

original: Celeste is fidgeting with her hands.
translation: 塞莱斯特正在摆弄她的手。

original: She looks like she wants to say something.[p/] But every time she starts to speak,[p/] she quickly stops herself.
translation: 她想要说些什么。[p/]但每次要开口的时候，[p/]她又马上停下了。

original: This happens a few more times before she seems to give up.
translation: 她又试了几次，最后还是放弃了。

original: Celeste: ...Never mind,[p/] it's nothing.
translation: Celeste: ……算了，[p/]没什么。

original: Tyrion: ...Okay?
translation: Tyrion: ……好吧？

original: You both continue to walk silently as you make your way to the merchant's guild.
translation: 你们继续沉默地走在前往商人工会的路上。

original: As you make your way there,[p/] the streets become more and more crowded.
translation: 随着你们离目的地越来越近，[p/]街道也变得愈发拥挤。

original: You hope the traffic won't interfere with the ride home.
translation: 你希望交通状况不会影响到回家的旅途。

original: Celeste: Hi,[p/] could we rent a carriage for travel to Ratholme?
translation: Celeste: 你好，[p/]我们能租一辆到瑞思霍姆的马车吗？

original: Merchant: Sorry,[p/] but travel outside of the city is temporarily closed.
translation: Merchant: 抱歉，[p/]出城旅行已经暂时关闭了。

original: Tyrion: What?[p/] Why?
translation: Tyrion: 什么？[p/]为什么？

original: Merchant: Haven't you heard?[p/] The knights of the Kingsguard have locked down the city.
translation: Merchant: 你没有听说吗？[p/]国王卫队的骑士们已经封锁了全城。

original: Merchant: They set up a blockade and everything.
translation: Merchant: 他们已经把屏障之类都搭起来了。

original: Merchant: Check the city gates if you don't believe me.
translation: Merchant: 不信我的话就去城门看看吧。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: As you arrive at the city gates,[p/] you see the blockade that the merchant was talking about.
translation: 你们到城门后，[p/]就看见了商人刚刚所说的屏障。

original: A crowd of disgruntled townsfolk are angrily shouting at the knights stationed there.
translation: 一群不满的市民正在愤怒地朝那些驻扎的骑士大喊大叫。

original: Nobleman: This is outrageous!
translation: Nobleman: 太离谱了！

original: Noblewoman: How long do you plan on keeping us here?!
translation: Noblewoman: 你们打算把我们关在这儿多久？！

original: Knight: Sorry,[p/] but we have our orders.
translation: Knight: 不好意思，[p/]但我们必须遵守命令。

original: Knight: We can't let [i]anyone[/i] outside of the city until our investigation is complete.
translation: Knight: 调查结束前我们不能让<u>任何人</u>出城。

original: There's an "investigation"?[p/] Did something happen?
translation: “调查”？[p/]发生什么事了吗？

original: Tyrion: Can you at least tell us what's going on?[p/] Why is the entire city being blockaded?
translation: Tyrion: 你至少能告诉我们发生了什么事吧？[p/]为什么整座城都被封锁了？

original: Knight: Sorry, sir.[p/] We're not allowed to release that information.
translation: Knight: 抱歉，先生。[p/]我们也不能泄露相关信息。

original: Knight: You'll just have to make other arrangements while we sort this out.
translation: Knight: 在我们调查清楚前，你得另做打算了。

original: Knight: ...Actually,[p/] I haven't seen you two around before.
translation: Knight: ……实际上，[p/]我之前没在这儿见过你俩。

original: Knight: I'll need to take down your names and occupations for our records.
translation: Knight: 我需要记录下你们的姓名和职业。

original: Celeste: What?[p/][s/] Why?!
translation: Celeste: 什么？[p/][s/]为什么？！

original: Tyrion: It's fine, Celeste...[p/] We're better off just cooperating with them.
translation: Tyrion: 没关系的，塞莱斯特……[p/]我们最好还是听他们的话。

original: It's an invasion of privacy...[p/] But you'd rather not resist orders from the Kingsguard.
translation: 这是侵犯隐私权……[p/]但你不想违抗来自国王卫队的命令。

original: Tyrion: I'm Tyrion Cuthbert.[p/] I'm a defense attorney.
translation: Tyrion: 我是提利昂·卡斯伯特，[p/]一名辩护律师。

original: Celeste: Ugh...[p/] fine.
translation: Celeste: 呃啊……[p/]好吧。

original: Celeste: I'm Celeste McCoy:[p/] bodyguard.
translation: Celeste: 我是塞莱斯特·麦考伊：[p/]贴身护卫。

original: Knight: Thanks...
translation: Knight: 谢谢……

original: You look over to the other Kingsguard.[p/] They seem to be taking notes of the people here too.
translation: 你看向其他的国王卫队成员。[p/]他们似乎也在记录这里的其他人。

original: They must be making a list of everyone inside the city.
translation: 他们一定是在制作记录了城市中所有人的名单。

original: ...But for what reason?
translation: ……但是为什么呢？

original: Nobleman: I have an important engagement tomorrow!
translation: Nobleman: 我明天有个重要的约会！

original: Nobleman: What am I supposed to do now?!
translation: Nobleman: 我现在该怎么办啊？！

original: Noblewoman: This can't possibly be legal!
translation: Noblewoman: 这绝对是违法的！

original: The townsfolk continue shouting at the knights.
translation: 市民们继续对骑士大喊大叫。

original: But it's clear they won't be budging any time soon.
translation: 但是很明显，他们一时半会儿是不会挪开了。

original: Celeste: Ugh...[p/] What do we do now?
translation: Celeste: 呃……[p/]我们现在怎么办？

original: You notice that it's starting to get late.
translation: 你注意到天色渐晚。

original: Tyrion: We don't know how long the city will be blockaded.
translation: Tyrion: 我们不知道城市还要被封多久。

original: Tyrion: ...We should find a place to stay overnight, just in case.
translation: Tyrion: ……以防万一，我们得找个过夜的地方。

original: You walk into a nearby tavern and see it absolutely crowded with patrons.
translation: 你们走入一个临近的旅店，里面已塞满了顾客。

original: Celeste: Looks like everyone else had the same idea.
translation: Celeste: 看来每个人都是这么想的。

original: Merchant: Hey,[p/] welcome to the Aegwyn Tavern.
translation: Merchant: 嘿，[p/]欢迎来到艾格文酒馆。

original: Merchant: What can I do for you?
translation: Merchant: 我能为您做些什么？

original: Tyrion: Could we get two rooms for the night?
translation: Tyrion: 我们能要两间过夜的房吗？

original: Merchant: ...Sorry,[p/] I can't even spare [i]one[/i] room.
translation: Merchant: ……抱歉，[p/]我们<u>一间</u>房也没有了。

original: Merchant: We're completely full with the blockade and all.
translation: Merchant: 因为封城，我们这里已经住满了。

original: Celeste: Wait...[p/] Let me take care of this.
translation: Celeste: 等等……[p/]让我来搞定。

original: Celeste takes out a large pouch of gold and plops it on the innkeeper's desk.
translation: 塞莱斯特拿出一大袋黄金，“咚”的一声放在客栈老板的桌上。

original: Merchant: ...
translation: Merchant: ……

original: Merchant: Well, would you look at that!
translation: Merchant: 哎呀，看看那是什么！

original: Merchant: One of our rooms just opened up!
translation: Merchant: 一个房间突然空出来了！

original: Tyrion: Only one?
translation: Tyrion: 就一个？

original: Merchant: Hey,[p/] the entire city's locked down.
translation: Merchant: 嘿，[p/]整个城市都被封锁了。

original: Merchant: Even [i]with[/i] your gold,[p/] that's the best I can do for you.
translation: Merchant: 就算<u>有</u>这么多黄金，[p/]我也最多给你一间房。

original: Celeste: What?[p/] Embarrassed to share a room with me, Tyrion?
translation: Celeste: 什么？[p/]跟我共享一个房间就害羞了，提利昂？

original: Tyrion: N-[p/][s/]No![p/][s/] It's just-!
translation: Tyrion: 没、[p/][s/]没有！[p/][s/]只是——！

original: You realize that she's just teasing you like she usually does.[p/] Best not to give it any mind.
translation: 你意识到她只是像往常一样逗你玩。[p/]还是别往心里去好了。

original: Tyrion: ...Well,[p/] it's better than nothing.
translation: Tyrion: ……嗯，[p/]总比什么都没有好。

original: Tyrion: S-[p/]So...[p/] How should we-?
translation: Tyrion: 那、[p/]那么……[p/]我们怎么——？

original: Celeste: Oh.[p/] I was just kidding before.
translation: Celeste: 噢，[p/]我就是开个玩笑。

original: Celeste: You can have the bed.[p/] I'll just sleep on the floor.
translation: Celeste: 你可以睡床，[p/]我睡地上就行。

original: Tyrion: W-What?![p/][s/] I can't just let you-!
translation: Tyrion: 什、什么？！[p/][s/]我不能让你——！

original: Celeste: Please,[p/] we may both be commoners,[p/] but [i]you[/i] live a cushy life in the city.
translation: Celeste: 拜托，[p/]我们可能都是普通人，[p/]但是<u>你</u>在城市中过着安逸的生活。

original: Celeste: I'm a mercenary.[p/] I've lived on the road for years.
translation: Celeste: 我是雇佣兵。[p/]我已在路上生活了多年了。

original: Celeste: I sleep like this all the time.
translation: Celeste: 我一直都是这么睡的。

original: ...She's got you there.
translation: ……她说的有道理。

original: Tyrion: Alright...[p/] But tell me if you change your mind.
translation: Tyrion: 好吧……[p/]但如果你改变主意了，记得告诉我。

original: Celeste: Yeah, yeah...
translation: Celeste: 好的，好的……

original: Justin: H-[p/][s/]Hey![p/] I didn't see you there...
translation: Justin: 嘿、[p/][s/]嘿！[p/]我没看到你在那儿……

original: Justin: I was just...[p/] Uh...
translation: Justin: 我只是……[p/]呃……

original: Lloyd: Just walk past him.
translation: Lloyd: 从他身边走过去。

original: Justin: W-[p/]What...?
translation: Justin: 什、[p/]什么……？

original: Justin: H-[p/][s/]Hey![p/][s/] Watch it![p/][s/] Quit shoving me!
translation: Justin: 嘿、[p/][s/]嘿！[p/][s/]小心！[p/][s/]不要再推我了！

original: Justin: Wait![p/][s/] Whoa!
translation: Justin: 等等！[p/][s/]哇啊！

original: Justin: H-[p/][s/]Holy crap![p/][s/] Pull me up!
translation: Justin: 我的、[p/][s/]我的妈呀！[p/][s/]快把我拉上去！

original: Justin: I can't hold on for much longer!
translation: Justin: 我要坚持不住了！

original: Lloyd: Agh![p/] You idiot![p/][s/] What are you doing?!
translation: Lloyd: 啊！[p/]你个蠢蛋！[p/][s/]你在干什么？！

original: Justin: W-what...?
translation: Justin: 什、什么……？

original: Lloyd: Grab his arm and pull him up!
translation: Lloyd: 抓住他的手把他拉起来！

original: Justin: AGGGGGH![p/][s/] My hand!
translation: Justin: <size=1.5em>啊啊啊！</size> [p/][s/]我的手！

original: Justin: What the hell are you doing?!
translation: Justin: 你到底在搞什么鬼？！

original: Lloyd: Your grip is too tight![p/] Stop that!
translation: Lloyd: 你抓得太紧了！[p/]停！

original: Justin: AGGGGGGGGGH!
translation: Justin: <size=1.5em>啊啊啊啊啊！</size>

original: Lloyd: W-[p/]Wait![p/] I can still-!
translation: Lloyd: 等、[p/]等等！[p/]我还能——！

original: Lloyd: No...
translation: Lloyd: 不……

original: Lloyd: No, no, NO!
translation: Lloyd: 不，不， <size=1.5em>不！</size>

original: Lloyd: What happened?![p/] I should have been able to-
translation: Lloyd: 发生了什么？！[p/]我本应该能——

original: Lloyd: By the Scaled Lord...[p/] He fell in...
translation: Lloyd: 鳞甲领主在上……[p/]他跌下……

original: Lloyd: I...
translation: Lloyd: 我……

original: Lloyd: No...[p/] I can [i]use[/i] this.
translation: Lloyd: 不……[p/]我能<u>利用</u>这个。

original: Lloyd: That's right![p/] I can still make this look like it was all [i]his[/i] fault!
translation: Lloyd: 对的！[p/]我还能让这一切看起来都是<u>他的</u>错！

original: You find yourself falling into a nightmare.
translation: 你发现自己正落入噩梦之中。

original: Ruby: Tyrion...[p/] I'm so sorry.
translation: Ruby: 提利昂……[p/]我很抱歉。

original: Ruby: I can't believe they made you watch...
translation: Ruby: 我不敢相信他们让你看了……

original: Ruby: Are you okay?
translation: Ruby: 你还好吗？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Ruby: Right...[p/] Of course, not.
translation: Ruby: 是……[p/]当然不好。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: ...Are you going to keep fighting them?
translation: Tyrion: ……你还要继续反抗他们吗？

original: Your voice is quiet.[p/] Your question barely comes out as a whisper.
translation: 你的声音很轻，[p/]仅如耳语一样。

original: Ruby: What?
translation: Ruby: 什么？

original: Tyrion: Are you going to keep fighting the nobility?
translation: Tyrion: 你还要继续反抗贵族吗？

original: Ruby: I...
translation: Ruby: 我……

original: Ruby: I don't know if I can anymore.
translation: Ruby: 我不知道是否还能继续下去。

original: Ruby: Today they showed me what they're truly capable of...
translation: Ruby: 今天，他们给我展示了真正的能力……

original: Ruby: I was naïve.[p/] I thought that the truth would prevail,[p/] but…
translation: Ruby: 我太天真了。[p/]我以为真相会胜出，[p/]但是……

original: Ruby: I'm only one person.[p/] I can't do this alone anymore...
translation: Ruby: 我只是一个人。[p/]我不能再这么孤军奋战了……

original: Tyrion: ...So you're just going to give up?!
translation: Tyrion: ……所以你要放弃吗？！

original: Tyrion: You're the [i]only[/i] one who will fight against them!
translation: Tyrion: 你是<u>唯一一个</u>反抗他们的人！

original: Tyrion: If you're just going to give up, then...
translation: Tyrion: 如果你要放弃的话，那么……

original: Tyrion: Was my mother's death truly pointless?!
translation: Tyrion: 难道我母亲的死是毫无意义的吗？！

original: Ruby: I-[p/]I'm sorry.
translation: Ruby: 我、[p/]我很抱歉。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Teach me how to be like you.
translation: Tyrion: 教我怎么成为和你一样的人吧。

original: Ruby: ...What?
translation: Ruby: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: You said that you can't do this alone anymore, right?
translation: Tyrion: 你说你不能再孤军奋战了，对吧？

original: Tyrion: So…[p/] teach me how to be a defense attorney!
translation: Tyrion: 那就……[p/]教教我怎么成为一名辩护律师！

original: Tyrion: I can [i]help[/i] you![p/][s/] We can fight them together!
translation: Tyrion: 我可以<u>帮</u>你！[p/][s/]我们俩可以一起反抗贵族！

original: Ruby: Tyrion…[p/] You're just a child.[p/] I can't just-
translation: Ruby: 提利昂……[p/]你还只是一个孩子。[p/]我不能就这么——

original: Tyrion: Ms. Tymora, please!
translation: Tyrion: 泰摩拉女士，求求你了！

original: Tyrion: I...[p/] don't have anything left...
translation: Tyrion: 我……[p/]已经什么都没有了……

original: Tyrion: Please just take me away from here...
translation: Tyrion: 请带我走吧……

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: You clutch your hand tightly,[p/] feeling the fading warmth of the final message that your mother left for you.
translation: 你握紧手，[p/]感受着母亲最后留下的信息里渐渐远去的温暖。

original: It's the last comforting memory you'll have of her.
translation: 这是你关于她最后的回忆。

original: ...It's a memory that you'll never experience again.
translation: ……也是你再也不愿经历的回忆。

original: Tyrion: Mom...
translation: Tyrion: 母亲……

original: You're startled awake.
translation: 你惊醒过来。

original: After some confusion,[p/] you realize that it was all a dream.
translation: 一阵困惑过后，[p/]你意识到这一切只是一场梦。

original: You didn't have any trouble falling asleep,[p/] but your slumber was less than restful.
translation: 你入睡时没有任何困难，[p/]但你的睡眠并不安稳。

original: It's been a while since you've remembered that day.
translation: 你已经有一段时间没有记起那一天了。

original: ...That's all the more reason to leave this city as soon as possible.
translation: ……又给尽快离开这座城市添加了理由。

original: Tyrion: Celeste,[p/] are you up?
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特？[p/]你起来了吗？

original: Celeste: H-[p/][s/]Huh?!
translation: Celeste: 嗯、[p/][s/]嗯？！

original: Celeste was wistfully staring out of the window,[p/] watching the rain.
translation: 塞莱斯特正伤感地望着窗外，[p/]看雨落下。

original: Her head whips towards you when she realizes that you're awake.
translation: 她注意到你醒来了，把头转过来。

original: Tyrion: ...Are you okay?[p/] What's wrong?
translation: Tyrion: ……你还好吗？[p/]怎么了？

original: Celeste: N-[p/]Nothing.[p/] It's nothing. [mind="He wasn't awake... was he?"/]
translation: Celeste: 没、[p/]没有。[p/]什么也没有。[mind="他刚刚没有醒来，对吧？"/]

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: She doesn't seem keen on sharing.[p/] It'd be best not to pry.
translation: 她并不打算说。[p/]最好还是不要打听了。

original: Tyrion: ...Anyways,[p/] do you know if the city is still under lockdown?
translation: Tyrion: ……总之，[p/]你知道封城是否还在继续吗？

original: Celeste: I-[p/]I haven't checked yet.[p/] I was waiting for you to wake up.
translation: Celeste: 我、[p/]我还没有去查看。[p/]我一直在等你起来。

original: You go outside and check the city gates.
translation: 你们出去查看城门的情况。

original: The blockade still hasn't disappeared.[p/] In fact,[p/] it looks like it's been fortified with even more knights.
translation: 封城的屏障还没有消失。[p/]实际上，[p/]看上去反而有更多的骑士加入封锁线。

original: Celeste: …Looks like we can't leave yet.
translation: Celeste: ……看来我们还不能离开。

original: Tyrion: They've even doubled down on the guards…[p/] What's going on here?
translation: Tyrion: 他们甚至加倍投入警卫……[p/]发生了什么？

original: Mosourika: T-[p/][s/]Tyrion!
translation: Mosourika: 提、[p/][s/]提利昂！

original: You spot Rika in the distance as she calls out to you.
translation: 你注意到远处的里卡正在呼唤你。

original: As soon as she sees you,[p/] she breaks out into a full sprint towards you.
translation: 她一见到你，[p/]就全速向你冲来。

original: She looks exhausted.[p/] Has she been looking for you in the rain?
translation: 她看起来精疲力尽了。[p/]她一直在雨中找你吗？

original: Mosourika: Tyrion![p/][s/] It's terrible!
translation: Mosourika: 提利昂！[p/][s/]大事不好了！

original: Mosourika: T-[p/][s/]There was an accident at the Arcane Refinery last night!
translation: Mosourika: 昨、[p/][s/]昨晚奥术精炼厂发生了一起事故！

original: Mosourika: One of my friends who worked there...[p/] He fell into a vat of chemicals.
translation: Mosourika: 我的一个朋友在那儿工作……[p/]他掉进了装满化学品的桶里。

original: Mosourika: He's...[p/] dead.
translation: Mosourika: 他……[p/]死了。

original: Tyrion: Oh, Rika...[p/] I'm so sorry.
translation: Tyrion: 噢，里卡……[p/]我很遗憾。

original: Tyrion: If there's anything I can do-
translation: Tyrion: 有什么我能帮忙的吗——

original: Mosourika: Lord von Sanctus is blaming the Dracogen Trading Company!
translation: Mosourika: 冯·桑克图斯勋爵把这一切都归咎于德拉科根贸易公司！

original: Mosourika: He's trying to charge the owner with criminal negligence!
translation: Mosourika: 他试图指控公司的所有者犯有刑事过失罪！

original: Hm…[p/] As the lord of this region,[p/] von Sanctus [i]would[/i] have a lot of leverage in a legal battle like this.
translation: 嗯……[p/]作为这个地区的勋爵，[p/]冯·桑克图斯<u>应该</u>在这样的官司上有很大影响力。

original: He must be using this accident as an opportunity to oust Dracogen from his territory.
translation: 他一定会抓住这个机会，把德拉科根从他的领土上赶出去。

original: Mosourika: Tyrion...[p/] You're a lawyer, aren't you?
translation: Mosourika: 提利昂……[p/]你是个律师，对吧？

original: Mosourika: Can you help them?
translation: Mosourika: 你能帮帮他们吗？

original: Tyrion: I...[p/] don't think I can.
translation: Tyrion: 我……[p/]不觉得我可以。

original: Mosourika: W-[p/][s/]What?![p/] B-[p/]But-
translation: Mosourika: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！[p/]但、[p/]但是——

original: Tyrion: Rika,[p/] I specialize in homicide cases.[p/] And most of my clients are mages who've been charged with murder.
translation: Tyrion: 里卡，[p/]我专精凶杀案。[p/]我绝大部分客户都是被控谋杀罪的法师。

original: Tyrion: I've never even [i]tried[/i] a case like this before.
translation: Tyrion: 我从来没有<u>试过</u>这样的案子。

original: Tyrion: There isn't any magic involved.[p/] And there's no killer.
translation: Tyrion: 这里不涉及魔法，[p/]也没有凶手。

original: Mosourika: ...
translation: Mosourika: ……

original: Tyrion: Don't worry.[p/] I'm sure that the Dracogen Trading Company knows plenty of qualified attorneys who can help.
translation: Tyrion: 别担心。[p/]我敢肯定德拉科根贸易公司认识很多有能力的律师。

original: Celeste: I'm not so sure about that.
translation: Celeste: 我可不这么肯定。

original: Celeste: Think about it.
translation: Celeste: 思考一下。

original: Celeste: A lord from one of the four Pillar Families is pressing those charges.
translation: Celeste: 提出指控的是一位来自四大支柱家族的勋爵。

original: Celeste: Do you honestly think anyone else will try to fight them on this?
translation: Celeste: 你真认为有其他人会愿意站出来？

original: ...She has a point.[p/] There aren't many attorneys who will go against the nobility under [i]any[/i] circumstances.
translation: ……她说的有道理。[p/]几乎没有律师愿意与贵族们作对，在<u>任何</u>情况下都是如此。

original: The only ones who will do that are you and Ms. Tymora.
translation: 唯一愿意这么做的只有你和泰摩拉女士。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Alright...[p/] I'll see what I can do.
translation: Tyrion: 好吧……[p/]我会尽力。

original: Mosourika: Really?!
translation: Mosourika: 真的吗？！

original: Tyrion: But please don't get your hopes up.
translation: Tyrion: 但是别抱什么希望。

original: Tyrion: I have very little information to work with right now.
translation: Tyrion: 我现在只有很少的情报。

original: Tyrion: And to be perfectly honest,[p/] I'm really out of my element.
translation: Tyrion: 而且老实说，[p/]这完全不是我的领域。

original: Mosourika: That's okay.[p/] I'm sure that Mr. Dracogen will take any help he can get.
translation: Mosourika: 没关系，[p/]我敢肯定德拉科根先生会接受他能得到的任何帮助。

original: Tyrion: Mr. Dracogen?
translation: Tyrion: 德拉科根先生？

original: Mosourika: He's the owner of the Dracogen Trading Company.
translation: Mosourika: 他是德拉科根贸易公司的老板。

original: Mosourika: He should be at the old Arcane Refinery right now.
translation: Mosourika: 他现在应该在那个旧奥术精炼厂。

original: That must be the scene of the accident too.
translation: 那里肯定是事故现场了。

original: It would probably be best to start your investigation there.
translation: 最好从那里开始调查。

original: Mosourika: I've been away from the shop for too long.[p/] So I can't come with you.
translation: Mosourika: 我已经离店太久了，[p/]没办法陪你去。

original: Mosourika: But drop by the café if there's anything I can do to help.
translation: Mosourika: 不过如果有什么我能帮到忙的地方，请随时来店里找我。

original: Tyrion: It's some kind of tarot card.
translation: Tyrion: 这是某种塔罗牌。

original: Mosourika: A customer must have accidentally left it here.
translation: Mosourika: 应该是某个顾客不经意留在这的。

original: Tyrion: "The Magician..."
translation: Tyrion: “魔术师……”

original: Mosourika: The Magician is associated with the power of transformation and manifestation.
translation: Mosourika: 魔术师与转变和显现的力量相关联。

original: Mosourika: And in its upright position,[p/] which is associated with the resourcefulness to harness one's inner potential.
translation: Mosourika: 如果是正位的话，[p/]意味着一个人的内在具有发展的潜力。

original: Mosourika: It often symbolizes a person who possesses great skill,[p/] creativity,[p/] and mastery over their craft.
translation: Mosourika: 这张牌通常代表技艺精湛、[p/]创造力出色的人。

original: Tyrion: …I never knew you knew about these things.
translation: Tyrion:  ……没想到你还懂塔罗牌。

original: Mosourika: Ha![p/][s/] Of course, I do!
translation: Mosourika: 哈！[p/][s/]我当然懂！

original: Mosourika: The power of the magician is the power to shape reality through the power of will!
translation: Mosourika: 魔术师的力量是通过意志力来改变现实事物！

original: Mosourika: Doesn't [i]that[/i] remind you of someone?
translation: Mosourika: 你不觉得<u>这点</u>让你想到某人吗？

original: Tyrion: No...[p/] Not really.
translation: Tyrion: 没……[p/]没想到谁。

original: Mosourika: Oh, come on!
translation: Mosourika: 哦，别这样！

original: Tyrion: There are some barrels stacked in the corner here.
translation: Tyrion: 角落里有些木桶叠在一起。

original: Tyrion: The table that we're sitting at seems relatively new.
translation: Tyrion: 我们坐的桌子看起来还挺新。

original: Tyrion: Rika apparently had them custom-made by the local carpenter.
translation: Tyrion: 里卡似乎是找当地的木匠订制的。

original: Tyrion: Rika seems to have decorated the entire café with several plants and flowers.
translation: Tyrion: 里卡在咖啡馆里各处都装饰了花花草草。

original: Tyrion: The greens add a fresh and rustic ambiance to the restaurant.
translation: Tyrion: 翠绿的植物给咖啡馆添加了一种新鲜质朴的氛围。

original: Tyrion: There are artificery lights hanging from the ceiling.
translation: Tyrion: 天花板上有奥术能源驱动的灯。

original: Tyrion: They're apparently hooked up to an Arcane power grid.
translation: Tyrion: 这些灯看来接着一个奥术能源网。

original: Tyrion: There's a shelf full of drinks,[p/] mugs,[p/] cream,[p/] and sugar behind the restaurant counter.
translation: Tyrion: 在餐厅柜台后面有一个架子，上面放满了饮料、[p/]杯子、[p/]奶油[p/]和糖。

original: Tyrion: This must be where they prepare coffee to be served.
translation: Tyrion: 这里一定是他们准备咖啡的地方。

original: Mosourika: Sorry,[p/] I wasn't [i]trying[/i] to lie to you...
translation: Mosourika: 抱歉，[p/]我没<u>打算</u>向你说谎的……

original: Tyrion: It's okay.[p/] I'm assuming you had your reasons.
translation: Tyrion: 没事的，[p/]我猜你也有难言之隐。

original: Tyrion: But I need to know where I can find Justin's old friends.
translation: Tyrion: 不过我得知道在哪能找到贾斯汀的那些老朋友。

original: Mosourika: ...
translation: Mosourika: ……

original: Mosourika: You probably know already.[p/] But a few years ago,[p/] Justin got involved with a local street gang.
translation: Mosourika: 我估计你已经知道这件事了。[p/]几年前，[p/]贾斯汀和当地的一个帮派有来往。

original: Mosourika: They'd always hang around the beach area.
translation: Mosourika: 他们一般会在海滩地区。

original: Mosourika: But one day,[p/] they discovered an abandoned house along the coastline.
translation: Mosourika: 但有一天，[p/]他们在海岸线附近发现了个废弃的房子。

original: Mosourika: And they started spending most of their time there...
translation: Mosourika: 在那之后，他们大部分时间都在那所房子附近活动……

original: ...A lone house on the coastline.
translation: ……海岸线上孤零零的房子。

original: Mosourika: It's [i]that[/i] house, Tyrion.
translation: Mosourika: 就是<u>那所</u>房子，提利昂。

original: Mosourika: That's probably where you'll find Justin's old friends.
translation: Mosourika: 估计你能在那找到贾斯汀的老朋友。

original: Tyrion: So...[p/] [i]That's[/i] why you were being so secretive.
translation: Tyrion: 所以说……[p/]原来你装神弄鬼的就是因为<u>这个</u>。

original: Celeste: What...?
translation: Celeste: 什么……？

original: Mosourika: ...I'm sorry.
translation: Mosourika: ……抱歉。

original: Tyrion: Don't be.[p/] You were just trying to look out for me, right?
translation: Tyrion: 不必道歉。[p/]你也只是在为我着想而已。

original: Mosourika: ...Are you going to be okay?[p/] I can go there with you if you'd like.
translation: Mosourika: ……你真的没关系吗？[p/]需要的话我随时都能陪你去。

original: Tyrion: No...[p/] It's okay.[p/] I'm sure you're busy with the café right now.
translation: Tyrion: 没事的……[p/]不必再麻烦你了，[p/]咖啡馆的工作已经够忙了。

original: Tyrion: And it's not as if I'll be going alone.
translation: Tyrion: 况且我也不是一个人去。

original: Mosourika: Alright...[p/] Just don't push yourself too hard, okay?
translation: Mosourika: 好吧……[p/]不过答应我，别把自己逼得太狠，好吗？

original: Tyrion: Yeah...
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……

original: Celeste: ...?
translation: Celeste: ……？

original: Tyrion: By the way,[p/] why [i]were[/i] you at the refinery that day?
translation: Tyrion: 顺便问一下，[p/]事发那天你为什么<u>在</u>精炼厂？

original: Tyrion: Didn't you have to work at the café?
translation: Tyrion: 那天不用照顾店里的生意吗？

original: Mosourika: I was making a food delivery to Justin.
translation: Mosourika: 我当时在给贾斯汀送饭。

original: Celeste: Wait...[p/] You were delivering food [i]to[/i] the victim?
translation: Celeste: 等下……[p/]你当时要给受害者送吃的？

original: Mosourika: Yeah...[p/] He never had the time to make his own dinner.
translation: Mosourika: 对啊……[p/]他总是没时间准备自己的晚餐。

original: Mosourika: So, I always delivered his dinner during his evening break.
translation: Mosourika: 所以我每次都在他晚上休息的时间送饭。

original: Mosourika: But that night,[p/] I couldn't find him in the freight area.[p/] So I went looking for him in the refinery building.
translation: Mosourika: 但当晚，[p/]我在货运区没看见他，[p/]就去精炼厂找他。

original: Tyrion: So,[p/] the accident happened while you were delivering his food.
translation: Tyrion: 所以说，[p/]事发时你正在给他送饭。

original: Tyrion: Did you talk to Justin at all before the accident?
translation: Tyrion: 出事前你有和贾斯汀说过话吗？

original: Mosourika: I did.[p/] When I finally found him in the refinery building,[p/] he seemed busy.
translation: Mosourika: 有过，[p/]我在精炼厂找到他的时候，[p/]他看起来很忙。

original: Mosourika: He told me to leave his food in the break room.
translation: Mosourika: 他和我说把饭放在休息室就可以了。

original: He was busy?[p/] But according to Dracogen,[p/] he should have never been in the refinery building in the first place.
translation: 他很忙？[p/]但根据德拉科根所说，[p/]他绝不应该出现在精炼厂才对。

original: Celeste: Did he say what he was busy with?
translation: Celeste: 他有和你说他在忙什么吗？

original: Mosourika: He said that he had a meeting scheduled with Mr. Dracogen.
translation: Mosourika: 他说他和德拉科根先生约好会面。

original: That can't be true, though...[p/] Dracogen didn't mention anything about this.
translation: 但这不可能……[p/]德拉科根没提过这样的事。

original: Unless...
translation: 除非……

original: Tyrion: We've gotten a few witness accounts already.[p/] But I just wanted to double-check.
translation: Tyrion: 我们已经获得几个目击者的陈述了，[p/]但我想再确认一下。

original: Tyrion: What did you see during the accident?
translation: Tyrion: 出事时你看到了什么？

original: Mosourika: ...
translation: Mosourika: ……

original: Tyrion: Sorry,[p/] I'm sure that it was a disturbing sight.
translation: Tyrion: 抱歉，[p/]我知道回忆当时的情景很不好受。

original: Tyrion: Do you need to take a moment?
translation: Tyrion: 你需要缓缓吗？

original: Mosourika: No,[p/] it's okay.
translation: Mosourika: 没事，[p/]我没事的。

original: Mosourika: It happened after Justin told me to leave his food in the break room.
translation: Mosourika: 贾斯汀让我把饭放在休息室之后，事故发生了。

original: Mosourika: It was my first time inside the refinery.[p/] So, I spent some time looking at all of the machines.
translation: Mosourika: 当时是我第一次进到精炼厂，[p/]所以我花了些时间看这些机器。

original: Mosourika: That's when I suddenly heard a strange sound from the walkway.
translation: Mosourika: 就在那时，我突然听见走道上有声怪响。

original: Mosourika: When I looked to see what it was,[p/] I saw Justin fall from there.
translation: Mosourika: 我循声望去，[p/]发现贾斯汀正从那里落下。

original: Mosourika: I tried to find someone to help him.[p/] But no one could hear me because of how loud the machines were.
translation: Mosourika: 我试着呼救，[p/]但这些机器太吵了，盖过了我的声音。

original: Mosourika: Before I finally got them to understand what happened,[p/] it was already too late...
translation: Mosourika: 别人明白我在说什么的时候，[p/]一切都太晚了……

original: Tyrion: Did you see the guard rail break when Justin fell off of the walkway?
translation: Tyrion: 贾斯汀掉下去的时候，你有看到护栏断了吗？

original: Tyrion: More specifically,[p/] did it break from Justin's weight?
translation: Tyrion: 具体点说的话，[p/]护栏是因为贾斯汀靠上去才断的吗？

original: Mosourika: I'm honestly not sure.
translation: Mosourika: 这个我真的不确定。

original: Mosourika: I was too busy trying to find help.
translation: Mosourika: 我当时急着找人帮忙。

original: You have matching witness accounts from Aster and Morrison.[p/] They saw the guard rail break.
translation: 根据阿斯特和莫里森的证言，[p/]他们看见了护栏断裂。

original: Having Rika also confirm that would have been helpful.
translation: 如果里卡也能证实这一点会很有帮助。

original: But you suppose Aster and Morrison's statements will have to suffice.
translation: 但或许也只能用阿斯特和莫里森的证言了。

original: Tyrion: Could you tell us more about the victim?
translation: Tyrion: 能聊聊受害者的事吗？

original: Tyrion: What kind of person was he?
translation: Tyrion: 他人怎么样？

original: Mosourika: He was a good person.
translation: Mosourika: 他是个好人。

original: Mosourika: He fell in with a bad crowd a few years ago.[p/] But he was starting to turn his life around.
translation: Mosourika: 几年前他曾和一帮坏人混在一起，[p/]不过他及时醒悟，改变了自己的生活。

original: Mosourika: I saw how much he was trying to change.[p/] So I asked Mr. Dracogen to give him a job.
translation: Mosourika: 我知道他为了改变自己有多努力，[p/]所以我请求德拉科根先生给他一份工作。

original: Mosourika: I really wanted to help him change his life for the better.
translation: Mosourika: 我真的很想帮他改善生活。

original: Mosourika: ...But this job just ended up killing him.
translation: Mosourika: ……但这份工作却害他丢了性命。

original: Celeste: You can't blame yourself for this.
translation: Celeste: 别把这件事的责任背在自己身上。

original: Celeste: No one could have known that this would happen.
translation: Celeste: 没人能预料得到会发生这种意外。

original: Mosourika: I guess you're right...
translation: Mosourika: 你说得对……

original: Mosourika: It's hard not to think about, though.
translation: Mosourika: 但还是很难不去想。

original: Tyrion: ...Was he the type of person to go places that he wasn't supposed to be?
translation: Tyrion: ……他会是那种闯进不该去的地方的人吗？

original: Mosourika: No,[p/] not anymore.
translation: Mosourika: 不，[p/]再也不是了。

original: "Not anymore"?
translation: “再也不是了”？

original: Mosourika: He really wanted to make a good impression on Mr. Dracogen.
translation: Mosourika: 他真的很想给德拉科根先生留下好印象。

original: Mosourika: He always talked about following the rules.
translation: Mosourika: 他经常谈论遵守规则。

original: Mosourika: He even got mad at me a few times when I accidentally broke Dracogen's protocols.
translation: Mosourika: 我有几次不小心违反了德拉科根的规定，他甚至对我发火了。

original: Right,[p/] that matches up with what Dracogen said.
translation: 对，[p/]这和德拉科根说的对得上。

original: But maybe he was falling back into his old habits.
translation: 但也许他旧习难改。

original: Perhaps Rika can tell you more about what he was like [i]before[/i] he turned his life around.
translation: 或许里卡可以告诉你更多他浪子回头<u>之前</u>的信息。

original: Tyrion: You mentioned that Justin fell in with a "bad crowd" before.
translation: Tyrion: 你提到过贾斯汀曾和一群“坏人”混在一起。

original: Tyrion: I've also heard that he used to hang out with a band of local delinquents.
translation: Tyrion: 我还听说他以前常和一群当地流氓鬼混。

original: Tyrion: Could you tell us more about them?
translation: Tyrion: 你可以多说点关于他们的事情吗？

original: Mosourika: U-[p/]Um...
translation: Mosourika: 呃、[p/]呃……

original: What...?
translation: 什么……？

original: Tyrion: Rika,[p/] this information will help us with our investigation.
translation: Tyrion: 里卡，[p/]这一信息有助于我们的调查。

original: Tyrion: I need to speak with the other people who knew him.
translation: Tyrion: 我需要和其他认识他的人聊聊。

original: Tyrion: Do you know where I could find his delinquent friends?
translation: Tyrion: 你知道在哪可以找到他的流氓朋友吗？

original: Mosourika: I-[p/]I'm sorry.[p/] I really didn't know him [i]that[/i] well. [mind="I should keep quiet. It might make him mad..."/]
translation: Mosourika: 我、[p/]我很抱歉。[p/]我并不是<u>那么</u>了解他。[mind="我不该多嘴。不然他会生气……"/]

original: Tyrion: Rika...[p/] Are you hiding something from me?
translation: Tyrion: 里卡……[p/]你是不是有事情瞒着我？

original: Mosourika: W-[p/][s/]What?![p/][s/] Of course, not!
translation: Mosourika: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！[p/][s/]当然没有！

original: Mosourika: What would the Dark Lord of Aurinax possibly have to hide from you?
translation: Mosourika: 欧奥耐克斯的黑暗领主能有什么要瞒着你的呢？

original: Yeah...[p/] She's definitely hiding something.
translation: 是的……[p/]她绝对在隐瞒什么东西。

original: You'll need to ARGUE against her if you want the truth.
translation: 如果想要获得真相，你就必须和她 <size=1.5em>辩论</size>。

original: Mosourika: You've really grown up since the last time I saw you.
translation: Mosourika: 多年不见，你已经长大许多了。

original: Mosourika: You used to be such a nervous wreck before.
translation: Mosourika: 你以前还是个紧张的可怜虫。

original: Celeste: Nah,[p/] he still gets like that sometimes.
translation: Celeste: 并没有，[p/]他现在有时也是。

original: Celeste: You should see him before he enters the courtroom.
translation: Celeste: 你应该看看他进法庭之前的样子。

original: Mosourika: Your sword is so cool Celeste!
translation: Mosourika: 塞莱斯特，你的剑真酷！

original: Mosourika: It doesn't look [i]anything[/i] like the swords I've seen at the local blacksmith.
translation: Mosourika: 和当地铁匠铺的<u>完全</u>不一样。

original: Celeste: You like it?[p/] It was a gift I received from a regent in the Eastern Kingdoms.
translation: Celeste: 你喜欢它吗？[p/]这是我从一名东方古国摄政王那收到的礼物。

original: Tyrion: Wait…[p/] Really?[p/] I didn't expect you to get along with an aristocrat.
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/]真的吗？[p/]我没想到你会和贵族相处融洽。

original: Celeste: Well...[p/] A lot of things happened.
translation: Celeste: 嗯……[p/]发生了很多事情。

original: Celeste: It's a pretty long story.
translation: Celeste: 说来话长。

original: You'd like to hear more about her travels when you're less busy.
translation: 你很想在有空时多听听她的旅途故事。

original: Tyrion: You've really made a life for yourself here.
translation: Tyrion: 你在这里也是成功自食其力了。

original: Tyrion: I'm glad you were able to realize your dreams and open a café.
translation: Tyrion: 我很高兴你实现了自己开咖啡馆的梦想。

original: Mosourika: Hehe,[p/] but of course.
translation: Mosourika: 嘿嘿，[p/]那当然。

original: Mosourika: Once the Dark Lord sets her sights on a quarry,[p/] it's only a matter of time before she obtains it.
translation: Mosourika: 一旦黑暗领主锁定了猎物，[p/]抓住对手就只是时间问题了。

original: Mosourika: I've grown up since you last saw me.
translation: Mosourika: 和上一次见面比，我已经长大了。

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] Let's not go [i]that[/i] far.
translation: Tyrion: 是啊……[p/]我觉得没长大<u>那么</u>多。

original: Mosourika: What's [i]that[/i] supposed to mean?!
translation: Mosourika: <u>这是</u>什么意思？！

original: Tyrion: I'm terribly sorry for what happened to Justin.
translation: Tyrion: 我对贾斯汀的事深表遗憾。

original: Tyrion: Are you doing okay?
translation: Tyrion: 你还好吗？

original: Mosourika: Yeah...[p/] It's difficult to think about sometimes.
translation: Mosourika: 是……[p/]想起来还是会不好受。

original: Mosourika: You always hear about these things happening.
translation: Mosourika: 虽然经常听说类似的事情发生。

original: Mosourika: ...But you never expect them to happen to people you know.
translation: Mosourika: ……但我从未想过这样的事会发生在认识的人身上。

original: Mosourika: B-[p/]But have no fear!
translation: Mosourika: 但、[p/]但是别害怕！

original: Mosourika: It will take more than [i]this[/i] to bring down the High Archmagi!
translation: Mosourika: 就<u>这点</u>小问题可不会打倒最高大法师！

original: She's reverted back to her chuuni personality...
translation: 她又变回了中二人格……

original: Tyrion: Rika...[p/] There's something you should know about Justin.
translation: Tyrion: 里卡……[p/]我得告诉你关于贾斯汀的事。

original: Mosourika: What is it?
translation: Mosourika: 什么事？

original: Tyrion: I spoke with his two "friends" at my old house.
translation: Tyrion: 我和他的两个“朋友”在我的旧房子聊过了。

original: Tyrion: ...According to them,[p/] he was planning on robbing Dracogen.
translation: Tyrion: ……据他们所说，[p/]贾斯汀打算抢劫德拉科根。

original: Mosourika: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Mosourika: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！

original: Tyrion: Sorry...[p/] I know this is hard to hear after you vouched for him.
translation: Tyrion: 抱歉……[p/]我知道为他担保的你听了不好受。

original: Mosourika: ...
translation: Mosourika: ……

original: Mosourika: No.[p/] I don't believe it.
translation: Mosourika: 不。[p/]我不信。

original: Tyrion: Rika...
translation: Tyrion: 里卡……

original: Mosourika: No![p/][s/] He was a good person![p/] I know it!
translation: Mosourika: 不！[p/][s/]他是个好人！[p/]我知道的！

original: Mosourika: He would [i]never[/i] betray me and Mr. Dracogen like that!
translation: Mosourika: 他<u>绝对不可能</u>像那样背叛我和德拉科根先生！

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: It'd be best not to push the matter further.
translation: 最好不要继续深究这件事了。

original: The truth will eventually come to light.
translation: 真相终究会浮出水面的。

original: Tyrion: Rika,[p/] do you know a criminal named the "Eyetaker"?
translation: Tyrion: 里卡，[p/]你知道一位名叫“夺眼者”的罪犯吗？

original: Mosourika: The "Eyetaker"?[p/] I can't say I've heard of them.
translation: Mosourika: “夺眼者”？[p/]我从来没有听说过。

original: Mosourika: Are you in conflict with this villain?
translation: Mosourika: 你和这个恶棍有冲突吗？

original: Mosourika: Do they seek to steal the Eye of Horus from you?
translation: Mosourika: 他们想从你那里偷走荷鲁斯之眼吗？

original: Tyrion: N-[p/]No...[p/] Not exactly.
translation: Tyrion: 不、[p/]不……[p/]不是这样。

original: ...At least,[p/] you hope not.
translation: ……至少，[p/]你希望不是。

original: Either way,[p/] it looks like Rika doesn't know who the Eyetaker is.
translation: 无论如何，[p/]看来里卡不知道夺眼者是谁。

original: You should try asking someone else.
translation: 你应该试试询问其他人。

original: Tyrion: I met with Morrison earlier.[p/] He seems to be doing well.
translation: Tyrion: 我之前见到了莫里森。[p/]他看起来状况不错。

original: Mosourika: Yeah,[p/] sea trade has been booming lately.
translation: Mosourika: 是，[p/]海洋贸易最近繁荣起来了。

original: Mosourika: So, he's been getting a lot of business.
translation: Mosourika: 所以他生意火爆。

original: Celeste: I wonder if it's because of the growing wealth of Aurinax...
translation: Celeste: 我好奇这和欧奥耐克斯的财富增长有没有关系……

original: Celeste: Could I capitalize on this somehow...?
translation: Celeste: 我能不能以某种方式利用这一点呢……？

original: You can almost [i]see[/i] the gears turning in her head.
translation: 你几乎可以<u>看见</u>她脑中齿轮转动的样子。

original: Tyrion: I've heard a lot of good things about Dracogen.
translation: Tyrion: 我听说了很多关于德拉科根的夸赞。

original: Tyrion: But to be perfectly honest,[p/] it seems too good to be true.
