translation: Tyrion: 我想你也不介意让这些“熟人”在法庭上作证吧。

original: Aria: Lord von Sanctus was discussing the blockade being put around the city.
translation: Aria: 冯·桑克图斯勋爵当时正在讨论封城的事情。

original: Lloyd: Steelwind...
translation: Lloyd: 斯蒂尔文德……

original: Aria: ...I won't go into detail about [i]what[/i] they discussed.[p/] But the Kingsguard,[p/] City Watch,[p/] Arcane Inquisition,[p/] and myself were present.
translation: Aria: ……我不会细说他们讨论了些<u>什么</u>。[p/]但是国王卫队、[p/]城市安保、[p/]奥术裁判所[p/]和我都在现场。

original: Aria: We can [i]all[/i] confirm that he was present at the meeting.
translation: Aria: 我们<u>都</u>能证明他在讨论会的现场。

original: Aria: ...Although,[p/] his behavior was quite erratic that day.
translation: Aria: ……尽管，[p/]那天他的行为相当反常。

original: Lloyd: Ugh...[p/] How could I not?
translation: Lloyd: 呃啊……[p/]我怎么会不反常？

original: Lloyd: You people have no care for personal hygiene.[p/] It took my retainers hours to disinfect the area.
translation: Lloyd: 你们这些人根本不讲究个人卫生。[p/]我的仆人花了好几个小时才把那地方消毒干净。

original: Tyrion: Um...[p/] Can we please stay on subject?
translation: Tyrion: 呃……[p/]我们能言归正传吗？

original: Lloyd: Right...[p/] Anyways...
translation: Lloyd: 好的……[p/]不论如何……

original: Tyrion: What if the Construct wasn't actually active?
translation: Tyrion: 但如果构造体其实并没有被激活呢？

original: Tyrion: You could have had one of your servants don the Construct as a disguise.
translation: Tyrion: 你可以让你的仆人穿上构造体来作为伪装。

original: Lloyd: It's extremely dangerous to wear the Construct like a suit of armor.
translation: Lloyd: 像穿盔甲那样穿构造体是很危险的。

original: Lloyd: It almost always ends in severe injury and death in the worst case.
translation: Lloyd: 最糟糕的情况下会导致重伤甚至死亡。

original: Lloyd: Furthermore,[p/] this supposed Construct would have needed to carry and use a Rod of Mending.
translation: Lloyd: 而且，[p/]这个所谓的构造体还要搬运并使用修复之杖。

original: Lloyd: I have many capable servants...[p/] But none of them have superhuman strength.
translation: Lloyd: 我有许多能干的仆人……[p/]但是没有人有超人的力量。

original: Right...[p/] Your theory only makes sense if the [i]Construct[/i] was the one carrying the Rod.
translation: 是的……[p/]只有在修复之杖被<u>构造体</u>搬运时，你的理论才说得通。

original: Celeste: His argument makes a lot of sense, actually.
translation: Celeste: 实际上，他的论点很有道理。

original: Celeste: He wouldn't trust a Construct to sabotage the refinery alone,[p/] especially if there was such a big risk of getting caught.
translation: Celeste: 他不会放心让一个构造体独自破坏精炼厂的，[p/]尤其是在被抓住的风险这么大的情况下。

original: Tyrion: Hm...[p/] But regardless of what he says,[p/] Rika [i]did[/i] see a Construct there that day.
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……[p/]但是不管他怎么说，[p/]里卡那天还是<u>看见了</u>精炼厂里有一个构造体。

original: You doubt that he'd take a risk like that.
translation: 你不认为他会冒这种险。

original: So he must have had a way to ensure that the Construct completed its task correctly.
translation: 他肯定有方法保证构造体正确完成任务。

original: He's a noble from a pillar family and he's probably an accomplished mage.
translation: 他是一个出身显赫的贵族，多半还是个学有所成的法师。

original: Could he have used that somehow?
translation: 他会利用这一点吗？

original: Tyrion: Your Honor![p/][s/] It's clear that the witness's testimony is contradictory!
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下！[p/][s/]证人的证言明显存在矛盾！

original: Tyrion: And [i]this[/i] piece of evidence proves it!
translation: Tyrion: <u>这个</u>就是相关证据！

original: Judge: I fail to see how [i]that[/i] proves anything, Mr. Cuthbert...
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生……我没看出来这两者有什么关系。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh...[p/] I guess you're right.
translation: Tyrion: 啊、[p/]哦……[p/]好像是这样的。

original: Tyrion: Von Sanctus.[p/] You testified that there was no way for you to observe and communicate with the Construct.
translation: Tyrion: 冯·桑克图斯。[p/]你作证称自己不可能监督构造体并和它交流。

original: Tyrion: Am I correct?
translation: Tyrion: 我没说错吧？

original: Lloyd: Yes.[p/] I was at that meeting with Steelwind for that entire day.[p/] [i]Anyone[/i] there could testify to that fact.
translation: Lloyd: 是的。[p/]我一整天都在参加和斯蒂尔文德一起的讨论会。[p/]那里的<u>任何人</u>都可以证明这一点。

original: Tyrion: I'm not disputing your so-called "alibi".[p/] But it's not as air-tight as you might think.
translation: Tyrion: 我不是在质疑你所谓的“不在场证明”。[p/]但它并不像你想象的那么无懈可击。

original: Aria: ...What are you talking about?
translation: Aria: ……你在说什么？

original: Aria: I was [i]there[/i] at that meeting, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aria: 我就<u>在</u>讨论会现场，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Aria: Lord von Sanctus may have been absent in mind...[p/] but he [i]was[/i] there physically.
translation: Aria: 冯·桑克图斯勋爵可能有点心不在焉……[p/]但他人<u>是</u>在那里的。

original: Lloyd: ...
translation: Lloyd: ……

original: "Absent in mind"...?[p/] So his attention [i]wasn't[/i] focused on the meeting...
translation: “心不在焉”……？[p/]所以他的注意力<u>并不在</u>讨论会上……

original: Which means that his attention was somewhere else.
translation: 也就是说他的注意力在别的地方。

original: Tyrion: I suppose you're correct, Ms. Steelwind.[p/] But I still have one question for you, Lord von Sanctus.
translation: Tyrion: 也许你是对的，斯蒂尔文德女士。[p/]但我还有一个问题，冯·桑克图斯先生。

original: Lloyd: Pah...[p/] And what would that be?
translation: Lloyd: 哈……[p/]什么问题？

original: Tyrion: Are you able to cast the [b]Send Message[/b] spell?
translation: Tyrion: 你会用[b]通信术[/b]吗？

original: Lloyd: ...!
translation: Lloyd: ……！

original: Aria: ...What?
translation: Aria: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: Ms. Steelwind, your client may have been physically at the meeting.[p/] But his attention was somewhere else, wasn't it?
translation: Tyrion: 斯蒂尔文德女士，你的委托人虽然在讨论会现场，[p/]但他的注意力在别处，对吧？

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Tyrion: He could have used a combination of spells to view the Construct [i]during[/i] the meeting.
translation: Tyrion: 他完全可以使用多重法术，借此达到在讨论会<u>期间</u>监督构造体的目的

original: Tyrion: And he could have used the [b]Send Message[/b] spell to communicate with it over a large distance.
translation: Tyrion: 他说不定就是用[b]通信术[/b]来远距离交流的。

original: Tyrion: [i]If[/i] my claim is truly false,[p/] your client should have no trouble disproving it with his [b]Spell Compendium[/b].
translation: Tyrion: <u>如果</u>我的陈述有误，[p/]你的委托人应该能用他的[b]法术汇编[/b]轻松证明。

original: Lloyd: I-[p/]I...[p/] W-[p/]Well...
translation: Lloyd: 我、[p/]我……[p/]呃、[p/]呃……

original: Aria: ...von Sanctus.
translation: Aria: ……冯·桑克图斯。

original: Tyrion: You appear to be hesitating, von Sanctus.
translation: Tyrion: 你看起来有点犹豫啊，冯·桑克图斯。

original: Tyrion: Can I assume that you [i]do[/i] know how to cast [b]Send Message[/b]?
translation: Tyrion: 我是不是能认为你<u>确实</u>知道怎么使用[b]通信术[/b]呢？

original: Tyrion: If so,[p/] that would punch a gigantic hole in your alibi.
translation: Tyrion: 这样的话，[p/]你的不在场证明就有巨大的漏洞。

original: Lloyd: S-[p/]Steelwind![p/][s/] You were there, weren't you?!
translation: Lloyd: 斯、[p/]斯蒂尔文德！[p/][s/]你在讨论会的，对吧？！

original: Lloyd: My attention was fully there! [mind="I need her to cover for me!"/]
translation: Lloyd: 我在会上可是一直集中注意力的！[mind="得让她掩护我！"/]

original: Lloyd: The idea that I was communicating with a Construct is absurd!
translation: Lloyd: 我在跟构造体交流的想法太荒唐了！

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Aria: I'm afraid that I can't say that, Lord von Sanctus.
translation: Aria: 我恐怕不能这么说，冯·桑克图斯勋爵。

original: Lloyd: S-[p/]Steelwind?!
translation: Lloyd: 斯、[p/]斯蒂尔文德？！

original: Aria: I [i]did[/i] find it odd.
translation: Aria: 我<u>确实</u>感觉很奇怪。

original: Aria: Your attention appeared to be elsewhere,[p/] despite the gravity of our discussion.
translation: Aria: 我们讨论的事情很重要，[p/]但你的注意力似乎在别处。

original: Aria: And I seem to recall you speaking under your breath the entire time.
translation: Aria: 而且我记得你一直在低声自言自语。

original: Aria: ...I had always just assumed that you were muttering obscenities.
translation: Aria: ……我一直以为你是在嘟囔脏话。

original: Aria: But Mr. Cuthbert's explanation [i]does[/i] seem possible.
translation: Aria: 但是卡斯伯特先生的解释<u>确实</u>有可能。

original: Lloyd: W-[p/][s/]What are you saying?!
translation: Lloyd: 你、[p/][s/]你在说什么？！

original: Lloyd: Aren't you [i]obligated[/i] to defend me?!
translation: Lloyd: 难道你没有<u>义务</u>为我辩护吗？！

original: Aria: I am obligated to represent you to the best of my ability.
translation: Aria: 我只有为你尽我所能辩护的义务。

original: Aria: I am [i]not[/i] obligated to forge your alibi for you.
translation: Aria: 我<u>并没有</u>替你伪造不在场证明的义务。

original: Lloyd: You little-!
translation: Lloyd: 你这个——！

original: Judge: ...
translation: Judge: ……

original: Judge: Lord von Sanctus.[p/] I'm afraid the court needs an answer.
translation: Judge: 冯·桑克图斯勋爵，[p/]法庭恐怕需要一个解释。

original: Judge: Are you able to cast the [b]Send Message[/b] spell?
translation: Judge: 你是否有能力使用[b]通信术[/b]？

original: Lloyd: ...
translation: Lloyd: ……

original: Lloyd: Fine![p/][s/] I admit it, okay?!
translation: Lloyd: 行！[p/][s/]我承认，行了吧？！

original: Lloyd: I [i]am[/i] able to cast [b]Send Message[/b]!
translation: Lloyd: 我<u>确实</u>会用[b]通信术[/b]！

original: Lloyd: B-[p/]But that still doesn't [i]prove[/i] anything!
translation: Lloyd: 但、[p/]但这还是<u>证明</u>不了任何事！

original: His voice betrays a hint of desperation.
translation: 他的声音透露出一丝绝望。

original: You have him right where you want him.
translation: 你已经完全将他掌控在自己的手中。

original: Now is our opportunity to deal the final blow...
translation: 现在是我们给予最后一击的机会……

original: So why do you feel so uneasy?
translation: 但你为何还如此不安？

original: ... There are still two details that don't sit well with you.
translation: ……仍有两个细节让你感到不对劲。

original: Mosourika: When I looked to see what it was,[p/] I saw that Justin had tumbled over the guard rail of the walkway.
translation: Mosourika: 我循声望去，[p/]看到贾斯汀翻过了护栏。

original: Rika saw Justin fall [i]over[/i] the guard rail,[p/] even though von Sanctus sabotaged it...
translation: 里卡看到贾斯汀·维耶从护栏<u>上</u>摔下去，[p/]但护栏本应被冯·桑克图斯破坏了……

original: Aria: Then please enlighten us, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aria: 那么请赐教吧，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Aria: How could [i]both[/i] of their testimonies possibly be true?
translation: Aria: 他们两人的证词怎么可能<u>同时</u>为真？

original: Tyrion: Well,[p/] I think there's only one possible explanation.
translation: Tyrion: 唔，[p/]我想只有一种可能的解释。

original: Tyrion: Both Ms. Tudor and Mr. Morrison saw [i]someone[/i] fall off of the walkway.
translation: Tyrion: 都铎女士和莫里森先生都看见<u>有人</u>掉下了走道。

original: Tyrion: But the person that Ms. Tudor saw and the person that Mr. Morrison saw...
translation: Tyrion: 但是都铎女士和莫里森先生看见的……

original: Tyrion: ...were two different people!
translation: Tyrion: ……是两个不一样的人！

original: The second person that fell into the vat is still unaccounted for...
translation: 第二个掉进桶里的人仍然下落不明……

original: Luckily,[p/] you didn't [i]need[/i] to prove that this second person existed.
translation: 幸运的是，[p/]你不<u>需要</u>证明第二个人存在。

original: ...But not having an explanation for Aster and Morrison's testimony still irks you.
translation: ……但无法解释阿斯特和莫里森的证词仍然让你感到困扰。

original: However,[p/] even if it's not a clean ending,[p/] there's only one way forward...
translation: 然而，[p/]即使这样并不干净利落，[p/]也只有一条路可以继续前进……

original: ...And that's revealing von Sanctus for the petty saboteur that he is.
translation: ……揭露冯·桑克图斯作为一个卑劣破坏者的真面目。

original: No...[p/] That's not right.
translation: 不……[p/]还是不对。

original: OK
translation: OK

original: Tyrion: Why did you hesitate so long to answer my question, von Sanctus?
translation: Tyrion: 为什么回答我的问题要犹豫这么久，冯·桑克图斯？

original: Lloyd: You know very well why I hesitated!
translation: Lloyd: 你很清楚我为什么犹豫！

original: Lloyd: Why would I willingly give [i]you[/i] evidence?!
translation: Lloyd: 我怎么会心甘情愿给<u>你</u>证据？！

original: Lloyd: You clearly intend to use it against me!
translation: Lloyd: 你就是想用它来对付我！

original: Tyrion: Regardless,[p/] this entirely disproves your alibi.
translation: Tyrion: 不管怎样，[p/]你的不在场证明已经完全被证伪了。

original: Tyrion: You [i]could[/i] have communicated with your Construct at the meeting.
translation: Tyrion: 你<u>可以</u>在讨论会上和你的构造体交流。

original: Lloyd: By that logic,[p/][s/] I [i]could[/i] be the mastermind behind every crime that occurs in Aurinax!
translation: Lloyd: 照这个逻辑来，[p/][s/]我<u>可以</u>是欧奥耐克斯里每件罪行的幕后主使！

original: Lloyd: I may have had the means to commit this crime,[p/] but there are plenty of other individuals that could have sent an Arcane Construct!
translation: Lloyd: 我可能有犯罪的方法，[p/]但还有其他许多人可能派遣那个奥术构造体！

original: Tyrion: Von Sanctus.[p/] You, of all people, should know that the Arcane Constructs are not available to the public.
translation: Tyrion: 冯·桑克图斯。[p/]你应该比其他所有人都清楚，奥术构造体还不向大众出售。

original: Tyrion: When you attempted to sell these Constructs to Dracogen,[p/] you promised him that he would be the first merchant in Aurinax that would own one.
translation: Tyrion: 试图把这些构造体卖给德拉科根时，[p/]你承诺他将成为欧奥耐克斯第一位拥有构造体的商人。

original: Tyrion: Since he refused your offer,[p/] that would leave [i]you[/i] as the only owner of Arcane Constructs in Aurinax!
translation: Tyrion: 由于他拒绝了你的提议，[p/]<u>你</u>就变成了欧奥耐克斯唯一拥有奥术构造体的人！

original: Lloyd: T-[p/]That's-!
translation: Lloyd: 这、[p/]这是——！

original: No…[p/] That’s not right.
translation: 不对……[p/]再好好想想。

original: He wants to deflect blame onto someone else.
translation: 他想把责任推给别人。

original: But you've already proven that he was the only one that could have sent that Construct.
translation: 但你已经证明了，他是唯一一个可能派出那个构造体的人。

original: Lloyd: W-[p/]Well,[p/] I admit I may have not been that truthful when I made my sales pitch.
translation: Lloyd: 我、[p/]好吧，[p/]我承认推销时我可能没有完全说实话。

original: Tyrion: So, you're saying that you [i]lied[/i] to my client?
translation: Tyrion: 所以，你的意思是你对我的委托人<u>说谎</u>了？

original: Lloyd: Oh, please!
translation: Lloyd: 噢，拜托！

original: Lloyd: Every good businessman knows how to embellish the truth when making a sale!
translation: Lloyd: 优秀的商人都知道推销时要花言巧语！

original: Lloyd: The truth is that I've sold those Constructs to plenty of other individuals in Aurinax!
translation: Lloyd: 真相就是，我也把构造体卖给了欧奥耐克斯的其他人！

original: Tyrion: Frankly, von Sanctus,[p/] I find that hard to believe.
translation: Tyrion: 老实说，冯·桑克图斯，[p/]我还是难以相信。

original: Tyrion: After the Nightgrave trial,[p/] you must have been a lot more fearful about [i]who[/i] you sold your Constructs to.
translation: Tyrion: 奈特格雷夫一案后，[p/]你肯定在挑选<u>出售对象</u>这方面越发小心。

original: Tyrion: You only tried to sell your Constructs to Dracogen so that you could control him!
translation: Tyrion: 你只尝试了把构造体卖给德拉科根，因为你想借此控制他！

original: Tyrion: You wouldn't have done that otherwise!
translation: Tyrion: 你才不会卖给其他人！

original: Lloyd: Is that so?![p/][s/] Then why don't you prove it!
translation: Lloyd: 真的吗？！[p/][s/]那你为什么不证明你说的话呢！

original: Tyrion: No,[p/] von Sanctus.[p/] Why don't [i]you[/i] prove [i]your[/i] statement?
translation: Tyrion: 不，[p/]冯·桑克图斯[p/]为什么<u>你</u>不证明<u>你的</u>话呢？

original: Tyrion: Show us [i]any[/i] invoice that proves you made a sale to someone in Aurinax.
translation: Tyrion: 拿出<u>任何</u>一张发票，证明你还把构造体卖给了欧奥耐克斯其他人。

original: Lloyd: ...!
translation: Lloyd: ……！

original: Tyrion: Von Sanctus,[p/] what you’re saying clearly doesn’t match with what you’re thinking.
translation: Tyrion: 冯·桑克图斯，[p/]你现在说的话很明显跟你想的东西对不上。

original: Lloyd: What I'm "thinking"?[p/] ...What does that even mean?
translation: Lloyd: 我在“想”的东西？[p/]……说的这是什么？

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh, um...
translation: Tyrion: 噢、[p/]噢，呃……

original: You need to choose your words more carefully.
translation: 你得更小心地选择你说的话。

original: No one else knows about the Eye of Horus.
translation: 其他人不知道荷鲁斯之眼的事。

original: Anyways,[p/] look at his thoughts and see how that compares with his claim.
translation: 不管怎样，[p/]看清他的想法和陈述有什么不同。

original: Lloyd: Well,[p/][s/] who says that the saboteur lived in Aurinax when I made the sale?!
translation: Lloyd: 好吧，[p/]谁能确定破坏者在我卖出构造体时就住在欧奥耐克斯？！

original: Tyrion: Are you serious...?
translation: Tyrion: 你是认真的吗……？

original: Lloyd: Aurinax is a trading hub![p/] Plenty of people come and go from the city!
translation: Lloyd: 欧奥耐克斯是一个贸易中心！[p/]很多人进进出出，往来不断！

original: Lloyd: Any [i]one[/i] of my customers could have secretly entered the city to carry out the sabotage!
translation: Lloyd: 我的<u>任何</u>一个顾客都有可能偷偷进入城市进行破坏！

original: Tyrion: Von Sanctus.[p/] You might have been right under any other circumstance.
translation: Tyrion: 冯·桑克图斯，[p/]在别的情况下你的话还有道理。

original: Tyrion: But the Kingsguard locked down the city on the day that the accident occurred.
translation: Tyrion: 但是事故发生后，国王卫队就封城了。

original: Tyrion: No one except for a select few individuals could have left or entered the city.
translation: Tyrion: 除了少数几个特定的人，没人能进出这座城市。

original: Tyrion: And due to the gravity of the situation,[p/] the Kingsguard created profiles of [i]everyone[/i] within the city.
translation: Tyrion: 由于事态的严重性，[p/]国王卫队为城内的<u>每一个</u>人都建立了档案。

original: Tyrion: Why don't we cross-reference the records taken by the Kingsguard with the list of individuals who you've sold Constructs to?
translation: Tyrion: 我们为什么不将国王卫队记录的档案与构造体出售名单进行交叉比对呢？

original: Lloyd: ...
translation: Lloyd: ……

original: Tyrion: But I suppose from your reaction,[p/] that list would come up empty.
translation: Tyrion: 从你的反应来看，[p/]那份名单多半是空的。

original: Tyrion: So why don't you admit to your crimes, von Sanctus?
translation: Tyrion: 为何不承认你的犯罪事实呢，冯·桑克图斯？

original: Tyrion: Or do I have to drag the evidence into court myself?!
translation: Tyrion: 还是说要我亲自把证据带进法庭？！

original: Lloyd: ...
translation: Lloyd: ……

original: Lloyd: Wait...[p/] "Drag the evidence into court"...? [mind="Of course! How could I forget?"/]
translation: Lloyd: 等等……[p/]“把证据带进法庭”……？[mind="对了！我怎么会忘记的？"/]

original: Tyrion: What...?
translation: Tyrion: 什么……？

original: No…[p/] That’s not right.
translation: 不对……[p/]再好好想想。

original: It wouldn't be possible for one of his other customers to send the Construct.
translation: 不可能是其他客户派出的那个构造体。

original: They would have needed to enter the city unnoticed...
translation: 他们需要在不被发现的情况下进城……

original: Lloyd: ...
translation: Lloyd: ……

original: Lloyd: Why don't you go ahead and do that, Mr. Cuthbert?
translation: Lloyd: 怎么不继续了，卡斯伯特先生？

original: Lloyd: Bring in your so-called "evidence".
translation: Lloyd: 拿出你所谓的“证据”啊。

original: Tyrion: I don't know where this confidence is coming from...
translation: Tyrion: 我不知道你这份自信是哪来的……

original: Tyrion: But we can easily detect the traces of [b]divination[/b] and [b]transmutation[/b] on the Constructs you own.
translation: Tyrion: 但是我们可以轻松检测到构造体上[b]占卜术[/b]和[b]形变术[/b]魔法的痕迹。

original: Lloyd: ...Assuming that Construct still exists, that is.
translation: Lloyd: ……如果那个构造体还在的话，确实可以。

original: Tyrion: ...!
translation: Tyrion: ……！

original: Wait...[p/][s/] That's right!
translation: 等等……[p/][s/]对了！

original: If he used a Construct to commit a crime like this,[p/][s/] he would have definitely disposed of it by now!
translation: 如果他利用构造体犯罪，[p/][s/]现在肯定已经把构造体处理掉了！

original: Even within the blockade...[p/] Aurinax is a gigantic city.
translation: 就算封城了……[p/]欧奥耐克斯也是个巨大的城市。

original: With his resources,[p/] he could have hidden it anywhere in the city!
translation: 他有那么多资源，[p/]可以把构造体藏在城市里的任何地方！

original: It would be a needle hidden within a [i]town[/i] of haystacks!
translation: 找出构造体无异于海底捞针！

original: Tyrion: ...We still have the testimony of Mosourika Tudor.
translation: Tyrion: ……我们还有莫苏里卡·都铎的证词。

original: Tyrion: And I'm sure many other people saw that Construct walking around the refinery.
translation: Tyrion: 我敢肯定有很多人在精炼厂里看到了行动中的构造体。

original: Lloyd: The commonfolk can hardly be trusted to recognize complex artificery.
translation: Lloyd: 平民不可能认得出这么复杂的奥术能源产品。

original: Lloyd: Without the actual Construct,[p/] all you have are several unreliable witnesses.
translation: Lloyd: 没有实际的构造体，[p/]你们有的不过是几个不可信的证人。

original: Lloyd: Tell me Lady Steelwind,[p/] can I be convicted of such a serious charge with such evidence?
translation: Lloyd: 告诉我，斯蒂尔文德小姐，[p/]这样的证据就能给我定下重罪吗？

original: Aria: ...No,[p/] I suppose not.
translation: Aria: ……不，[p/]我想不行。

original: Damn it![p/][s/] Is he seriously going to get away with this?!
translation: 该死！[p/][s/]他真的就要这么逃掉了吗？！

original: ...No.[p/] You still have one card up your sleeve.
translation: ……不。[p/]你手里还有一张底牌。

original: If you could just find out [i]where[/i] he disposed of the evidence,[p/] you might be able to direct the Inquisition there.
translation: 如果能找出他把证据丢在了<u>哪里</u>，[p/]你或许就能给裁判所指明方向。

original: Lloyd: ...
translation: Lloyd: ……

original: Come on...[p/] Focus on his thoughts, Tyrion...
translation: 快……[p/]专注于他的想法，提利昂……

original: Activate the Empowered Eye!
translation: 激活你的强化之眼！

original: Lloyd: ...Hmph,[p/] your undignified glaring will do you no favors.
translation: Lloyd: ……哼，[p/]你这样失礼地怒视可没什么用。

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: ...What?[p/][s/] Why isn't it working?!
translation: ……什么？[p/][s/]为什么没有用？！

original: Ruby: The Eye of Horus is a powerful tool, Tyrion.
translation: Ruby: 荷鲁斯之眼是个强大的工具，提利昂。

original: Ruby: But that's twice now that [p/] you've used the Empowered Eye to get out of a corner.
translation: Ruby: 但你已经两次利用强化之眼来脱离困境了。

original: Ruby: If you keep relying on that one trick,[p/] you'll never grow as an attorney.
translation: Ruby: 如果你一直依赖它，[p/]就永远无法成为一名真正的律师。

original: Ruby: One day,[p/] you'll find a witness that the Empowered Eye [i]won't[/i] work on.
translation: Ruby: 总有一天，[p/]你会遇到一个连强化之眼都<u>无法</u>洞察的证人。

original: Ms. Tymora was right.
translation: 泰摩拉女士是对的。

original: You've been relying on the Empowered Eye too much.
translation: 你太依赖强化之眼了。

original: Lloyd: From your silence,[p/] I assume that you have no way to rebut my claim.
translation: Lloyd: 从这沉默来看，[p/]你大概没有办法反驳我了。

original: Lloyd: I suppose that makes it checkmate, you upstart commoner.
translation: Lloyd: 将军，平民新星。

original: Lloyd: Honestly.[p/] I can't believe you'd resort to accusing me of manslaughter.
translation: Lloyd: 说实话，[p/]我不敢相信你会用上指控我犯过失杀人罪这种手段。

original: Lloyd: What a crass and underhanded tactic.
translation: Lloyd: 多么粗俗且阴险的手段。

original: Lloyd: But I suppose I wouldn't expect anything less from a charlatan like you.
translation: Lloyd: 不过我想也没法对你这种江湖骗子期望太高。

original: Tyrion: Damn it...
translation: Tyrion: 该死……

original: Celeste: ...What the [i]hell[/i] are you doing?
translation: Celeste: ……你在搞什么<u>鬼</u>？

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]What...?
translation: Tyrion: 什、[p/][s/]什么……？

original: Celeste: That look on your face...[p/][s/] Are you seriously giving up?!
translation: Celeste: 你的表情……[p/][s/]你真的要放弃了吗？！

original: Tyrion: I...
translation: Tyrion: 我……

original: Celeste: I've seen you get out of plenty of situations like this!
translation: Celeste: 我已经见证你从数不清的类似困境中脱身了！

original: Celeste: So why are you giving up this time?!
translation: Celeste: 为什么这次要放弃呢？！

original: Tyrion: ...I-[p/]I'm sorry, Celeste.[p/] But, I can't use my-
translation: Tyrion: ……我、[p/]我很抱歉，塞莱斯特。[p/]但是，我无法使用我的——

original: Tyrion: ...I can't use my usual strategies.[p/] There's no way to find the evidence that we need...
translation: Tyrion: ……我无法用我的常规方法。[p/]我们没有办法获取需要的证据……

original: Celeste: Seriously...?
translation: Celeste: 真的吗……？

original: Celeste: There's [i]always[/i] a way, Tyrion!
translation: Celeste: <u>总会</u>有办法的，提利昂！

original: Celeste: If your usual strategies aren't working,[p/] then you just need to do something different!
translation: Celeste: 如果常规方法不奏效了，[p/]那就试试别的方法！

original: She's right.[p/] You don't need to see directly into his mind to utilize your skills as an attorney.
translation: 她是对的。[p/]你不需要直接看透他的心思，也能运用自己的律师技巧。

original: You may not be able to rely on the Eye of Horus this time...
translation: 或许这一次你无法依靠荷鲁斯之眼……

original: But you've [i]always[/i] been able to rely on deductive reasoning.
translation: 但你<u>一直</u>都能依靠推理来解决问题。

original: Lloyd: Well,[p/] it seems that you have no further questions for me...
translation: Lloyd: 那么，[p/]看来你没有更多问题要问了……

original: Lloyd: And you clearly don't have a shred of physical evidence to support your claims.
translation: Lloyd: 你也明显没有任何物证来支持你的说法。

original: Lloyd: ...I think I'll be taking my leave.
translation: Lloyd: ……那我就先告辞了。

original: Tyrion: I'm not quite done with you yet, von Sanctus.
translation: Tyrion: 我还没问完呢，冯·桑克图斯。

original: Lloyd: Honestly,[p/] your desperation is almost pitiful.
translation: Lloyd: 说实话，[p/]你这种绝望的样子简直太可怜了。

original: Lloyd: You should really learn to lose with dignity, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Lloyd: 你真该学学怎么有尊严地认输，卡斯伯特先生。

original: He's the last person you want to hear that from.
translation: 他最没资格这么教育别人。

original: Calm your mind and focus...
translation: 静下心来好好想一想……

original: You may not be able to read von Sanctus' mind in the [i]literal[/i] sense.
translation: 你也许不能<u>字面意义上</u>读取冯·桑克图斯的想法。

original: But you can still extrapolate his plan and his actions.
translation: 但你仍然可以推断出他的计划和行动。

original: Tyrion: Let's explore my theory a little more and see for ourselves if there's no physical evidence.
translation: Tyrion: 让我们进一步探究我的理论，看看是否真的没有物证。

original: Tyrion: If you wanted to use a Construct,[p/] you would have needed to maintain constant communication.
translation: Tyrion: 如果想利用构造体，[p/]你就需要与之持续交流。

original: Tyrion: So to [i]prove[/i] that this communication occurred,[p/] we would need something that connects you to it.
translation: Tyrion: 要<u>证明</u>这种交流确实发生过，[p/]我们就需要找到能把你和它联系起来的东西。

original: Tyrion: [b]Send Message[/b] can normally only target a person.[p/] But Arcane Constructs probably don't count as [i]people[/i] for the purposes of that spell.
translation: Tyrion: [b]通信术[/b]通常只能以一个人为目标。[p/]但对于这个法术来说，奥术构造体可能不算<u>人</u>。

original: Tyrion: What piece of evidence would that leave behind?
translation: Tyrion: 这样会留下什么证据呢？

original: No...[p/] To implicate von Sanctus,[p/] you need something that points [i]directly[/i] to him.
translation: 不……[p/]要指控冯·桑克图斯，[p/]你需要能<u>直接</u>指向他的东西。

original: You're not sure what kind of magic he used to view the Construct during the sabotage.
translation: 你不确定他在破坏过程中利用了什么法术监督构造体。

original: But you [i]do[/i] know that he used [b]Send Message[/b] to communicate with it.
translation: 但你<u>知道</u>他用[b]通信术[/b]与之交流。

original: What kind of evidence would [b]Send Message[/b] leave?
translation: [b]通信术[/b]会留下什么证据呢？

original: Tyrion: An Arcane Construct isn't a person.
translation: Tyrion: 奥术构造体不是人。

original: Tyrion: So,[p/] you must have used an object attuned to your magic to communicate with it.
translation: Tyrion: 所以，[p/]你一定用了与你绑定的魔法物品来和它交流。

original: Tyrion: Ms. Steelwind.[p/] If we were able to [i]find[/i] that object,[p/] would that tie your client to the sabotage?
translation: Tyrion: 斯蒂尔文德女士，[p/]如果能<u>找到</u>那个物品，[p/]这是否可以把你的委托人和破坏行为联系起来？

original: Aria: Hypothetically,[p/] yes.
translation: Aria: 假设能找到的话，[p/]是的。

original: Aria: The Inquisition has [b]divination[/b] magic.[p/] And they can use it to detect if an object is attuned to a specific mage.
translation: Aria: 裁判所有[b]占卜术[/b]魔法。[p/]可以用它来检测一个物品是否和特定的法师绑定。

original: Lloyd: Hmph...[p/] Good luck finding such evidence.
translation: Lloyd: 哼……[p/]祝你好运。

original: Lloyd: If I [i]did[/i] perform these acts,[p/] the remains could be anywhere in Aurinax.
translation: Lloyd: 如果我<u>真的</u>干了这些事，[p/]残留物可能在欧奥耐克斯的任何地方。

original: Tyrion: I'm not so sure about that, von Sanctus...
translation: Tyrion: 我可不那么确定，冯·桑克图斯……

original: Tyrion: Let's look at things from your perspective.[p/] Why would you do the things that you did that day?
translation: Tyrion: 让我们从你的角度考虑一下。[p/]你那天为什么要那么做？

original: Tyrion: Knowing [i]that[/i] will point us to where you ultimately hid the Construct.
translation: Tyrion: 你明明知道<u>那</u>会指引我们找到你最终藏匿构造体的地方。

original: Lloyd: ...
translation: Lloyd: ……

original: Tyrion: Your intention was to sabotage the refinery without anyone finding out what you did.
translation: Tyrion: 你的目的是在不被任何人发现的情况下，破坏精炼厂。

original: Tyrion: So how would you dispose of the Construct [i]and[/i] the attuned item?
translation: Tyrion: 那你会怎么处理构造体<u>和</u>被绑定的物体？

original: He needed to hide and/or destroy it so that no one would be able to find it.
translation: 为了不被任何人发现，他需要藏匿并且/或者破坏那个物体。

original: Wait...[p/][s/] "destroy"?
No...[p/] Von Sanctus needed a surefire way to dispose of the evidence.
translation: 不……[p/]冯·桑克图斯需要一个万无一失的方法来处理证据。

original: And to do that he'd either need to destroy it or hide it somewhere that no one would find it.
translation: 为了做到这一点，他要么销毁证据，要么把它藏在一个没人能找到的地方。

original: Is there anything he could have used to destroy or hide the evidence?
translation: 有什么东西能用来销毁或隐藏证据吗？

original: Tyrion: You used the vat of volatile liquid!
translation: Tyrion: 你用了那桶腐蚀性极强的液体！

original: Lloyd: ...
translation: Lloyd: ……

original: You suppose that makes sense.[p/] You found the remnants of the Rod of Mending in there too...
translation: 你猜这说得通。[p/]你也在里面发现了修复之杖的残余部分……

original: Celeste: ...But wouldn't that mean that the object is fully dissolved?
translation: Celeste: ……但这不就意味着那个物品已经完全溶解了？

original: Lloyd: ...Exactly.[p/] There would be no physical evidence for you to find.
translation: Lloyd: ……正是如此。[p/]你可找不到任何物证。

original: Tyrion: That's not necessarily true.
translation: Tyrion: 这可不一定。

original: Tyrion: You threw the Rod of Mending into the vat.[p/] And [i]that[/i] didn't fully dissolve.
translation: Tyrion: 你把修复之杖扔进了桶里，[p/]但<u>它</u>没有完全溶解掉。

original: Lloyd: ...What?
translation: Lloyd: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: The workers neutralized the liquid immediately after Justin fell into the vat.
translation: Tyrion: 在贾斯汀掉进桶里后，工人们迅速中和了液体。

original: Lloyd: What?![p/][s/] Neutralizing that liquid would have rendered it unsalvageable and useless!
translation: Lloyd: 什么？！[p/][s/]中和那种液体就会让它变得一文不值！

original: Lloyd: Doing that would have cost Dracogen a small fortune!
translation: Lloyd: 那么做会让德拉科根损失一大笔钱！

original: Tyrion: Unlike you, von Sanctus,[p/] my client values the lives of his workers over his profits.
translation: Tyrion: 和你不同，冯·桑克图斯，[p/]我的委托人更看重工人的生命，而不是利润。

original: Tyrion: And because of that,[p/] the Inquisition was able to find pieces of bone matter and metal within the vat.
translation: Tyrion: 正因为如此，[p/]裁判所才能在桶里找到碎骨和金属碎片。

original: ...Wait.[p/] The Rod didn't fully dissolve...
translation: ……等等。[p/]修复之杖没有完全溶解……

original: This means that it was thrown into the vat around the same time that Justin fell into it.
translation: 这意味着它几乎是和贾斯汀同时掉进桶里的。

original: Tyrion: ...You wouldn't have thrown the Rod into the vat until [i]after[/i] you were done with your sabotage.
translation: Tyrion: ……你在破坏行为结束<u>之后</u>，才把修复之杖扔进桶里。

original: Tyrion: And if you wanted to destroy the Rod,[p/] you would have destroyed [i]all[/i] of the evidence that you needed to get rid of.
translation: Tyrion: 如果你想毁掉修复之杖，[p/]就会顺便把<u>所有</u>需要销毁的证据都毁掉。

original: Is there anything else that von Sanctus would have needed to get rid of?
translation: 还有什么冯·桑克图斯要销毁掉的东西吗？

original: No...[p/] Von Sanctus would have wanted to get rid of any evidence that would have incriminated him.
translation: 不……[p/]冯·桑克图斯会想把任何能给他定罪的证据都销毁掉。

original: What was the last thing that might have connected Von Sanctus to the sabotage?
translation: 还有什么可能把冯·桑克图斯和破坏行为联系起来？

original: Tyrion: You would have also destroyed the Arcane Construct itself.
translation: Tyrion: 你应该也把奥术构造体销毁了。

original: Lloyd: T-[p/][s/]That's ridiculous![p/][s/] I-[p/]I...
translation: Lloyd: 这、[p/][s/]这太荒唐了！[p/][s/]我、[p/]我……

original: Lloyd: Lady Steelwind![p/][s/] Why aren't you-?!
translation: Lloyd: 斯蒂尔文德小姐！[p/][s/]你为什么不——？！

original: Aria: ...I told you before, didn't I?
translation: Aria: ……我之前跟你说过，对吧？

original: Aria: I will defend you to the best of my ability.[p/] But I will not fabricate an alibi for you.
translation: Aria: 我会尽我所能地辩护。[p/]但我不会为你伪造不在场证明。

original: Tyrion: You must have ordered the Construct to throw [i]itself[/i] into the vat to hide any traces of your sabotage.
translation: Tyrion: 你一定是命令构造体把<u>它自己</u>扔进桶里，来掩盖你破坏行为的痕迹。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: A machine resembling a human threw itself into the vat...
translation: 一个像人类一样的机器把自己扔进了桶里……

original: ... This means that anyone looking at the walkway would have seen this!
translation: ……这意味着任何看着走道的人都会见到这一幕！

original: Tyrion: That's it!
translation: Tyrion: 就是这样！

original: Tyrion: The [i]Arcane Construct[/i] was the second "person" that Aster and Morrison saw fall into the vat!
translation: Tyrion: 阿斯特和莫里森看到掉进桶里的第二个“人”其实是<u>奥术构造体</u>！

original: Tyrion: [i]That's[/i] why we didn't find organic matter from anyone other than Justin in there!
translation: Tyrion: <u>这就是</u>为什么我们没在里面找到贾斯汀之外的人体碎片！

original: Tyrion: The second "body" that Aster and Morrison saw was actually an Arcane Construct!
translation: Tyrion: 阿斯特和莫里森看到的第二个“身体”其实是一个奥术构造体！

original: Lloyd: H-[p/][s/]How are you...?
translation: Lloyd: 你、[p/][s/]你是怎么……？

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/] Rika was sure that she saw Justin fall off of the walkway.
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/]里卡很确定她看见贾斯汀掉下了走道。

original: Tyrion: After she notified Aster and Morrison,[p/] they saw the Construct break the guard rail and fall into the vat.
translation: Tyrion: 在她告知阿斯特和莫里森后，[p/]他们看见构造体破坏护栏，掉进了桶里。

original: Tyrion: Wouldn't that mean that the Construct disposed of itself [i]after[/i] Justin Waye fell off of the walkway...?
translation: Tyrion: 也就是说构造体是在贾斯汀·维耶从走道上掉下去<u>之后</u>再处理自己的……？

original: Tyrion: Why would you order it to do that...?
translation: Tyrion: 你为什么要命令它那么做……？

original: Lloyd: B-[p/][s/]Because it never happened!
translation: Lloyd: 因、[p/][s/]因为这一切根本就没发生过！

original: Lloyd: Your logic is flawed!
translation: Lloyd: 你的逻辑有问题！

original: He's getting stressed out...[p/] Maybe you should try using the Empowered Eye.
translation: 他开始紧张了……[p/]或许你应该试试使用强化之眼。

original: ...No.[p/] You don't need it this time.
translation: ……不。[p/]这次你不需要这个能力。

original: You're so close to figuring this out.[p/] You can feel it.
translation: 你非常接近真相了。[p/]你能感觉到。

original: So, think.[p/] If he was observing the Construct using magic,[p/] he must have seen Justin fall.
translation: 所以，好好想一想。[p/]如果他用魔法监督构造体，[p/]就一定看到了贾斯汀掉下去。

original: And for some reason,[p/] he reacted by sabotaging the guard rail.
translation: 而出于某种原因，[p/]他的反应是破坏护栏。

original: Why would he ignore seeing that happen?
translation: 他为什么会对这一幕视而不见呢？

original: ...Unless he did all of this [i]because[/i] he saw Justin fall.
translation: ……除非他做这一切都是<u>因为</u>他看到贾斯汀掉下去了。

original: No...[p/] Von Sanctus saw Justin fall off of the walkway.
translation: 不……[p/]冯·桑克图斯看到贾斯汀从走道上掉下去了。

original: And instead of running away,[p/] he ordered the Construct to sabotage and break the guard rail.
translation: 但他没有逃跑，[p/]而是命令构造体去破坏护栏。

original: Why would he do something like that?
translation: 他为什么要做那种事？

original: Tyrion: ...It's because you [i]wanted[/i] it to look like an accident.
translation: Tyrion: ……这是因为你<u>想</u>让这件事看起来像一场事故。

original: Tyrion: Which means that it [i]wasn't[/i] actually an accident.
translation: Tyrion: 也就是说这实际上<u>不是</u>事故。

original: Lloyd: O-[p/][s/]Oh,[p/][s/] now you're accusing me of [i]intentionally[/i] murdering the victim?
translation: Lloyd: 噢、[p/][s/]噢，[p/][s/]现在你又指控我是<u>故意</u>谋杀受害者的？

original: Lloyd: Why would I [i]ever[/i] do that?!
translation: Lloyd: 我<u>怎么可能</u>那么做呢？

original: Lloyd: You said it yourself![p/][s/] My goal was sabotage!
translation: Lloyd: 你自己说过了！[p/][s/]我的目标是搞破坏！

original: Lloyd: Committing murder would have brought unnecessary attention to what I'd done.
translation: Lloyd: 犯下谋杀罪只会给我招来不必要的关注。

original: Tyrion: But those Constructs [i]do[/i] have a habit of shoving people that are in their way.
translation: Tyrion: 但那些构造体<u>确实</u>有把挡路的人推开的习惯。

original: Tyrion: What if the Construct pushed Justin out of the way,[p/] causing him to fall over the edge of the guard rail?
translation: Tyrion: 要是构造体把挡路的贾斯汀推开，[p/]导致他从护栏边上掉下去呢？

original: Lloyd: ... [mind="He's figuring out everything that happened from just a few clues?!"/]
translation: Lloyd: ……[mind="他靠这点线索就能搞清楚<u>所有事</u>？！"/]

original: Justin: H-[p/][s/]Hey![p/] I didn't see you there...
translation: Justin: 嘿、[p/][s/]嘿！[p/]我没看到你在那儿……

original: Justin: I was just...[p/] Uh...
translation: Justin: 我只是……[p/]呃……

original: Lloyd: Just walk past him.
translation: Lloyd: 从他身边走过去。

original: Arcane: ACKNOWLEDGED.
translation: Arcane:  <size=1.5em>遵命。</size>

original: Justin: W-[p/]What...?
translation: Justin: 什、[p/]什么……？

original: Justin: H-[p/][s/]Hey![p/][s/] Watch it![p/][s/] Quit shoving me!
translation: Justin: 嘿、[p/][s/]嘿！[p/][s/]小心！[p/][s/]不要再推我了！

original: Justin: Wait![p/][s/] Whoa!
translation: Justin: 等等！[p/][s/]哇啊！

original: Justin: H-[p/][s/]Holy crap![p/][s/] Pull me up!
translation: Justin: 我的、[p/][s/]我的妈呀！[p/][s/]快把我拉上去！

original: Justin: I can't hold on for much longer!
translation: Justin: 我要坚持不住了！

original: Lloyd: Agh![p/] You idiot![p/][s/] What are you doing?!
translation: Lloyd: 啊！[p/]你个蠢蛋！[p/][s/]你在干什么？！

original: Justin: W-what...?
translation: Justin: 什、什么……？

original: Lloyd: Grab his arm and pull him up!
translation: Lloyd: 抓住他的手把他拉起来！

original: Arcane: ACKNOWLEDGED.
translation: Arcane: <size=1.5em>遵命。</size>

original: Justin: AGGGGGH![p/][s/] My hand!
translation: Justin: <size=1.5em>啊啊啊！</size> [p/][s/]我的手！

original: Justin: What the hell are you doing?!
translation: Justin: 你到底在搞什么鬼？！

original: Lloyd: Your grip is too tight![p/] Stop that!
translation: Lloyd: 你抓得太紧了！[p/]停！

original: Arcane: ACKNOWLEDGED.
translation: Arcane: <size=1.5em>遵命。</size>

original: Justin: AGGGGGGGGGH!
translation: Justin: <size=1.5em>啊啊啊啊啊！</size>

original: Lloyd: W-[p/]Wait![p/] I can still-!
translation: Lloyd: 等、[p/]等等！[p/]我还能——！

original: Tyrion: It [i]may[/i] have been unintentional...
translation: Tyrion: 这一行为<u>可能</u>不是故意的……

original: Tyrion: But either way...[p/] you [i]would[/i] have been at fault for Justin's death, [i]not[/i] my client.
translation: Tyrion: 但是不论如何，[p/]<u>应该是</u>你为贾斯汀的死负责，<u>而不是</u>我的委托人。

original: Tyrion: And if the Construct fell in [i]after[/i] Justin,[p/][s/] your attuned object must be somewhere in the neutralized liquid!
translation: Tyrion: 既然构造体是在贾斯汀<u>之后</u>掉下去的，[p/][s/]与你绑定的物体就应该在中和后的液体里！

original: Tyrion: No...[p/] It's even better than that.
translation: Tyrion: 不……[p/]可能情况比那还要好。

original: Tyrion: Constructs are made from a specific magical alloy, aren't they?
translation: Tyrion: 构造体是由特殊魔法合金制成的，对吧？

original: Lloyd: ...!
translation: Lloyd: ……！

original: Tyrion: I'm sure with a few [b]divination[/b] spells we can identify the metal shards from the Construct [i]and[/i] your arcane focus!
translation: Tyrion: 我很确定只要用几个[b]占卜术[/b]，就能识别出构造体的金属碎片<u>和</u>你的奥术焦点！

original: Tyrion: Each and every one of those pieces of evidence points directly at you, von Sanctus!
translation: Tyrion: 每一份证据都径直指向你，冯·桑克图斯！

original: Lloyd: ...You [i]petulant[/i] little upstart!
translation: Lloyd: ……你这个<u>不知好歹</u>的平民新星！

original: Tyrion: ...And that's checkmate, von Sanctus.
translation: Tyrion: ……将军，冯·桑克图斯。

original: Tyrion: Why don't you save us all a little time, von Sanctus?
translation: Tyrion: 别浪费时间了吧，冯·桑克图斯？

original: Tyrion: Admit to what you did.
translation: Tyrion: 承认你做的事吧。

original: Tyrion: And while you're at it,[p/] drop your false allegations against my client.
translation: Tyrion: 这么做的同时，[p/]也撤销对我的委托人的虚假指控。

original: Lloyd: ...I have nothing to admit to.[p/] Nor do I have anything to apologize for.
translation: Lloyd: ……我没什么好承认的，[p/]也没有任何要负责任的事。

original: Tyrion: Of course, not.[p/] You're [i]completely[/i] blameless, right?
translation: Tyrion: 当然没有了。[p/]你是<u>完全</u>无辜的，对吧？

original: Lloyd: Do you think you've achieved victory here today?
translation: Lloyd: 你以为今天取得胜利了吗？

original: Lloyd: No...[p/] Dissidents like you and Dracogen are absolutely deluded.
translation: Lloyd: 不……[p/]像你和德拉科根这样的异端分子只是痴心妄想。

original: Lloyd: Each and every breath you take only throws Wyverngarde further into chaos.
translation: Lloyd: 你们的每一次呼吸都只会让维文加德更加混乱。

original: Aria: You talk about these "commoners" as if they have even a fraction of the power that you have.
translation: Aria: 你谈起这些“平民”时，仿佛他们有你十分之一的力量一样。

original: Lloyd: Lady Steelwind![p/][s/] You need to see reason!
translation: Lloyd: 斯蒂尔文德小姐！[p/][s/]你得明白事理！

original: Lloyd: [i]They[/i] lack awareness of the power they truly have!
translation: Lloyd: <u>他们</u>根本不知道自己真正拥有多大的力量！

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Lloyd: These people have [i]infected[/i] you and His Majesty with these idealistic delusions!
translation: Lloyd: 这些人用理想主义的妄言<u>感染</u>了你和陛下！

original: Lloyd: I implore you...[p/][s/] I implore [i]both[/i] of you to see reality for what it is!
translation: Lloyd: 我恳求你……[p/][s/]我恳求<u>你们俩</u>看清现实！

original: Tyrion: No, von Sanctus.
translation: Tyrion: 不，冯·桑克图斯。

original: Tyrion: The [i]true[/i] reality is that people like you become threatened when we challenge your power.
translation: Tyrion: <u>真正的</u>现实是，当我们挑战你们的权力时，像你这样的人就会感到威胁。

original: Lloyd: You all speak about the rights of the individual.
translation: Lloyd: 你谈论的都是个人的权利。

original: Lloyd: You speak as if each and every one of you wouldn't stab each other in the back the moment that it benefited yourselves.
translation: Lloyd: 说得好像你们这些人不会为了自己的利益伤害对方一样。

original: Lloyd: You may hate the nobility.
translation: Lloyd: 你可以仇恨贵族。

original: Lloyd: You may curse,[p/] scream,[p/] and blame us for all of your little problems.
translation: Lloyd: 你可以咒骂，[p/]尖叫，[p/]把你所有的小问题都怪罪到我们头上。

original: Lloyd: But the truth is that you [s/][i]need[/i] us.[p/][s/] You need us to direct and lead you.
translation: Lloyd: 但真相是你[s/]<u>需要</u>我们。[p/][s/]你需要我们指引你。

original: Lloyd: You need us to maintain the fragile order that holds your peaceful little lives together.
translation: Lloyd: 你需要我们来维持能让你们平静度日的脆弱秩序。

original: Tyrion: ...You talk about protecting the commonfolk from themselves.
translation: Tyrion: ……说得像是你在保护平民免受他们自身带来的伤害。

original: Tyrion: But the truth is that [i]your[/i] actions led to the death of an innocent man.
translation: Tyrion: 事实却是<u>你的</u>行为导致了一位无辜之人的死亡。

original: Tyrion: [i]That[/i] is the only truth that matters.
translation: Tyrion: <u>这</u>才是唯一重要的真相。

original: Lloyd: ...
translation: Lloyd: ……

original: Tyrion: ...The defense has no further questions for the witness.
translation: Tyrion: ……辩方对证人没有其他疑问了。

original: Tyrion: He is dismissed.
translation: Tyrion: 他可以离开了。

original: Judge: V-[p/]Very well...
translation: Judge: 很、[p/]很好……

original: Celeste: We did it again, Tyrion!
translation: Celeste: 我们又一次做到了，提利昂！

original: Celeste: And we even caught another murderer in the process!
translation: Celeste: 我们甚至又抓获了一名凶手！

original: Tyrion: Yeah.[p/] We couldn't get the case [i]officially[/i] dismissed today.
translation: Tyrion: 是的。[p/]我们今天没能把案子<u>正式</u>撤销。

original: Tyrion: But it's pretty much inevitable with the evidence that we brought in today.
translation: Tyrion: 但我们今天提供的证据，让案子撤销几乎已成定局。

original: Aria: Actually, it probably won't even reach [i]that[/i] point.
translation: Aria: 实际上，可能不用到<u>那</u>一步了。

original: Aria: I've...[p/] advised Lord von Sanctus to drop the suit entirely.
translation: Aria: 我已经……[p/]建议冯·桑克图斯勋爵彻底撤诉了。

original: Aria: Word has already spread regarding the evidence that you brought forward.
translation: Aria: 你提供的证据已经被广为讨论。

original: Aria: At this point,[p/] prolonging the trial would just harm his public image even more.
translation: Aria: 在现在这个时间点，[p/]延长这场审理只会继续损坏他的公众形象。

original: Celeste: That's great![p/][s/] Now you can build a case against him for Justin's death.
translation: Celeste: 真不错！[p/][s/]现在你可以就贾斯汀的死对他提起诉讼了。

original: Aria: About that...[p/] I'll probably be forced to recuse myself from any charges brought against him.
translation: Aria: 关于那一点……[p/]我可能无法对他提出任何指控。

original: Celeste: What?![p/][s/] Why?!
translation: Celeste: 什么？！[p/][s/]为什么？！

original: Tyrion: ...It's because you represented him in the suit, isn't it?
translation: Tyrion: ……是因为你代理他参加了庭审，对吧？

original: Tyrion: It would be considered a conflict of interest to prosecute him yourself.
translation: Tyrion: 你自己起诉他会被认为是利益冲突。

original: Tyrion: ...Even though you're probably the only prosecutor that would convict him successfully.
translation: Tyrion: ……尽管你可能是唯一能成功定他罪的检察官。

original: Aria: You're correct...
translation: Aria: 你说得对……

original: Aria: As the head of one of the pillar families,[p/] he has the justice system dancing in the palm of his hand.
translation: Aria: 作为支柱家族之一的领主，[p/]司法体系仿佛是他的掌中之物。

original: Aria: He will definitely be quietly and swiftly acquitted.
translation: Aria: 他肯定会被悄无声息且迅速地宣告无罪。

original: Aria: I would have never agreed to represent him if I had known about this.
translation: Aria: 如果知道这件事，我绝不会同意代理他。

original: Aria: I'm truly sorry.
translation: Aria: 我非常抱歉。

original: Tyrion: Damn it...[p/] He must have had this planned all along.
translation: Tyrion: 该死……[p/]他肯定早就计算好了。

original: Celeste: No...[p/] Is he seriously going to get away with this?
translation: Celeste: 不……[p/]他真的会逍遥法外吗？

original: Stefanic: ...I wouldn't be so sure about that.
translation: Stefanic: ……我不那么肯定。

original: Tyrion: Dracogen.
translation: Tyrion: 德拉科根。

original: Stefanic: He may be acquitted in the legal sense.[p/] But the court of public opinion is a different thing entirely.
translation: Stefanic: 法律意义上他可能会被宣告无罪。[p/]但公众舆论则完全不同。

original: Celeste: What do you mean?
translation: Celeste: 你的意思是？

original: Stefanic: You brought forward a myriad of evidence against him.[p/] And I'm sure everyone in the gallery saw it too.
translation: Stefanic: 你提出了大量针对他的证据。[p/]我相信旁听席上的每个人也都看到了。

original: Stefanic: Von Sanctus' power relies on his public image.
translation: Stefanic: 冯·桑克图斯的权力依赖于他的公众形象。

original: Stefanic: And you quite handily tore down that facade.
translation: Stefanic: 而你相当漂亮地拆穿了那层伪装。

original: Stefanic: He may walk free,[p/] but his power and ideals have taken a great blow.
translation: Stefanic: 他可能会被释放，[p/]但他的权力和理念已经遭受了沉重打击。

original: Tyrion: ...But is that seriously all we can do?
translation: Tyrion: ……但我们真的只能做这么多了吗？

original: Tyrion: His actions and recklessness resulted in the death of Justin Waye.
translation: Tyrion: 他鲁莽的行为导致了贾斯汀·维耶的死亡。

original: Tyrion: He [i]should[/i] be punished within the letter of the law.
translation: Tyrion: 他<u>应该</u>受到法律惩罚。

original: Aria: You're not wrong, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aria: 你没有说错，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Aria: But sometimes we must take the victories that we can get.
translation: Aria: 但有时候我们只能接受仅有的胜利。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: She's probably right.
translation: 她大概是对的。

original: Tyrion: But there's still one thing that's nagging at me.
translation: Tyrion: 但还有一件事依旧困扰着我。

original: Stefanic: Oh?[p/] And what's that?
translation: Stefanic: 噢？[p/]那是什么？

original: Tyrion: Why was your safe unlocked if nothing was stolen?
translation: Tyrion: 既然什么物品都没有失窃，你的保险箱为什么会被打开？

original: Tyrion: If Justin [b]had[/b] gotten into your safe,[p/] he would have taken your gold with him.
translation: Tyrion: 如果[b]是[/b]贾斯汀打开了你的保险箱，[p/]他会把你的黄金都带走。

original: Tyrion: It wouldn't still be there...
translation: Tyrion: 黄金不会还留在那的……

original: Stefanic: Hm...[p/] Considering that nothing is missing,[p/] I'd rather leave it at that.
translation: Stefanic: 嗯……[p/]考虑到什么也没有丢，[p/]我还是不想深究了。

original: Tyrion: Really?
translation: Tyrion: 真的吗？

original: Stefanic: Justin was a good man.[p/] I'd rather not taint anyone's memory of him.[p/] Especially, Mosourika's...
translation: Stefanic: 贾斯汀是个好人。[p/]我不想玷污任何人对他的记忆。[p/]尤其是莫苏里卡的……

original: Right...[p/] She [i]was[/i] pretty upset about your accusations.
translation: 对……[p/]她对你提出的指控<u>确实</u>很生气。

original: Stefanic: Nothing was taken.[p/] So, no harm was done in that regard.
translation: Stefanic: 既然什么也没有丢，[p/]也就没有人受到伤害。

original: Tyrion: I suppose so.
translation: Tyrion: 我想是的。

original: Tyrion: But I can't help but wonder what [i]actually[/i] happened.
translation: Tyrion: 但我还是忍不住思考<u>到底</u>发生了什么。

original: Eyetaker: It just makes no damn sense to me.
translation: Eyetaker: 这一切对我来说根本讲不通。

original: Eyetaker: The kid successfully robbed the guy days ago.[p/] No one saw him.[p/] No one even [i]suspected[/i] him.
translation: Eyetaker: 那小子几天前就成功地抢了那个人。[p/]没人看到他，[p/]甚至没人<u>怀疑</u>他。

original: Eyetaker: But then he breaks into the place [i]again[/i]?
translation: Eyetaker: 但他又<u>再次</u>闯进那个地方？

original: Eyetaker: All so he could put [i]back[/i] the stolen gold?
translation: Eyetaker: 所以他只是为了把偷走的黄金放<u>回去</u>？

original: Eyetaker: Does this make any sense to you, Eris?
translation: Eyetaker: 这对你而言说得通吗，厄莉斯？

original: Eris: Perhaps he felt remorse for his actions, father.
translation: Eris: 也许他对自己的行为感到后悔了，父亲。

original: Eris: Not everyone can betray the people they love so easily.
translation: Eris: 不是每个人都能轻易背叛他们所爱的人。

original: Eyetaker: Hmph...
translation: Eyetaker: 嗯……

original: Eris: And if that's true,[p/] I feel like there's a sense of tragic beauty to it all.
translation: Eris: 如果真是这样，[p/]我觉得这一切有一种悲剧的美。

original: Eris: If he had never tried to "do the right thing",[p/] he would have never encountered the Construct in the first place.
translation: Eris: 如果他没有试图“做正确的事”，[p/]他就根本不会遇到那个构造体。

original: Eris: He would have paid his debt [i]and[/i] he would still have his life.
translation: Eris: 他就会还清自己的债，<u>并且</u>保住自己的命。

original: Eyetaker: Heh...[p/] It's true what they say.
translation: Eyetaker: 嘿……[p/]有句话说得好。

original: Eyetaker: No good deed goes unpunished.
translation: Eyetaker: 好心遭雷劈。

original: Eyetaker: ...It's a shame about the gold, though.
translation: Eyetaker: ……就是真可惜了那些金子啊。

original: Eris: I think we've more than made a profit today.
translation: Eris: 我觉得我们今天已经赚得够多了。

original: Eris: ...[i]I[/i], for one,[p/] am happy to have claimed a [i]boatload[/i] of tithes today.
translation: Eris: ……就<u>我</u>个人而言，[p/]我很高兴今天收了<u>一大堆</u>什一税。

original: Tyrion: This must be the walkway that the victim fell from.
translation: Tyrion: 这一定就是受害者跌落的走道了。

original: Tyrion: Supposedly,[p/] the guard rails broke apart when the victim leaned against them.
translation: Tyrion: 据说，[p/]护栏是在受害者靠上去时断开的。

original: You'll have to MOVE closer to it to get a better look.
translation: 你得 <size=1.5em>移动</size> 到它附近才能看得更清楚。

original: Tyrion: It's a walkway that overlooks the refinery.
translation: Tyrion: 这是一条俯瞰精炼厂的走道。

original: Tyrion: It's a little concerning how close it is to the vats.
translation: Tyrion: 它离那些桶有点太近了，不免令人担心。

original: Tyrion: But I suppose the guard rails [i]should[/i] keep the employees safe when they're up there.
translation: Tyrion: 但我猜护栏<u>应该</u>能保证员工在上面时的安全。

original: Tyrion: These metal stairs lead up to the walkway above.
translation: Tyrion: 这些金属楼梯通向上面的走道。

original: You can get a better look at the walkway by MOVING there.
translation: 你可以 <size=1.5em>移动</size> 到那里来更好地观察走道。

original: Tyrion: It's a vat filled with chemicals that I can't quite identify.
translation: Tyrion: 这个桶里装满了我分辨不出的化学物质。

original: Tyrion: According to Celeste,[p/] these chemicals are used to refine and create Arcane Crystals.
translation: Tyrion: 据塞莱斯特说，[p/]这些化学品用于提炼和制造奥术水晶。

original: Tyrion: It's a power box.[p/] It contains artificery hardware and an arcane power cell.
translation: Tyrion: 这是一个动力箱。[p/]它包含奥术能源硬件和一个奥术储能单元。

original: Tyrion: It's connected to the chemical vats.[p/] So, it must control some function of the refinery.
translation: Tyrion: 它连接着化学品桶。[p/]所以，它一定控制着精炼厂的某个功能。

original: Celeste: There are traces of [b]transmutation[/b] magic on this power box.
translation: Celeste: 这个动力箱上有[b]形变术[/b]魔法的痕迹。

original: Tyrion: It [i]is[/i] an artificery device, so that's not too out of the ordinary.
translation: Tyrion: 它<u>是</u>一个奥术能源装置，所以这并不奇怪。

original: Celeste: There are traces of [b]transmutation[/b] magic on these parts of the vat.
translation: Celeste: 这些桶的部件上有[b]形变术[/b]魔法的痕迹。

original: Tyrion: I'm honestly not quite sure how these vats even work.
translation: Tyrion: 说实话，我真不太清楚这些桶是怎么工作的。

original: Tyrion: Perhaps [b]transmutation[/b] magic is used in the refinement process somehow.
translation: Tyrion: 也许提炼过程中使用了[b]形变术[/b]魔法。

original: Tyrion: To start,[p/] could you tell us exactly what happened?
translation: Tyrion: 首先，[p/]你能告诉我们到底发生了什么吗？

original: Stefanic: Well, it all began during the work rush yesterday evening.
translation: Stefanic: 事情是从昨天晚上工作高峰期开始的。

original: Stefanic: One of my employees fell from the walkway and into a vat of magical chemicals.
translation: Stefanic: 我的一个员工从走道上掉进了装满魔法化学品的桶里。

original: Stefanic: Those chemicals contain extremely volatile and destructive [b]evocation[/b] magic.
translation: Stefanic: 这些化学品含有腐蚀性与破坏能力极强的[b]塑能术[/b]魔法。

original: Stefanic: Because of that,[p/] he unfortunately died before we could have pulled him out.
translation: Stefanic: 因为这个原因，[p/]我们还没来得及把他拉出来，他就已经不幸身亡了。

original: Tyrion: I see...
translation: Tyrion: 我明白了……

original: Tyrion: But that all just sounds like an unfortunate accident.[p/] Why is Lord von Sanctus blaming [i]you[/i] for what happened?
translation: Tyrion: 但这听起来只是一起不幸的意外。[p/]为什么冯·桑克图斯勋爵要为发生的事责怪<u>你</u>呢？

original: Stefanic: There are guard rails on the walkways to prevent people from falling.
translation: Stefanic: 走道上有护栏防止人们掉下去。

original: Stefanic: Supposedly,[p/] those guard rails broke apart when that employee tried to lean against it.
translation: Stefanic: 据说，[p/]护栏在那名员工靠上去时断开了。

original: Stefanic: According to von Sanctus,[p/] the accident was a direct result of my "negligence to maintain the refinery".
translation: Stefanic: 根据冯·桑克图斯的说法，[p/]这起事故是由于我“疏忽维护精炼厂”而直接导致的。

original: Stefanic: But my employees have taken great care to inspect and maintain the facilities.
translation: Stefanic: 但我的员工一直非常仔细地检查和维护这些设施。

original: Stefanic: I have no idea how this happened.
translation: Stefanic: 我不知道为什么会发生这样的事。

original: Is he telling the truth?[p/] This could all just be lip service.
translation: 他说的是实话吗？[p/]这些可能都只是说说而已。

original: The only way to know for sure is to inspect the walkway yourself.
translation: 你必须自己检查走道来确认这些。

original: Tyrion: Earlier,[p/] you said that the victim was an employee of yours.
translation: Tyrion: 早些时候，[p/]你说受害者是你的一个员工。

original: Tyrion: Could you tell us more about them?
translation: Tyrion: 你可以多说点关于他们的事情吗？

original: Stefanic: Yes...[p/] I hired him just a few months ago.
translation: Stefanic: 好的……[p/]我几个月前才雇用他。

original: Stefanic: It's a shame what happened to him.
translation: Stefanic: 发生这样的事真是太遗憾了。

original: Stefanic: He was a young man named Justin Waye.
translation: Stefanic: 他是个叫贾斯汀·维耶的年轻小伙。

original: Tyrion: Was he a good employee?
translation: Tyrion: 他是个好员工吗？

original: Stefanic: He was a hard worker.[p/] But he was a bit rough around the edges when he first started.
translation: Stefanic: 他是个努力工作的人。[p/]但他刚开始工作时有点毛毛躁躁的。

original: Stefanic: Before working for me,[p/] I heard that he'd always spend his time with the local delinquents.
translation: Stefanic: 在我这儿工作之前，[p/]我听说他总是和当地的流氓混在一起。

original: Stefanic: Ms. Tudor practically begged me to hire him.
translation: Stefanic: 都铎女士几乎是求着我雇用他。

original: Stefanic: She told me that she wanted to turn his life around.
translation: Stefanic: 她跟我说她想改变他的人生。

original: Hm...[p/] That [i]does[/i] sound like something Rika would do.
translation: 嗯……[p/]听起来<u>确实</u>像是里卡会做的事。

original: She always had a habit of getting involved in her friends' personal business.
translation: 她一直都喜欢介入朋友的事。

original: Stefanic: When you live a life like Justin's,[p/] it helps when you have something to give you some structure and direction.
translation: Stefanic: 像贾斯汀那样过活的人，[p/]更能从他人的指引中受益。

original: Stefanic: So I decided to give the boy a chance by hiring him.
translation: Stefanic: 所以我决定雇用他，给他一个机会。

original: Stefanic: He was clearly a hard worker.[p/] He did well to earn his keep.
translation: Stefanic: 他工作非常努力。[p/]他干得很好，挣到了自己的生活费。

original: Stefanic: He always followed the rules too.[p/] So, I have no idea why he was up in that walkway.
translation: Stefanic: 他一直遵规守纪。[p/]所以，我真不知道他为什么会在那走道上。

original: Wait...[p/] He wasn't [i]supposed[/i] to be on that walkway?
translation: 等等……[p/]他不<u>应该</u>在那走道上吗？

original: Tyrion: Earlier you mentioned that Justin wasn't "supposed" to be on the walkway.
translation: Tyrion: 刚刚你说贾斯汀不“应该”在走道上。

original: Tyrion: What did you mean by that?
translation: Tyrion: 那是什么意思？

original: Stefanic: Well, Justin worked in an entirely different department.
translation: Stefanic: 是这样的，贾斯汀在完全不同的部门工作。

original: Stefanic: He was part of a team that managed packaging and freight.
translation: Stefanic: 他所在的团队负责包装和运输。

original: Stefanic: He had no business being [i]inside[/i] the refinery building.[p/] Much less the upper walkway.
translation: Stefanic: 他根本没理由在精炼厂建筑<u>里</u>。[p/]更别提上面的走道了。

original: That's strange,[p/] to say the least...
translation: 退一万步说，[p/]这也算是很奇怪了……

original: Tyrion: Was he the type of person to wander around places that he's not supposed to?
translation: Tyrion: 他是那种会在不<u>应该</u>去的地方闲逛的人吗？

original: Stefanic: No.[p/] Like I said before,[p/] he always followed my rules.
translation: Stefanic: 不是。[p/]就像我之前说的，[p/]他一直遵规守纪。

original: Stefanic: It all just makes this whole situation [i]that[/i] much more confusing.
translation: Stefanic: 这让整件事<u>更加</u>令人困惑。

original: Tyrion: Was there anyone around when the accident occurred?[p/] Did anyone see Justin fall?
translation: Tyrion: 事故发生时周围有人吗？[p/]有人看到贾斯汀掉下去吗？

original: Stefanic: There were many employees here at the time.
translation: Stefanic: 当时这里有很多员工。

original: Stefanic: But there were only a handful of witnesses who actually [i]saw[/i] Justin fall from the walkway.
translation: Stefanic: 但真正<u>看到</u>贾斯汀从走道上掉下去的目击者只有几个。

original: Tyrion: Who were these witnesses?
translation: Tyrion: 目击者都有谁？

original: Stefanic: If I remember correctly,[p/] Ms. Tudor was the one who saw him fall.
translation: Stefanic: 如果我没记错的话，[p/]都铎女士就是其中一位看到他掉下去的人。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/][s/] [i]Rika[/i] was there when it happened?
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/][s/]事故发生时<u>里卡</u>在现场？

original: Stefanic: Yes.[p/] She witnessed the accident alongside the harbourmaster.
translation: Stefanic: 是的。[p/]她和港务长一起目睹了这起事故。

original: Tyrion: Morrison...
translation: Tyrion: 莫里森……

original: Stefanic: Oh?[p/] You're acquainted with him?
translation: Stefanic: 噢……[p/]你认识他？

original: Tyrion: I-[p/]I am...
translation: Tyrion: 是、[p/]是的……

original: Morrison was close friends with your mother when you were a child.
translation: 莫里森在你小时候是母亲的好朋友。

original: But after you left Aurinax,[p/] you went out of your way to cut contact with everyone from your past.
translation: 但你在离开欧奥耐克斯后，[p/]特意和过去的所有人都断了联系。

original: Tyrion: But what were all of these people doing here in the first place?
translation: Tyrion: 但这些人一开始为什么会在这里呢？

original: Tyrion: Rika is a cafe owner,[p/] and Morrison is a harbourmaster.
translation: Tyrion: 里卡是咖啡馆老板，[p/]莫里森是港务长。

original: Stefanic: I'm a little concerned about that myself.
translation: Stefanic: 我自己也觉得有点奇怪。

original: Stefanic: I'm still unsure about Ms. Tudor,[p/] but the harbourmaster was accompanied by a nobleman of some sort.
translation: Stefanic: 我还不确定都铎女士为何在这，[p/]但港务长是和一个贵族一起来的。

original: Tyrion: ...A nobleman?
translation: Tyrion: ……贵族？

original: Stefanic: I'm not privy to the specifics.[p/] But apparently that nobleman had the legal authority to go wherever he wanted to.
translation: Stefanic: 我不知道具体细节。[p/]但显然那个贵族有法律权力进入任何地方。

original: Hm...[p/] You'll want to ask Morrison more about that.
translation: 嗯……[p/]你得多问问莫里森这件事。

original: But it [i]will[/i] be awkward to speak with him after all these years...
translation: 但过了这么多年再和他说话<u>会</u>很尴尬……

original: Tyrion: Would you happen to know anything about the blockade surrounding the city?
translation: Tyrion: 你知道什么封城的情况吗？

original: Stefanic: I know that the Kingsguard is involved,[p/] but that's about all I know.
translation: Stefanic: 我知道国王卫队介入了，[p/]但我就只知道这么点。

original: Stefanic: I [i]am[/i] a bit curious as to what's caused such a stir.
translation: Stefanic: 我<u>确实</u>有点好奇是什么引起了这么大骚动。

original: Stefanic: But I suppose I have more pressing matters to focus on right now.
translation: Stefanic: 但我想我现在有更紧迫的事情要关注。

original: Stefanic: I've heard a lot about you and Ruby Tymora through the grapevine.
translation: Stefanic: 我听说过很多你和鲁比·泰摩拉的事。

original: Stefanic: Ms. Tudor speaks very highly of you as well.
translation: Stefanic: 都铎女士对你评价也很高。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh.
translation: Tyrion: 噢、[p/]噢。

original: Stefanic: It puts my mind at ease to know I have your support.
translation: Stefanic: 知道有你的支持，我心安多了。

original: Tyrion: Rika mentioned that you gave her the capital to open her café.
translation: Tyrion: 里卡提到过是你给她资金开咖啡馆的。

original: Stefanic: After trying her food,[p/] I would be remiss not to.
translation: Stefanic: 尝过她的食物后，[p/]我不支持她就说不过去了。

original: Stefanic: I'm aware of how difficult it is for a commoner mage to succeed in our society.
translation: Stefanic: 我知道平民法师想取得成功有多难。

original: Tyrion: That's quite philanthropic of you...
translation: Tyrion: 你这么做真是太慷慨了……

original: Stefanic: Well,[p/] many other businessmen would show reluctance in dealing with a mage.
translation: Stefanic: 嗯，[p/]其他许多商人都很不情愿和法师打交道。

original: Stefanic: That makes them an untapped resource.
translation: Stefanic: 平民法师们也就成了一种未被充分利用的资源。

original: "Pragmatic" might be a better word to describe Stefanic...
translation: 用“务实”来形容斯蒂芬尼克可能更合适……

original: Stefanic: It's such a shame what happened to Justin.
translation: Stefanic: 贾斯汀身上发生这样的事真是太遗憾了。

original: Stefanic: I can't believe an accident like this happened under [i]my[/i] watch.
translation: Stefanic: 不敢相信在<u>我的</u>管理下会发生这样的事故。

original: He seems sincere.[p/] But you're still a little skeptical of him.
translation: 他看起来很真诚。[p/]但你对他还是有点怀疑。

original: Tyrion: Dracogen,[p/] have you ever heard of a criminal named the Eyetaker?
translation: Tyrion: 德拉科根，[p/]你是否听说过一个叫夺眼者的罪犯？

original: Stefanic: That name [i]does[/i] sound familiar,[p/] but I don't know much more than that.
translation: Stefanic: 这个名字<u>确实</u>有点耳熟，[p/]但我对此不怎么了解。

original: Stefanic: I try my best to avoid those sorts of people, you understand?
translation: Stefanic: 我尽量避免接触那种人，你能理解吧？

original: Stefanic: Perhaps someone else might know more about them.
translation: Stefanic: 也许其他人会更了解他们。

original: You [i]should[/i] notify Dracogen about the traces of [b]transmutation[/b] that you found.
translation: 你应该把发现的[b]形变术[/b]魔法痕迹告诉德拉科根。

original: But perhaps you should wait until you obtain more information, first.
translation: 但也许你应该先获取更多信息。

original: After all,[p/] knowing about a potential saboteur might unnecessarily stress him out.[p/] Even more so if you don't have more information.
translation: 毕竟，[p/]知道潜在破坏者的存在可能会给他不必要的压力。[p/]信息不足的情况下更是如此。

original: Tyrion: What do you think about [i]this[/i]?
translation: Tyrion: 你对<u>这个</u>有什么看法？

original: Stefanic: Sorry, Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] But I don't think I can tell you much about that.
translation: Stefanic: 很抱歉，卡斯伯特先生。[p/]我没有什么能说的。

original: You follow Rika's directions and move through the city's industrial district.
translation: 你按照里卡的指示穿过城市的工业区。

original: It reminds you of your childhood.[p/] Back when you couldn't control the Eye of Horus.
translation: 这让你想起了你的童年。[p/]那时你还无法控制荷鲁斯之眼。

original: You always avoided this part of the city.[p/] It was always covered with an overwhelming fog of misery and fatigue.
translation: 你总是避开城市的这个区域。[p/]这里一直笼罩在压抑的浓雾中，让人感到悲伤和疲惫。

original: However, you feel less of that now.
translation: 不过，你现在没有那么强烈的感觉了。

original: Is it because you have more control over your powers?[p/] Or has something else changed?
translation: 是因为你能更自如掌控力量了吗？[p/]还是有什么别的变化？

original: Celeste: Alright,[p/] we're here.
translation: Celeste: 好了，[p/]我们到了。

original: You arrive at the refinery and see that there aren't many people around.
translation: 你到达精炼厂，发现周围没几个人。

original: The few people you [i]do[/i] see appear to be from the City Watch.
translation: 你<u>看到</u>的那几个人似乎都是城市安保的。

original: Operations must have been halted after the accident.
translation: 事故发生后，精炼厂的运作肯定暂停了。

original: Celeste: Wow.[p/] So [i]this[/i] is an arcane refinery.
translation: Celeste: 哇。[p/]<u>这</u>就是一座奥术精炼厂。

original: Tyrion: I always saw this place as a child.[p/] But I never really understood what they do here.
translation: Tyrion: 我小时候经常看到这个地方。[p/]但我从来都不太明白这里到底是做什么的。

original: Celeste: Those machines refine the arcane crystals that are used in artificery.
translation: Celeste: 那些机器用于提炼供给奥术能源的奥术水晶。

original: Celeste: Those crystals are used as a power source for conducting magical energy.
translation: Celeste: 那些水晶被用作传导魔法能量的能源。

original: You look around and spot an especially frustrated individual.
translation: 你四处张望，注意到一个特别沮丧的人。

original: He seems to stand out from the knights and cleaning staff.
translation: 他看起来同骑士和清洁工格格不入。

original: Could [i]he[/i] be the guild master Rika spoke of?
translation: <u>他</u>就是里卡说的公会长吗？

original: Stefanic: …!
translation: Stefanic: ……！

original: He takes notice of you as you head further into the refinery.
translation: 当你往精炼厂内部走去时，他注意到了你。

original: Stefanic: Hello, there.[p/] You must be the attorney that Ms. Tudor spoke about.
translation: Stefanic: 你好呀。[p/]你一定就是都铎女士提到的律师。

original: Tyrion: I am.[p/] I take it that you're the guild master of the Dracogen Trading Company?
translation: Tyrion: 我是。[p/]我猜你就是德拉科根贸易公司的公会长？

original: Stefanic: Yes.[p/] My name is Stefanic Dracogen.[p/] I'm pleased to make your acquaintance.
translation: Stefanic: 是的。[p/]我叫斯蒂芬尼克·德拉科根。[p/]很高兴认识你。

original: Stefanic: I really appreciate you lending your aid in this matter.
translation: Stefanic: 非常感谢你愿意在这件事上给予帮助。

original: Tyrion: I already told Rika this,[p/] but I've never tried a civil case before.
translation: Tyrion: 我已经跟里卡说过了，[p/]但我以前从来没打过民事官司。

original: Tyrion: I would need to learn more about what happened before I can decide whether or not I can represent you.
translation: Tyrion: 在我决定是否代理你前，我需要了解一下发生了什么。

original: Tyrion: I'm honestly not sure how much help I can be.
translation: Tyrion: 说实话，我不确定自己能帮上多大忙。

original: Stefanic: Well…[p/] there isn't a single attorney in Aurinax that [i]will[/i] represent me.
translation: Stefanic: 嗯……[p/]在欧奥耐克斯，没有任何律师<u>愿意</u>为我辩护。

original: Stefanic: So,[p/] I'll accept whatever help I can get.
translation: Stefanic: 所以，[p/]我会接受我能得到的任何帮助。

original: Celeste was right.[p/] All of the attorneys are too afraid to stand against Lord von Sanctus.
translation: 塞莱斯特说得对，[p/]所有律师都十分害怕对抗冯·桑克图斯勋爵。

original: Celeste: Where [i]should[/i] we start, though?[p/] This case is probably different from the homicides that we're used to.
translation: Celeste: 但我们<u>应该</u>从哪儿开始呢？[p/]这个案子大概率和我们通常处理的谋杀案不同。

original: Tyrion: Homicide or not,[p/] the case revolves around a wrongful death.
translation: Tyrion: 不管是不是谋杀，[p/]这个案子都是非正常死亡事件。

original: Tyrion: If I [i]did[/i] represent Dracogen,[p/] I would need to prove that he wasn't at fault for the accident.
translation: Tyrion: 如果我<u>真的</u>代理德拉科根，[p/]就需要证明这起事故不是他的责任。

original: Tyrion: To do that,[p/] we should start by finding out exactly how and why the accident occurred.
translation: Tyrion: 为了做到这一点，[p/]我们应该先查清楚这起事故到底是怎么发生的，以及为什么会发生。

original: Tyrion: We should also question the witnesses who saw the victim when it happened.
translation: Tyrion: 我们还应该询问那些在事故发生时看到受害者的目击者。

original: Tyrion: And it wouldn't hurt to take a look at the scene of the accident, either.
translation: Tyrion: 我们去看看事故现场也没坏处。

original: The guild master would have a lot of knowledge about the refinery's operations.
translation: 公会长肯定对精炼厂的运作方式很了解。

original: Questioning him might also give you some insight into what happened.
translation: 你也许可以通过询问他来了解事件详情。

original: Stefanic: Hello, Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] I trust you're doing well.
translation: Stefanic: 你好，卡斯伯特先生。[p/]我相信你进展很顺利。

original: Tyrion: We are.
translation: Tyrion: 是的。

original: For the most part...
translation: 基本上是的……

original: Tyrion: We've spent some time looking into the accident and the people who knew Justin.
translation: Tyrion: 我们花了一些时间调查这起事故，询问那些了解贾斯汀的人。

original: Tyrion: ...I think there might be more to this case than meets the eye.
translation: Tyrion: ……我觉得这个案子可能没看上去那么简单。

original: Stefanic: Oh?
translation: Stefanic: 噢？

original: You spend some time explaining your findings to Dracogen.
translation: 你花了一些时间向德拉科根解释你的发现。

original: He seems troubled when you explain the traces of [b]transmutation[/b] that you found on the guard rail.
translation: 当你说到护栏上的[b]形变术[/b]魔法痕迹时，他显得很不安。

original: He's even more taken aback when you mention Justin's supposed plan to rob him.
translation: 你提到贾斯汀据说打算抢劫他时，他更是大吃一惊。

original: Stefanic: This is...[p/] [i]quite[/i] a lot to take in.
translation: Stefanic: 这……[p/]<u>相当</u>令人震惊。

original: Tyrion: Are you missing any valuables in your safe right now?
translation: Tyrion: 保险箱里的贵重物品有损失吗？

original: Stefanic: No,[p/] actually.[p/] But...
translation: Stefanic: 实际上，[p/]没有。[p/]但是……

original: Tyrion: What is it?
translation: Tyrion: 怎么了？

original: Stefanic: After the accident,[p/] I did a careful inspection of the building.
translation: Stefanic: 事故发生后，[p/]我仔细检查过这栋楼。

original: Stefanic: When I checked my office,[p/] I noticed that the lock on the safe was disengaged.
translation: Stefanic: 检查到我的办公室时，[p/]我发现保险箱的锁被解除了。

original: Tyrion: The safe was opened?[p/] But you said that there wasn't anything missing.
translation: Tyrion: 保险箱被打开了？[p/]但你说没有丢东西。

original: Stefanic: That's right.
translation: Stefanic: 对的。

original: Stefanic: When I saw the safe open like that,[p/] I was already worried that I'd been robbed.
translation: Stefanic: 发现保险箱处于解锁状态时，[p/]我已经在担心自己被抢了。

original: Stefanic: But I doubled checked the contents.[p/] [i]Everything[/i] was accounted for.
translation: Stefanic: 但我仔细检查过后。[p/]发现<u>所有东西</u>都在。

original: Stefanic: Because of that,[p/] I just assumed I'd forgotten to lock it.
translation: Stefanic: 正因如此，[p/]我以为是自己忘了上锁。

original: Tyrion: This doesn't make any sense.[p/] Maybe it was just a coincidence?
translation: Tyrion: 这说不通啊。[p/]也许这只是巧合？

original: Stefanic: I [i]might[/i] believe that if it weren't for where my office is located.
translation: Stefanic: 要不是因为办公室的位置，我<u>也许</u>会相信那是巧合。

original: Tyrion: What do you mean?
translation: Tyrion: 你的意思是？

original: Stefanic: The walkway that Justin fell from [i]leads[/i] to my office.
translation: Stefanic: 贾斯汀掉下去的走道<u>通向</u>我的办公室。

original: Stefanic: There's a window there that overlooks the refinery.
translation: Stefanic: 那里有一扇俯瞰精炼厂的窗户。

original: Tyrion: That [i]would[/i] explain why Justin was there in the first place.
translation: Tyrion: 这<u>就</u>解释了贾斯汀一开始为什么会在那里。

original: Stefanic: I don't want to suspect one of my employees,[p/] especially one that isn't alive to defend himself from such accusations.
translation: Stefanic: 我不想怀疑我的员工，[p/]尤其是已经去世无法自辩的员工。

original: Stefanic: But it just all fits too perfectly together.[p/] Except for one thing...
translation: Stefanic: 但这一切都过于巧合了。[p/]除了一件事……

original: Tyrion: Why wasn't anything stolen?
translation: Tyrion: 为什么什么东西都没有被偷？

original: Tyrion: ...Well, regardless.[p/] I think you have a pretty good case.
translation: Tyrion: ……哎，不管怎样，[p/]我觉得这个案子很有希望。

original: Stefanic: So,[p/] does this mean you'll represent me?
translation: Stefanic: 所以，[p/]你会为我出庭辩护吗？

original: Tyrion: ...After what I've discovered,[p/] I won't just stand by and let von Sanctus have his way.
translation: Tyrion: ……调查取证后，[p/]我不会袖手旁观让冯·桑克图斯得逞的。

original: Stefanic: Well spoken.[p/] I'm glad to have you on my side, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Stefanic: 说得好。[p/]很高兴你站在我这一边，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] regardless of why,[p/] someone clearly magically tampered with the site of the accident.
translation: Tyrion: 无论如何，[p/]不管什么原因，[p/]很明显有人用魔法对事故现场动过手脚。

original: Tyrion: I doubt the court will find you at fault for what happened.
translation: Tyrion: 我不觉得法庭会判你对发生的事负责。

original: Tyrion: Although...
translation: Tyrion: 尽管……

original: Stefanic: What's wrong?
translation: Stefanic: 怎么了？

original: Tyrion: Civil cases are a lot less strict than criminal cases.
translation: Tyrion: 民事案件比刑事案件宽松得多。

original: Tyrion: If we present evidence suggesting foul play using magic...
translation: Tyrion: 如果我们能举证表明有人用魔法搞鬼……

original: Celeste: They'll treat this exactly like our other cases...
translation: Celeste: 他们就会用对待刑事案件的方法……

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] They might stall the trial until they find out what exactly happened.
translation: Tyrion: 是的……[p/]他们可能会在查清楚来龙去脉之前暂停审理。

original: Tyrion: For this "accident",[p/] all we have to go on is witness accounts.
translation: Tyrion: 对于这起“事故”，[p/]我们目前的线索只有目击证词。

original: Tyrion: Finding concrete evidence of what happened could very well be impossible.
translation: Tyrion: 找到能揭示真相的确凿证据很可能难如登天。

original: But, the idea of hunting down the mage responsible sounds [i]very[/i] tempting.
translation: 但，寻找肇事法师听起来<u>非常</u>值得一试。

original: Stefanic: It looks like you have your work cut out for you.
translation: Stefanic: 看来你已经有行动计划了。

original: Stefanic: I just hope things turn out okay in the end.
translation: Stefanic: 我只希望最终结果是好的。

original: And with von Sanctus on the other side of this,[p/] who knows what might happen?
translation: 你的对手可是冯·桑克图斯，[p/]谁知道会发生什么呢？

original: It'd be best to keep your wits about you.
translation: 最好保持头脑清醒。

original: Aria: I can't believe this.[p/] I have more important things to do than resolve your petty squabbles for you.
translation: Aria: 难以置信。[p/]比起帮你解决这些小打小闹，我还有更重要的事情要做。

original: Lloyd: Yes,[p/] yes.[p/] The missing ship of your betrothed.
translation: Lloyd: 是的，[p/]是的。[p/]你更关心夫婿丢的那艘船。

original: Lloyd: Listen,[p/] the sooner you help me resolve this mess with Dracogen,[p/] the sooner [i]you[/i] can return to being the prince's lapdog.
translation: Lloyd: 听着，[p/]你越早帮我解决德拉科根的麻烦，[p/]就能越早回去当王子的哈巴狗。

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Lloyd: T-[p/]That [i]is[/i] to say...
translation: Lloyd: 也、[p/]也<u>就是</u>说……

original: Lloyd: Once I'm not preoccupied with this case,[p/] House von Sanctus can provide the resources that you [i]and[/i] the Inquisition need.
translation: Lloyd: 只要我不用再为这个案子操心，[p/]冯·桑克图斯家族就能给你<u>和</u>裁判所提供所需资源。

original: Aria: *sigh*[p/] I suppose I don't have a choice, do I?
translation: Aria: *叹气* [p/]看来我别无选择。

original: Aria: Well,[p/] at least [i]this[/i] case should be relatively straightforward.
translation: Aria: 嗯，[p/]至少<u>这个</u>案子应该比较直观。

original: Tyrion: It's the walkway that Justin fell from.
translation: Tyrion: 这就是贾斯汀跌落的走道。

original: Tyrion: According to Dracogen,[p/] this walkway also leads to his office.
translation: Tyrion: 据德拉科根所说，[p/]这条走道还通往他的办公室。

original: Tyrion: A set of stairs lead up to the walkway that Justin fell from.
translation: Tyrion: 这段楼梯通往贾斯汀掉下去的走道。

original: Tyrion: Rika supposedly saw Justin here on the night of the accident.
translation: Tyrion: 里卡作证说，事故发生当晚看到贾斯汀在这里。

original: Tyrion: The chemicals in these vats are infused with extremely volatile magic.
translation: Tyrion: 这些桶里的化学品含有腐蚀性极强的魔法。

original: Tyrion: ...This magic is volatile enough to dissolve at least one human body.
translation: Tyrion: ……这种魔法腐蚀性强到足以溶解一具尸体。

original: They might have even dissolved [i]two[/i] bodies.
translation: 甚至可能已经溶解了<u>两具</u>尸体。

original: Tyrion: It's a power box with artificery hardware inside of it.
translation: Tyrion: 一个装有奥术能源硬件的动力箱。

original: Tyrion: Apparently,[p/] it controls the power to the various machines in the refinery.
translation: Tyrion: 看起来，[p/]它控制着精炼厂各种机器的动力。

original: Celeste: There are traces of [b]transmutation[/b] magic on this power box.
translation: Celeste: 这个动力箱上有[b]形变术[/b]魔法的痕迹。

original: Tyrion: Now that we know that someone sabotaged the guard rail...[p/] I'm a little suspicious of every trace of magic here.
translation: Tyrion: 知道有人对护栏动了手脚之后……[p/]这里的每一处魔法痕迹都让我有点怀疑。

original: Tyrion: But this [i]is[/i] an artificery device,[p/] so a trace of magic on it is to be expected.
translation: Tyrion: 但这<u>是</u>一个奥术能源装置，[p/]上面有魔法痕迹也很正常。

original: Celeste: There are traces of [b]transmutation[/b] magic on these parts of the vat.
translation: Celeste: 桶的这些部位有[b]形变术[/b]魔法的痕迹。

original: You take a closer look at the part of the vat that the traces are on.
translation: 你仔细看了看有痕迹的部位。

original: Sure enough,[p/] there are small flecks of rust on them.
translation: 果然，[p/]上面有小片的锈迹。

original: Was someone trying to sabotage parts of the refinery?
translation: 是因为有人试图破坏精炼厂的部分设施吗？

original: Tyrion: Now that we know that someone sabotaged the guard rail...[p/] I'm a little suspicious of every trace of magic here.
translation: Tyrion: 知道有人对护栏动了手脚之后……[p/]这里的每一处魔法痕迹都让我有点怀疑。

original: Tyrion: But this refines magical materials,[p/] so a trace of magic on it is to be expected.
translation: Tyrion: 但这个装置是用于提炼魔法材料的，[p/]上面有魔法痕迹也很正常。

original: But the shape of the trace is strange, isn't it?
translation: 但痕迹的形状很奇怪，不是吗？

original: Stefanic: I'm quite pleased with your work during the trial.
translation: Stefanic: 你在审理过程中的表现让我很满意。

original: Stefanic: I'm glad I put my trust in you.
translation: Stefanic: 很高兴我选择信任你。

original: Tyrion: Thank you...[p/] But we're still a [i]long[/i] way from getting your case dismissed.
translation: Tyrion: 谢谢……[p/]但我们距离撤销指控还有<u>很长</u>的路要走。

original: Tyrion: And showing the possibility of a murder definitely made things much more complicated...
translation: Tyrion: 谋杀可能性的出现肯定让事情更加复杂了……

original: Stefanic: I see no reason to blame yourself.[p/] You merely played the cards that you were dealt.
translation: Stefanic: 没必要自责，[p/]你只是打出了自己手里的牌。

original: Stefanic: Honestly,[p/] I'm [i]still[/i] trying to make sense of what happened.
translation: Stefanic: 说实话，[p/]我<u>还在</u>努力弄明白发生了什么。

original: Celeste: Do you have any idea who the second victim might be?
translation: Celeste: 你知道第二个受害者可能是谁吗？

original: Stefanic: I have no idea.
translation: Stefanic: 我一点头绪都没有。

original: Stefanic: But all of my other employees are accounted for.[p/] I doubt that it was anyone who worked for me.
translation: Stefanic: 但我手下的其他员工都联系到了。[p/]我不觉得会是其中之一遇害。

original: But then who was it?
translation: 那会是谁呢？

original: Stefanic: To be perfectly honest,[p/] I'm a little concerned with how many unauthorized people were there that day.
translation: Stefanic: 老实说，[p/]那天未经许可进入精炼厂的人多到让我不安。

original: He has a point.[p/] It seems strange that Justin, Rika, [i]and[/i] Morrison were all there.
translation: 他说得有道理。[p/]贾斯汀、里卡<u>和</u>莫里森都在那里，这确实有点奇怪。

original: Tyrion: Dracogen.[p/] We spoke with the Inquisition about what they found in the vat.
translation: Tyrion: 德拉科根，[p/]我们向裁判所问了桶里的遗留物。

original: Tyrion: And they could only find bone matter belonging to Justin.
translation: Tyrion: 他们在里面找到的碎骨都是贾斯汀的。

original: Tyrion: Well [i]that[/i],[p/] and several metallic shards.
translation: Tyrion: 除<u>此</u>之外，[p/]还有一些金属碎片。

original: Stefanic: ...What?[p/] That can't be right...
translation: Stefanic: ……什么？[p/]这不可能……

original: Tyrion: I know...[p/] I was hoping to find some hard evidence to prove my theory.
translation: Tyrion: 我知道……[p/]我本来也希望能有确凿证据证明我的理论。

original: Tyrion: I'll have to find another approach to prove it.
translation: Tyrion: 现在我得找其他方法了。

original: Stefanic: No.[p/] That's not what I meant.
translation: Stefanic: 不。[p/]我不是这个意思。

original: Stefanic: There shouldn't be [i]any[/i] solid matter in those vats.
translation: Stefanic: 桶里面不应该有<u>任何</u>固体物质。

original: Tyrion: Are you talking about the metallic shards?[p/] I just assumed that those were some kind of magical by-product.
translation: Tyrion: 你是在说那些金属碎片吗？[p/]我本以为那些是某种魔法副产品。

original: Stefanic: No.[p/] The refinement process requires that everything in that vat remains a liquid.
translation: Stefanic: 不是。[p/]提炼过程要求桶里的所有东西都保持液态。

original: Stefanic: Solid matter would absorb the liquid's magical properties and taint the entire batch.
translation: Stefanic: 固体物质会吸收液体的魔法特性，污染整批产品。

original: Celeste: So those metal shards weren't [i]supposed[/i] to be in there.
translation: Celeste: 那些金属碎片根本不<u>应该</u>出现。

original: Celeste: Do you think they came from the broken pieces of the railing?
translation: Celeste: 这些会不会是护栏的碎片？

original: Tyrion: Possibly...[p/] We'll probably want to double-check with the commander to make sure.
translation: Tyrion: 有可能……[p/]我们最好再和指挥官确认一下。

original: ...But this is definitely strange.
translation: ……但这确实很奇怪。

original: You'll need to take a moment to work through all of this.
translation: 你需要花点时间梳理这些事情。

original: Tyrion: Would you happen to know anything about the blockade surrounding the city?
translation: Tyrion: 你知道什么封城的情况吗？

original: Stefanic: I know that the Kingsguard is involved,[p/] but that's about all I know.
translation: Stefanic: 我知道国王卫队介入了，[p/]但我就只知道这么点。
