original: Stefanic: I [i]am[/i] a bit curious as to what's caused such a stir.
translation: Stefanic: 我<u>确实</u>有点好奇是什么引起了这么大骚动。

original: Stefanic: But I suppose I have more pressing matters to focus on right now.
translation: Stefanic: 但我想我现在有更紧迫的事情要关注。

original: Stefanic: I'm quite pleased with your work during the trial.
translation: Stefanic: 你在审理过程中的表现让我很满意。

original: Stefanic: I'm glad I put my trust in you.
translation: Stefanic: 很高兴我选择信任你。

original: Tyrion: Thank you...[p/] But we're still a [i]long[/i] way from getting your case dismissed.
translation: Tyrion: 谢谢……[p/]但我们距离撤销指控还有<u>很长</u>的路要走。

original: Tyrion: Introducing the possibility of a murder definitely made things much more complicated...
translation: Tyrion: 谋杀可能性的出现肯定让事情更加复杂了……

original: Stefanic: I see no reason to blame you for playing the cards that you were dealt.
translation: Stefanic: 没必要自责，你只是打出了自己手里的牌。

original: Stefanic: Honestly,[p/] I'm [i]still[/i] trying to make sense of the evidence you found.
translation: Stefanic: 说实话，[p/]我<u>还在</u>努力理清楚你发现的证据。

original: Tyrion: Rika mentioned that you gave her the capital to open her café.
translation: Tyrion: 里卡提到过是你给她资金开咖啡馆的。

original: Stefanic: After trying her food,[p/] I would be remiss not to.
translation: Stefanic: 尝过她的食物后，[p/]我不支持她就说不过去了。

original: Stefanic: I'm aware of how difficult it is for a commoner mage to succeed in our society.
translation: Stefanic: 我知道平民法师想取得成功有多难。

original: Tyrion: That's quite philanthropic of you...
translation: Tyrion: 你这么做真是太慷慨了……

original: Stefanic: Well,[p/] many other businessmen would show reluctance in dealing with a mage.
translation: Stefanic: 嗯，[p/]其他许多商人都很不情愿和法师打交道。

original: Stefanic: That makes them an untapped resource.
translation: Stefanic: 平民法师们也就成了一种未被充分利用的资源。

original: "Pragmatic" might be a better word to describe him...
translation: 用“务实”来形容他可能更合适……

original: Stefanic: I could barely believe it when I heard that one of my employees died in an accident.
translation: Stefanic: 听说我的员工之一因事故丧生时，我已经感到难以置信了。

original: Stefanic: ...But now you're saying that they might have been [i]murdered[/i]?
translation: Stefanic: ……现在你又说他可能是<u>被谋杀的</u>？

original: Tyrion: It's quite the mystery, to be sure.
translation: Tyrion: 老实说，这还是个谜团。

original: ...Hopefully,[p/] it's one that you're able to solve.
translation: ……希望这是个你能解决的谜团。

original: Stefanic: I've certainly heard stories about them...
translation: Stefanic: 我绝对听说过他们的事……

original: Stefanic: But I never would have imagined that Justin was involved with such an individual.
translation: Stefanic: 但我做梦也没想到贾斯汀会和这种人有牵连。

original: Tyrion: What do you think about [i]this[/i]?
translation: Tyrion: 你对<u>这个</u>有什么看法？

original: Stefanic: Sorry, Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] But I don't think I can tell you much about that.
translation: Stefanic: 很抱歉，卡斯伯特先生。[p/]我没有什么能说的。

original: Stefanic: Hello again, Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] I hope you have good news.
translation: Stefanic: 又见面了，卡斯伯特先生。[p/]希望你带来了好消息。

original: Tyrion: Well,[p/] actually...
translation: Tyrion: 嗯，[p/]实际上……

original: You take some time to explain to Dracogen what you found during your investigation.
translation: 你花了一些时间向德拉科根解释你在调查中的发现。

original: You're still uncertain about the identity of the second victim.
translation: 你还不确定第二名受害者的身份。

original: That metal shard with the von Sanctus crest is your best lead right now.
translation: 刻有冯·桑克图斯家纹章的金属碎片是你目前最好的线索。

original: Stefanic: I see...
translation: Stefanic: 我知道了……

original: Tyrion: With that said,[p/] do you have any tools that you've purchased from Von Sanctus Industries?
translation: Tyrion: 说道这里，[p/]你有没有从冯·桑克图斯工业购买任何工具？

original: Stefanic: I do.[p/] He personally sold me quite a few when I first arrived in the city.
translation: Stefanic: 有。[p/]我刚到这座城市时，他私下卖给我不少。

original: Stefanic: I even purchased the security system for the Refinery Building from him.
translation: Stefanic: 精炼厂的安保系统都是我从他那儿买的。

original: Tyrion: Really?[p/] Did you purchase anything else from him?
translation: Tyrion: 真的吗？[p/]你还从他那里买了别的东西吗？

original: Stefanic: Well, he also tried to sell me some of those "Arcane Constructs".
translation: Stefanic: 哎，他也给我推销过那些“奥术构造体”。

original: Stefanic: He told me I could be the "first person in Aurinax to own such innovative technology".
translation: Stefanic: 他告诉我，我可以成为“欧奥耐克斯第一位拥有如此先进科技的人”。

original: Stefanic: ...But I turned him down.
translation: Stefanic: ……但我拒绝了他。

original: Celeste: Really?[p/] But they seem so useful.
translation: Celeste: 真的吗？[p/]但它们看起来很有用。

original: Stefanic: I don't feel comfortable trusting machines to handle the work here.
translation: Stefanic: 我不敢把厂里的工作交给机器。

original: Stefanic: Those constructs require very specific instructions.[p/] And they lack common sense.
translation: Stefanic: 那些构造体需要非常精确的指令，[p/]还缺少常识。

original: Tyrion: That's true.[p/] We saw how unreliable they could be during the Nightgrave case.
translation: Tyrion: 确实。[p/]奈特格雷夫一案证实了它们有多不可靠。

original: Stefanic: He heavily emphasized how exclusive this deal would be for me.
translation: Stefanic: 他特别强调这是我专属的交易。

original: Stefanic: Looking back on it,[p/] he was probably trying to make me dependent on his services.
translation: Stefanic: 回想起来，[p/]他大概是想让我依赖于他的服务。

original: Celeste: Yeah.[p/] I guess you made the right choice by refusing his offer.
translation: Celeste: 是的。[p/]拒绝他的提议是正确的选择。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] have any of the tools from Von Sanctus Industries been reported missing?
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]有任何冯·桑克图斯的工具被报丢失吗？

original: Stefanic: The [i]Inquisition[/i] actually asked me the same question.[p/] So I took some time today to check my inventory.
translation: Stefanic: <u>裁判所</u>其实也问了这个问题。[p/]我就花了些时间去检查库存。

original: Why would the Inquisition ask him for that?[p/] Did Steelwind come to the same conclusion that you did?
translation: 裁判所为什么要问他这一点？[p/]斯蒂尔文德也得出了相同结论吗？

original: Stefanic: There was [i]one[/i] tool that was unaccounted for.
translation: Stefanic: 确实有<u>一个</u>工具找不到了。

original: Tyrion: Really?[p/] What kind of tool was it?
translation: Tyrion: 真的吗？[p/]是什么样的工具？

original: Stefanic: A Rod of Mending.[p/] It's a large tool that we use to repair damage on the machines.
translation: Stefanic: 是一根修复之杖，[p/]一种大型工具，用来修复机器上的损伤。

original: Tyrion: A tool for repairs?[p/] How large was it?
translation: Tyrion: 用于修复的工具？[p/]它有多大？

original: Stefanic: Quite large, actually.
translation: Stefanic: 实际上，非常大。

original: Stefanic: It's called a "rod", but it's more of a large cylindrical tool.
translation: Stefanic: 它叫“杖”，但其实更像是一个大型圆柱体。

original: Stefanic: It requires two people to properly carry and use it.
translation: Stefanic: 需要两个人才能搬运使用。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: Wait...[p/] A repair tool like that would use [b]transmutation[/b] magic, right?
translation: Celeste: 等等……[p/]这是一种使用[b]形变术[/b]魔法的修复工具，对吧？

original: Tyrion: ...!
translation: Tyrion: ……！

original: Tyrion: That's right!
translation: Tyrion: 这就对了！

original: Celeste: What if the [i]Rod of Mending[/i] was the thing that weakened the guard rail?!
translation: Celeste: 假如是<u>修复之杖</u>破坏了护栏呢？！

original: Tyrion: Is that possible, Dracogen?
translation: Tyrion: 有可能吗，德拉科根？

original: Stefanic: I suppose that [i]is[/i] possible.
translation: Stefanic: 我想那<u>是</u>有可能的。

original: Stefanic: Now that you mention it,[p/] I recall there being a way to reverse its effects.
translation: Stefanic: 你这么一说，[p/]我想起来有一种方法可以逆转它的效果。

original: You never even considered that the [b]transmutation[/b] traces were left by an artificery tool.
translation: 你从没想过那些[b]形变术[/b]的痕迹是奥术能源工具留下的。

original: That [i]does[/i] lift some suspicion off of Aster...
translation: 这<u>确实</u>让阿斯特的嫌疑减轻了一些……

original: Celeste: Someone could have sabotaged the rail with the rod...
translation: Celeste: 有人可能用修复之杖破坏了护栏……

original: Celeste: And they might have thrown it into the vat to cover their tracks...
translation: Celeste: 凶手也可能把修复之杖扔进桶里，借此掩盖行踪……

original: Tyrion: ...But it didn't completely dissolve.
translation: Tyrion: ……但它没有完全溶解。

original: Tyrion: That would mean that they threw the rod in close to when Justin fell off of the walkway.
translation: Tyrion: 也就意味着修复之杖被扔进去的时间，与贾斯汀从走道上坠落的时间很接近。

original: Tyrion: It can't be a coincidence that these two events happened so close to each other.
translation: Tyrion: 这两件事发生得如此接近，不可能是巧合。

original: Celeste: ...And we still have no idea who actually broke the guard rail.
translation: Celeste: ……我们仍然不知道到底是谁破坏了护栏。

original: Celeste: We didn't find a second body in the vat.[p/] And we don't have evidence that proves a second victim even exists.
translation: Celeste: 我们在桶里没找到第二具尸体，[p/]也没有证据能证明存在第二个受害者。

original: Stefanic: I feel as if we have more questions than answers at the moment...
translation: Stefanic: 感觉我们现在的问题比答案还多……

original: Tyrion: We've learned a few new facts about the case, though.
translation: Tyrion: 不过我们也确实获得了新的情报。

original: Tyrion: And the Inquisition has verified the traces of [b]transmutation[/b] on the guard rail.
translation: Tyrion: 裁判所已经证实护栏上有[b]形变术[/b]的痕迹。

original: Tyrion: The burden of proof is still on the prosecution to prove that Dracogen is at fault.
translation: Tyrion: 检方依然需要证明德拉科根有过错。

original: Tyrion: Even if Steelwind has a proper explanation for that,[p/] I can counter her with the facts we've learned thus far.
translation: Tyrion: 即使斯蒂尔文德对此有合理的解释，[p/]我也可以用迄今为止获得的情报来反驳她。

original: Stefanic: *sigh*[p/] I just hope that the trial goes as smoothly as you're describing.
translation: Stefanic: *叹气* [p/]我只希望审理能像你说的那样顺利进行。

original: It rarely ever does...[p/] But knowing that would just needlessly stress him out.
translation: 审理罕有顺利的时候……[p/]但知道这一点只会给他不必要的压力。

original: Stefanic: Regardless,[p/] I appreciate the work that you've done thus far.
translation: Stefanic: 不管怎样，[p/]我都很感谢你们迄今为止所做的工作。

original: Stefanic: I'll leave things in your very capable hands.
translation: Stefanic: 接下来的事情就交给你们了。

original: You just hope that you don't encounter any more curve balls tomorrow...
translation: 你只希望明天不要再遇到什么意外情况……

original: You arrive at the refinery and see that several knights from the Inquisition have already arrived.
translation: 你到达精炼厂，看到几名裁判所的骑士已经到了。

original: Orym: ...
translation: Orym: ……

original: You glance at the damaged walkway and see Commander White there with a few of his knights.
translation: 你瞥了一眼损坏的走道，看到怀特指挥官和几名骑士在那里。

original: He seems to notice you too.[p/] But he only pays you a passing glance.
translation: 他似乎也注意到了你。[p/]但他只是匆匆看了你一眼。

original: Stefanic: Oh, Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] I've been waiting for you.
translation: Stefanic: 噢，卡斯伯特先生。[p/]我一直在等你。

original: Stefanic: For quite a while,[p/] may I add.
translation: Stefanic: 如果能说的话，[p/]等了有一会儿了。

original: Tyrion: R-[p/]Right...[p/] Sorry about that...
translation: Tyrion: 这、[p/]这样啊……[p/]很抱歉……

original: Stefanic: I suppose you have your reasons.[p/] And you've more than proven yourself worthy of my trust.
translation: Stefanic: 我想你肯定有你的理由。[p/]你也充分证明了自己值得信任。

original: Stefanic: Although...
translation: Stefanic: 尽管……

original: Dracogen gives Aster a suspicious side glance.[p/] He appears to have come to the same conclusion that you did.
translation: 德拉科根怀疑地斜了阿斯特一眼。[p/]看起来他得出了和你一样的结论。

original: Stefanic: Well,[p/] you've given me little reason to doubt your judgment.
translation: Stefanic: 嗯，[p/]我没理由怀疑你的判断。

original: Stefanic: I will leave the investigation in your capable hands.
translation: Stefanic: 接下来的调查就拜托你了。

original: Celeste: Speaking of the investigation,[p/] where should we start first?
translation: Celeste: 说到调查，[p/]我们应该从哪里开始呢？

original: Tyrion: Now that we've gotten the Inquisition involved,[p/] we might be able to learn more about the magical traces at the crime scene.
translation: Tyrion: 既然已经有裁判所介入了，[p/]犯罪现场的魔法痕迹也会有更详细的情报。

original: You look at Commander White,[p/] who is inspecting the walkway.
translation: 你看向正在检查走道的怀特指挥官。

original: He's probably your best bet for getting more information about the investigation.
translation: 他大概是获取更多搜查情报的最佳人选。

original: Tyrion: From what Dracogen said,[p/] there shouldn't have been [i]any[/i] solid matter in those vats.
translation: Tyrion: 从德拉科根的话来看，[p/]那些桶里本不该有<u>任何</u>固体物质。

original: Tyrion: We've already confirmed that the bone matter they found came from Justin's body.
translation: Tyrion: 我们已经确认了桶里的碎骨来自贾斯汀。

original: Tyrion: But that leaves another question...
translation: Tyrion: 但这样就有另一个问题……

original: Tyrion: Where did those metallic shards come from?
translation: Tyrion: 那些金属碎片是哪来的？

original: No...[p/] The metallic shards weren't supposed to be in that vat.
translation: 不……[p/]金属碎片不应该出现在桶里。

original: So they [i]had[/i] to have come from somewhere...
translation: 它们<u>一定</u>来自什么地方……

original: Tyrion: A metal object was thrown into the vat.
translation: Tyrion: 有金属物品被扔进了桶里。

original: Celeste: Yeah,[p/] I guess that makes sense.
translation: Celeste: 是，[p/]我想这样说得通。

original: Celeste: Whatever that object was,[p/] it probably dissolved into the shards that Orym found.
translation: Celeste: 不管那是什么物体，[p/]它多半被溶解成了奥蒙找到的金属碎片。

original: Tyrion: That's the thing though.
translation: Tyrion: 可问题就在这儿。

original: Tyrion: The magical liquid in the vat was extremely volatile.
translation: Tyrion: 桶里的魔法液体腐蚀性极强。

original: Tyrion: It was destructive enough to reduce an entire human body to a few shards of bone.
translation: Tyrion: 它破坏力极强，足以把整个人体化为几片碎骨。

original: No...[p/] The magic in that liquid was strong enough to dissolve a human body in a matter of minutes.
translation: 不……[p/]那液体中的魔力强大到能在几分钟内溶解人体。

original: If that metal object had fallen in beforehand,[p/] [i]something[i/] should have happened to it.
translation: 如果金属物体在此之前掉进去了，[p/]它应该会发生<u>某种变化</u>。

original: Tyrion: The object would have been completely destroyed.
translation: Tyrion: 金属物体应该会被摧毁。

original: Tyrion: We shouldn't have found [i]any[/i] metal shards in the first place.
translation: Tyrion: 我们本不该发现<u>任何</u>金属碎片。

original: Celeste: Right...[p/] But we [i]did[/i] find them.
translation: Celeste: 是……[p/]但我们<u>确实</u>发现了。

original: Celeste: How do you explain that?
translation: Celeste: 你怎么解释呢？

original: Tyrion: That night something happened that prevented the metal object from being fully destroyed.
translation: Tyrion: 那天晚上有什么阻止了金属物体被摧毁。

original: No...[p/] The magic in that liquid [i]was[/i] really powerful.
translation: 不……[p/]液体中的魔力<u>是</u>非常强大的。

original: But something happened recently that would have prevented it from destroying the metal object completely.
translation: 但很快发生了某事阻止金属物体被摧毁。

original: Tyrion: When Aster and Morrison reported the accident,[p/] the workers immediately neutralized the liquid's magic.
translation: Tyrion: 阿斯特和莫里森报告事故后，[p/]工人们立即中和了液体中的魔力。

original: Tyrion: They did this to attempt to save Justin.
translation: Tyrion: 他们这么做是为了尽力挽救贾斯汀。

original: Tyrion: But it would have also stopped the liquid from destroying anything else within the vat.
translation: Tyrion: 但这同时也阻止了液体继续摧毁桶内的其他东西。

original: Celeste: So [i]that's[/i] why we found those metal shards.
translation: Celeste: 所以<u>这就是</u>我们发现那些金属碎片的原因。

original: Tyrion: And whatever that metal object was,[p/] it was only partially destroyed.
translation: Tyrion: 不管那个金属物体是什么，[p/]都只是被部分破坏了。

original: Tyrion: This means that it fell into the vat around the time that Justin fell into the vat.
translation: Tyrion: 这意味着金属物体几乎是和贾斯汀同时掉进桶里。

original: Tyrion: If it fell a while before the accident,[p/] it would have dissolved completely.
translation: Tyrion: 如果是在事故发生很久前掉进去的，[p/]它应该会完全溶解掉。

original: Tyrion: And if it fell after the accident,[p/] it wouldn't have dissolved at all.
translation: Tyrion: 如果是在事故发生后掉进去的，[p/]它根本就不会溶解。

original: Tyrion: Furthermore,[p/] whatever that object was,[p/] it was probably as large as Justin.
translation: Tyrion: 而且，[p/]不管那个物体是什么，[p/]都很可能跟贾斯汀一样大。

original: Celeste: Do you think this metal object had something to do with the second victim?
translation: Celeste: 你觉得这个金属物体跟第二名受害者有关系吗？

original: Celeste: Maybe they were holding it when they fell in.
translation: Celeste: 也许受害者掉进去的时候正拿着它。

original: Tyrion: I'm not sure...[p/] But it's definitely possible.
translation: Tyrion: 我不确定……[p/]不过肯定有可能。

original: Tyrion: We should take a closer look at the metallic shards that Commander White found.
translation: Tyrion: 我们应该仔细看看怀特指挥官发现的那些金属碎片。

original: Tyrion: Those shards might help us identify the second victim.
translation: Tyrion: 那些碎片或许能帮我们确定第二名受害者的身份。

original: If that person even exists...
translation: 如果那个人真的存在……

original: Tyrion: A row of houses line the edge of the harbor.
translation: Tyrion: 一排房屋坐落在港口边缘。

original: Tyrion: When I was a kid,[p/] I always dreamed of saving up enough gold to buy my own house on the harbourfront...
translation: Tyrion: 小时候，[p/]我总是梦想着攒够金币，在港口边买套自己的房子……

original: Celeste: Well, you have a job as an attorney now.[p/] You can always move back here.
translation: Celeste: 你现在当律师了呀，[p/]随时可以搬回来嘛。

original: Tyrion: No...[p/] If possible,[p/] I never want to return to this city again.
translation: Tyrion: 不……[p/]如果可能的话，[p/]我再也不想回到这个城市了。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: It's a modest ship.[p/] It's probably used by local businesses to transport goods by sea.
translation: Tyrion: 一艘很普通的船，[p/]大概是当地商家用来在海上运输货物的。

original: Celeste: I can't help but feel nostalgic seeing these ships.
translation: Celeste: 这些船让我想起过去。

original: Celeste: I used to travel by sea all the time when I was traveling the world.
translation: Celeste: 我以前环游世界的时候经常坐船。

original: Celeste: It was probably my favorite part.
translation: Celeste: 大概是我旅行中最喜欢的环节。

original: Tyrion: Hm...[p/] That [i]does[/i] sound pretty nice.
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……[p/]那听起来<u>确实</u>不错。

original: Tyrion: I'd like to try riding one, one day.
translation: Tyrion: 哪天我也想试试坐船。

original: Celeste: Are you sure?[p/] You get motion sick pretty easily.
translation: Celeste: 你是认真的吗？[p/]你已经很容易晕车了。

original: Celeste: Sailing on a ship might kill you.
translation: Celeste: 坐船可能会要了你的命。

original: She has a point there.
translation: 她说得有道理。

original: Tyrion: There are several crates containing all kinds of goods.
translation: Tyrion: 装着各种货物的板条箱。

original: Tyrion: They must be the merchandise of the local businesses.
translation: Tyrion: 这肯定是当地商家的货物。

original: Tyrion: Dracogen told us that you witnessed the accident.
translation: Tyrion: 德拉科根告诉我们你目睹了那起事故。

original: Noah: Aye...[p/] It was a horrible thing what happened.
translation: Noah: 啊……[p/]发生的事情简直太恐怖了。

original: Noah: No one deserved what happened to that poor lad.
translation: Noah: 那个可怜的小伙不该遭遇这种事。

original: Celeste: Could you tell us what you saw?
translation: Celeste: 能告诉我们你看见了什么吗？

original: Noah: Well,[p/] I was showing a patron around town.
translation: Noah: 嗯，[p/]当时我正领着一位赞助人在城里逛。

original: Noah: And for some reason,[p/] he really wanted to take a look at the refinery.
translation: Noah: 出于某些原因，[p/]他很想参观一下精炼厂。

original: Noah: Something about checking out the local "art of fishery".
translation: Noah: 想看一看当地的“奥数冷鱼”。

original: He must mean "artificery".
translation: 他一定指的是“奥术能源”。

original: Noah: Anyways,[p/] he was looking at the machinery.
translation: Noah: 不管怎样，[p/]他当时正在看机器。

original: Noah: Then suddenly,[p/] Mosourika came running towards us.
translation: Noah: 突然间，[p/]莫苏里卡向我们跑来。

original: Noah: She was trying to tell us something.[p/] But the damn machines were too loud for us to hear her.
translation: Noah: 她当时想跟我们说些什么，[p/]但该死的机器太吵了，我们听不见。

original: Noah: After a while,[p/] she just pointed at the walkway.[p/] And we saw the horrible sight.
translation: Noah: 过了一会儿，[p/]她指向走道，[p/]然后我们就看到了那可怕的场景。

original: Noah: We saw someone fall into the vat.
translation: Noah: 我们看到有人掉进了桶里。

original: Noah: By the time we could get them to stop the machines.[p/] It was too late.
translation: Noah: 等到我们喊人把机器停下来的时候，[p/]已经太迟了。

original: That matches up with what you know so far.
translation: 这和你目前所知的相符。

original: But what was Rika even [i]doing[/i] there?
translation: 但是里卡在那里<u>做什么</u>呢？

original: She should have still been running the café at the time of the accident.
translation: 事故发生的时候她本应在经营咖啡馆。

original: And that "patron" who was visiting the factory.[p/] Did they also witness the accident?
translation: 还有那位正在参观精炼厂的“赞助人”。[p/]他也目睹了事故吗？

original: Tyrion: Could you tell us how Justin fell off of the walkway?
translation: Tyrion: 你能告诉我们贾斯汀是怎么掉下走道的吗？

original: Tyrion: Was it because the guard rail broke under his weight?
translation: Tyrion: 护栏断裂是因为他的体重吗？

original: Noah: Yeah, he did.[p/] But it [i]was[/i] a little strange.
translation: Noah: 是这样的。[p/]但这事<u>有点</u>奇怪。

original: Noah: That guard rail was made out of metal, yeah?
translation: Noah: 那个护栏是用金属制成，对吧？

original: Noah: But the way it broke...[p/] You would've thought that it was made out of cardboard.
translation: Noah: 但是它断裂的方式……[p/]就好像是用纸板做的。

original: Noah: He barely leaned on it,[p/] and it just broke apart.
translation: Noah: 他仅仅只是靠在上面，[p/]护栏就断开了。

original: Even a poorly maintained guard rail shouldn't have broken that easily.
translation: 即使是保养不善的护栏也不应该这么简单断裂。

original: Did someone really use [b]transmutation[/b] magic to sabotage it?
translation: 真的有人用[b]形变术[/b]魔法动了手脚吗？

original: If so,[p/] [i]that[/i] possibility could clear Dracogen's name.
translation: 如果是这样的话，[p/]<u>这一</u>可能性可以洗清德拉科根的嫌疑。

original: ...But presenting the possibility of a magical crime might just complicate things.
translation: ……但提出魔法犯罪的可能性或许只会让事情更复杂。

original: Tyrion: You mentioned that you were escorting a "patron" when the accident happened.
translation: Tyrion: 你说事件发生时你在护送一位“赞助人”。

original: Tyrion: Who was he?[p/] Did he witness the accident too?
translation: Tyrion: 他是谁？[p/]他也目睹了事故发生吗？

original: Noah: Aye.[p/] He was right there with me when Rika was trying to get our attention.
translation: Noah: 是的。[p/]里卡试图引起我们注意的时候，他就在我身边。

original: Noah: It'd be hard to miss it with the commotion she was making.
translation: Noah: 她闹得那么厉害，很难不注意到。

original: Noah: As for who he was...[p/] He said his name was "Aster".
translation: Noah: 至于他是谁……[p/]他说他的名字是“阿斯特”。

original: "Aster"...[p/] You don't know anyone by that name...
translation: “阿斯特”……[p/]你不认识任何叫这个名字的人……

original: But why does that name sound familiar?
translation: 但为什么这个名字听起来那么熟悉呢？

original: Tyrion: Do you know what his surname was?
translation: Tyrion: 你知道他的姓是什么吗？

original: Noah: No.[p/] The lad was really secretive with his last name for some reason.
translation: Noah: 不。[p/]他对自己的姓氏守口如瓶。

original: He must've had a recognizable name…[p/] Is he a noble from a well-known house?
translation: 他的姓氏一定很出名……[p/]他是个出身显赫的贵族吗？

original: Tyrion: Why were you escorting this "Aster" in the first place?[p/] Don't you have to manage the harbor?
translation: Tyrion: 为什么一开始你要护送这位“阿斯特”呢？[p/]难道你不需要管理港口吗？

original: Noah: Well, I can't really manage [i]anything[/i] 'cause of them.
translation: Noah: 唔，他们在的话我几乎<u>什么事</u>都管不了。

original: He gestures towards the Inquisition knights crowding the pier.
translation: 他指了指码头那边的裁判所骑士们。

original: Noah: They've blocked all sea travel out of the city 'till this mess is sorted out.
translation: Noah: 这个烂摊子解决之前，所有出城的海路都被封锁了。

original: Celeste: They have a lot of knights investigating the harbor.[p/] Do you know what they're looking for?
translation: Celeste: 有很多骑士在调查港口。[p/]你知道他们在找什么吗？

original: Noah: ...Well,[p/] you didn't hear this from me.
translation: Noah: ……好吧，[p/]别说是我告诉你的。

original: Noah: But according to them,[p/] Aster's ship just up and vanished in the dead of night.
translation: Noah: 但据他们所说，[p/]阿斯特的船在夜深人静的时候突然消失了。

original: Tyrion: "Vanished"?[p/] As in someone hijacked it?
translation: Tyrion: “消失”？[p/]意思是有人劫持了船？

original: Noah: That's the thing.[p/] The guards would have [i]noticed[/i] if someone had driven off with the ship.[p/] Especially one of that size.
translation: Noah: 问题就在这。[p/]如果船被人开走，卫兵肯定会<u>注意到</u>。[p/]更何况是那么大的船。

original: Noah: From what I heard,[p/] one of the guards could have sworn that they saw it vanish in a flash of light.
translation: Noah: 就我听说的，[p/]卫兵之一发誓说他看到船在一道闪光后消失。

original: Celeste: A flash of light...[p/] Like something created by a spell.
translation: Celeste: 闪光……[p/]听起来像是法术造成的现象。

original: Tyrion: What kind of ship was it?[p/] Do you know how big it was?
translation: Tyrion: 那是艘什么船？[p/]你知道船有多大吗？

original: Noah: From the size of it,[p/] I'd say that it was probably a galleon.
translation: Noah: 根据它的尺寸，[p/]我会猜是艘盖伦帆船。

original: A galleon?![p/] A spell of that scale would have to be pretty powerful to affect a ship of that size.
translation: 盖伦帆船？！[p/]能影响这种船的法术一定非常强力。

original: Celeste: I wonder who this "Aster" person is...
translation: Celeste: 我很好奇这个叫“阿斯特”的人到底是谁……

original: Celeste: He must be high profile if they're calling in the Kingsguard [i]and[/i] the Inquisition for him.
translation: Celeste: 如果国王卫队<u>和</u>裁判所会为他一齐出动，这人肯定地位不低。

original: All over a missing a ship...
translation: 就为了找一艘失踪的船……

original: Tyrion: You spent some time with him.[p/] Am I correct, Morrison?
translation: Tyrion: 你和他同行过一段时间。[p/]我说的对吗，莫里森？

original: Tyrion: Did he tell you where he was staying?
translation: Tyrion: 他有没有告诉你他住在哪？

original: Noah: If I remember right,[p/] he's staying at the local inn near the town square.
translation: Noah: 如果我没记错，[p/]他住在广场附近的一家旅馆里。

original: Celeste: Wait...[p/][s/] That's the tavern that [i]we[/i] were staying at!
translation: Celeste: 等等……[p/][s/]那不就是<u>我们</u>之前住过的旅馆！

original: Tyrion: If he's [i]this[/i] high profile,[p/] why is he staying at an inn for commoners?
translation: Tyrion: 如果他的地位<u>如此</u>高，[p/]为什么还要住在面向平民的旅馆里？

original: Noah: No idea.[p/] He's an eccentric one for sure.
translation: Noah: 不知道。[p/]他确实是个怪人。

original: Whoever he is,[p/] he also witnessed the accident.[p/] You'll definitely want to speak with him.
translation: 不管他是谁，[p/]都目击了事故发生的过程。[p/]你肯定得和他谈谈。

original: And if he's a noble,[p/] there's a chance that [i]he's[/i] the mage that sabotaged the guard rail...
translation: 而且如果他是贵族，[p/]那<u>他</u>有可能就是破坏护栏的法师……

original: Noah: Ah, I can still remember the days when you were just a small boy.
translation: Noah: 啊，我还记得你还是个小男孩的时候呢。

original: Noah: You've really grown up since then.
translation: Noah: 你现在真的长大了。

original: You had to.[p/] There was no other choice.
translation: 你必须长大。[p/]没有别的选择。

original: Noah: By the way,[p/] you haven't introduced me to your friend over here.
translation: Noah: 顺便提一下，[p/]你还没给我介绍那边的朋友呢。

original: Tyrion: Oh, right.
translation: Tyrion: 噢，是的。

original: Tyrion: Morrison,[p/] this is Celeste McCoy:[p/] my bodyguard.
translation: Tyrion: 莫里森，[p/]这位是塞莱斯特·麦考伊：[p/]我的贴身护卫。

original: Noah: Bodyguard, huh?[p/] When I first saw you two,[p/] I thought she was your-
translation: Noah: 贴身护卫，是吗？[p/]我第一次见到你俩的时候，[p/]还以为她是你的——

original: Tyrion: N-[p/][s/]No![p/] It's not like that.[p/] Our relationship is purely professional.
translation: Tyrion: 没、[p/][s/]没有！[p/]不是那样的，[p/]我们只是工作伙伴。

original: Celeste: "Professional"?[p/] How could you say that after we shared a room together?
translation: Celeste: “工作伙伴”？[p/]一起睡过一间房后你还能这么说？

original: Noah: ...
translation: Noah: ……

original: Tyrion: C-[p/]Can you not?
translation: Tyrion: 难、[p/]难道你不能吗？

original: Celeste: Sorry.[p/] You make it so easy sometimes.
translation: Celeste: 不好意思。[p/]你实在太好逗了。

original: Tyrion: Rika seems to be doing well.
translation: Tyrion: 里卡看起来状况不错。

original: Tyrion: Her café looks pretty busy.
translation: Tyrion: 她的咖啡馆看起来生意兴隆。

original: Noah: Aye.[p/] I'm happy to see you kids are making something of yourselves.
translation: Noah: 是。[p/]看到你们这些孩子有出息，我也很高兴。

original: Noah: With the way people treat mages,[p/] I was really worried for her future.
translation: Noah: 鉴于人们对法师的态度，[p/]我本来很担心她的未来。

original: Tyrion: The Dracogen Trading Company seems to have a large presence in Aurinax now.
translation: Tyrion: 德拉科根贸易公司在欧奥耐克斯似乎势力很大。

original: Noah: Aye.[p/] Ol' Dracogen just swooped in one day and took the city straight from von Sanctus' grip.
translation: Noah: 是的。[p/]老德拉科根有一天突然出现，从冯·桑克图斯手中夺走了这座城市。

original: Noah: Now, I can't think of a single business here that [i]isn't[/i] working with them.
translation: Noah: 现在，这里几乎没有企业<u>不</u>跟他们合作。

original: You wonder how Lord von Sanctus feels about that.
translation: 你琢磨着冯·桑克图斯勋爵对此会怎么想。

original: Noah: I hope this whole mess doesn't affect the Company's dealings here.
translation: Noah: 我希望这件事不会影响到公司在这里的生意。

original: Noah: He really breathes life into this town.
translation: Noah: 他真是给这个城市带来了生机。

original: Tyrion: Morrison,[p/] do you know about a criminal named "the Eyetaker"?
translation: Tyrion: 莫里森，[p/]你知道有个叫“夺眼者”的罪犯吗？

original: Noah: The Eyetaker?![p/][s/] W-[p/]where did you hear that name?!
translation: Noah: 夺眼者？！[p/][s/]你、[p/]你从哪儿听到这个名字的？！

original: Tyrion: So, you [i]do[/i] know about them.
translation: Tyrion: 所以你<u>确实</u>知道他。

original: Noah: Aye, [i/] I do.
translation: Noah: 是的。

original: Noah: I've learned to keep my distance from him over the years.
translation: Noah: 这些年来，我学会了跟他保持距离。

original: Noah: The Eyetaker is the criminal kingpin of this region.
translation: Noah: “夺眼者”是这一带的犯罪头目。

original: Noah: Every large criminal undertaking in this region happens under his watch.
translation: Noah: 这一带所有的大型犯罪活动都在他的掌控之下。

original: Tyrion: He's [i]that[/i] big of a deal?
translation: Tyrion: 他有<u>那么</u>厉害吗？

original: Noah: Of course, he is!
translation: Noah: 那当然！

original: Noah: More importantly,[p/] how did [i]you[/i] hear about him?!
translation: Noah: 更重要的是，[p/]<u>你</u>是怎么听说他的？！

original: Tyrion: From what I heard,[p/] Justin Waye owed him a huge debt.
translation: Tyrion: 我听说，[p/]贾斯汀·维耶欠了他一大笔债。

original: Noah: [i]Justin[/i] owed them?!
translation: Noah: <u>贾斯汀</u>欠他债？！

original: Noah: I knew he used to run around with a bunch of rogues,[p/] but I never imagined...
translation: Noah: 我知道他以前跟一帮流氓混在一起，[p/]但我从没想到……

original: Noah: By the Scaled Lord...
translation: Noah: 鳞甲领主在上……

original: Tyrion: The Eyetaker [i]might[/i] be involved in Justin's death.
translation: Tyrion: “夺眼者”<u>可能</u>跟贾斯汀的死有关。

original: Tyrion: Do you think someone like him could be behind this?
translation: Tyrion: 你觉得夺眼者会是幕后黑手吗？

original: Noah: Well...[p/] There's a saying we have about what happens when you get on his bad side...
translation: Noah: 呃……[p/]关于招惹他的下场，我们这儿有个说法……

original: Noah: Let's just say...[p/] He reminds you of why he has that name.
translation: Noah: 简单说吧……[p/]他会让你明白这个绰号怎么来的。

original: Tyrion: How do you feel about Lord von Sanctus?
translation: Tyrion: 你怎么看冯·桑克图斯勋爵？

original: Noah: Hah.[p/] You know the answer as well as I.
translation: Noah: 哈。[p/]你跟我一样清楚答案是什么。

original: Noah: I've got no love for that damn aristocrat.
translation: Noah: 我一点儿都不喜欢那个该死的贵族。

original: Noah: If we're lucky,[p/] ol' Dracogen will shoot down this civil suit and kick von Sanctus to the curb.
translation: Noah: 要是运气好，[p/]老德拉科根不会受民事诉讼影响，还能把冯·桑克图斯踢到一边去。

original: Tyrion: What can you tell us about this, Morrison?
translation: Tyrion: 你对这个有什么了解，莫里森？

original: Noah: Ah...[p/] Sorry.[p/] I don't know much about those sorts of things.
translation: Noah: 啊……[p/]对不起，[p/]我对这类事情不太了解。

original: Noah: You'd better ask someone else.
translation: Noah: 你最好问问其他人。

original: [character name=""][/character]You arrive at the harbour,[p/] in search of Morrison: the harbourmaster.
translation: 你来到港口，[p/]寻找港务长莫里森。

original: However,[p/] you notice a large concentration of knights in the shipping area.
translation: 然而，[p/]你注意到装运区聚集了大量骑士。

original: Notably,[p/] the Arcane Inquisition is among them.
translation: 值得注意的是，[p/]里面也有奥术裁判所的骑士。

original: You spot Commander White and Prosecutor Steelwind coordinating the knights there.
translation: 你看到怀特指挥官和斯蒂尔文德检察官正在那里指挥骑士们。

original: Celeste: I wonder what those two are doing here.
translation: Celeste: 我想知道他们俩在这做什么。

original: Tyrion: The knights at the blockade said that they were investigating something...
translation: Tyrion: 封锁线的骑士们说他们正在调查什么事……

original: Tyrion: There must be magic involved if the Inquisition is here.
translation: Tyrion: 既然裁判所来了，肯定跟魔法有关。

original: Celeste: ...Do you think this has anything to do with what happened to Justin?
translation: Celeste: ……你觉得这跟贾斯汀的事有关系吗？

original: Tyrion: I doubt it.[p/] We didn't see any Inquisition knights at the refinery.
translation: Tyrion: 我觉得没有。[p/]我们在精炼厂没有见到任何裁判所的骑士。

original: Tyrion: It must just be a coincidence.
translation: Tyrion: 这一定只是巧合。

original: Celeste: Hm...[p/] You're probably right.
translation: Celeste: 嗯……[p/]你大概是对的。

original: Celeste: But I'm kind of curious about what the Inquisition is investigating.
translation: Celeste: 但我有点好奇裁判所在调查的东西。

original: Tyrion: It has nothing to do with our case.
translation: Tyrion: 这跟我们的案子没关系。

original: Tyrion: It'd be best to leave them to their business.
translation: Tyrion: 最好别去打扰他们。

original: Celeste: Alright...
translation: Celeste: 好吧……

original: Noah: Oi,[p/] You there.
translation: Noah: 嘿，[p/]那边的家伙。

original: Noah: You'd best clear out.
translation: Noah: 你最好赶紧离开。

original: Noah: The knights have closed the harbor.
translation: Noah: 骑士们已经关闭港口了。

original: Tyrion: ...Morrison?
translation: Tyrion: ……莫里森？

original: Noah: ...Huh?[p/] Do I know you?
translation: Noah: ……啊？[p/]我认识你吗？

original: Noah: ...
translation: Noah: ……

original: Noah: Wait...[p/][s/] Cuthbert?![p/][s/] Is that you?!
translation: Noah: 等等……[p/][s/]卡斯伯特？！[p/][s/]是你吗？！

original: Tyrion: H-[p/]Hi...
translation: Tyrion: 你、[p/]你好……

original: Noah: I [i]heard[/i] from little Mosourika that you were back in town!
translation: Noah: 我从小莫苏里卡那儿<u>听说</u>你回城里了！

original: Noah: What can I do for you?
translation: Noah: 有什么我能帮忙的吗？

original: Tyrion: We heard that you were at the refinery yesterday.
translation: Tyrion: 我们听说你昨天在精炼厂。

original: Tyrion: From what we heard,[p/] you witnessed the accident.
translation: Tyrion: 据我们听说，[p/]你目睹了那起事故。

original: Tyrion: We wanted to ask you some questions about what you saw.
translation: Tyrion: 我们想问问你看到的情况。

original: Noah: Oh...[p/] right.[p/] Mosourika mentioned that you're an attorney now.
translation: Noah: 噢……[p/]好的。[p/]莫苏里卡提到你现在是名律师了。

original: Noah: ...
translation: Noah: ……

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Noah: I just hope you're still not hung up over that business with your mother.
translation: Noah: 我只是希望你不要再为母亲的事耿耿于怀。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Noah: S-[p/]Sorry...[p/] I guess it's none of my business.
translation: Noah: 对、[p/]对不起……[p/]是我多管闲事了。

original: Noah: A-[p/]Anyways,[p/] I'll tell you what I know.
translation: Noah: 总、[p/]总之，[p/]我会告诉你我知道的事情。

original: So, you know who the Eyetaker is now.
translation: 所以，你现在知道谁是夺眼者了。

original: It definitely adds another angle to this case.
translation: 这给此案提供了另一个角度。

original: But there are still some elements of this that don't make sense.
translation: 但还有许多因素目前仍无法解释。

original: You need to take some time to work through it all.
translation: 你需要花点时间梳理这些事情。

original: But you should go talk to Dracogen first.[p/] He'll want to see everything that you've found.
translation: 但你应该先去跟德拉科根聊聊。[p/]他会想了解你的新发现。

original: Frey: I'm sorry, Tyrion...
translation: Frey: 我很抱歉，提利昂……

original: Frey: There were so many things that I wanted to tell you.[p/] So many things that I wanted to show you.
translation: Frey: 有很多事我想告诉你。[p/]很多事我想给你看。

original: Frey: But I'm afraid that I can't do that now...
translation: Frey: 但我现在恐怕做不到了……

original: Frey: I need you to be strong now.
translation: Frey: 我需要你现在坚强起来。

original: Frey: This world is bleak,[p/] merciless,[p/] and unforgiving.
translation: Frey: 这个世界暗淡无光，[p/]冷漠，[p/]且无情。

original: Frey: But I've seen you.[p/] I know how bright the light within you is.
translation: Frey: 但我看着你成长。[p/]我知道你心中存在着光明。

original: Frey: Use my eyes.[p/] Peer beyond the Divine Gate as I once did.
translation: Frey: 用我的眼睛吧。[p/]仔细看那神圣之门外的世界，就像我之前做的那样。

original: Frey: Use it to reclaim the future.
translation: Frey: 用它来重新取回未来。

original: Lloyd: Preposterous![p/][s/] Completely and [i]utterly[/i] preposterous!
translation: Lloyd: 荒唐！[p/][s/]<u>彻头彻尾</u>的荒唐！

original: Tyrion: Is something wrong, Lord von Sanctus?
translation: Tyrion: 有什么问题吗，冯·桑克图斯勋爵？

original: Lloyd: You [i]filthy[/i] rat![p/][s/] You cheated, didn't you?!
translation: Lloyd: 你这个<u>肮脏的</u>老鼠！你作弊了，对吧？！

original: Lloyd: That's right![p/][s/] You're just a cheat![p/][s/] A cheat and a charlatan!
translation: Lloyd: 这就对了！[p/][s/]你作弊！[p/][s/]作弊的江湖骗子！

original: Tyrion: ...Do you have any evidence to prove that ridiculous claim?
translation: Tyrion: ……你有什么证据证明那个荒唐的说法吗？

original: Lloyd: I mastered chess before you could [i]crawl[/i] out of whatever [i]rat-hole[/i] you came from!
translation: Lloyd: 在你从自己的<u>老鼠洞</u>里<u>爬</u>出来之前，我就已经精通国际象棋了！

original: Lloyd: Do you honestly expect anyone to believe that [i]you[/i][p/] could defeat [i]me[/i]?!
translation: Lloyd: 你真以为有人会相信像<u>你</u>[p/]能打败<u>我</u>？！

original: Tyrion: Honestly,[p/] I'm just as disappointed as you are.
translation: Tyrion: 说实话，[p/]我跟你一样失望。

original: Tyrion: I was expecting more of a challenge from House von Sanctus.
translation: Tyrion: 我还指望冯·桑克图斯家能带来更大的挑战呢。

original: Tyrion: ...But I suppose all the gold in the world can't buy you a modicum of skill.
translation: Tyrion: ……不过我想，世上所有的黄金也不能给你买来一点儿本事。

original: Lloyd: You little upstart![p/][s/] I'll-
translation: Lloyd: 你这个乳臭未干的平民！[p/][s/]我——

original: Nobleman: [i]*Ahem*[/i]
translation: Nobleman: *<u>咳嗽</u>*

original: Von Sanctus' acquaintance clears his throat and gestures subtly to the crowd of spectators.
translation: 冯·桑克图斯的熟人清了清嗓子，朝着围观的人群微微示意。

original: Everyone's attention is on him.[p/] And you can see the crowd muttering amongst themselves.
translation: 每个人的注意力都在他身上。[p/]你能看到人们正在窃窃私语。

original: His undignified behavior probably isn't doing any favors for his public image.
translation: 他这种有失体面的行为可不会给公众形象加分。

original: Realizing himself,[p/] he tries to regain his composure.
translation: 意识到自己的失态后，[p/]他努力恢复镇定。

original: Lloyd: Hmph…[p/] It's preposterous…
translation: Lloyd: 哼……[p/]这太荒唐了……

original: He walks away,[p/] muttering the word "preposterous" under his breath a few more times.
translation: 他走开了，[p/]嘴里又嘟囔了几次“荒唐”。

original: It sounds like he's trying to reassure himself more than anyone else.
translation: 听起来他更像是让自己安心，而不是说给别人听。

original: Celeste: So...[p/] That was...[p/] something.
translation: Celeste: 所以……[p/]这事儿……[p/]够劲。

original: Tyrion: Yeah.[p/] I knew that he'd get angry.[p/] But I didn't expect him to make a scene like that.
translation: Tyrion: 是啊。[p/]我知道他会生气，[p/]但我没料到他会闹成那样。

original: Celeste: Well...[p/] You [i]did[/i] insult him.
translation: Celeste: 嗯……[p/]你<u>确实</u>羞辱了他。

original: Celeste: Not to say that he didn't deserve it.
translation: Celeste: 不过他倒也活该。

original: Tyrion: Come on.[p/] I love seeing these conceited nobles lose their minds when I beat them.
translation: Tyrion: 拜托。[p/]我就喜欢看到这些自命不凡的贵族输给我时气急败坏的样子。

original: Tyrion: It's half of the fun of playing these tournaments.
translation: Tyrion: 这是我参加这类比赛的一大乐趣。

original: Celeste: Wow...[p/] Where's this confidence when we're in the courthouse?
translation: Celeste: 哇……[p/]你这自信在庭审时去哪儿了？

original: Tyrion: That's...
translation: Tyrion: 这个……

original: Tyrion: Court cases are different.
translation: Tyrion: 打官司不一样。

original: Tyrion: I have to deal with real-world elements during a trial.[p/] And that [i]includes[/i] Prosecutor Steelwind.
translation: Tyrion: 审理过程中我要应对各种现实因素，[p/]这里也<u>包括</u>斯蒂尔文德检察官。

original: Celeste: Prosecutor Steelwind, huh?
translation: Celeste: 斯蒂尔文德检察官，是吧？

original: Celeste: I wonder if [i]she[/i] plays chess.
translation: Celeste: 我很好奇<u>她</u>下不下棋。

original: Now [i]there's[/i] a thought.
translation: <u>这话</u>倒是提醒你了。

original: You wonder if she'd be willing to play against you sometime.
translation: 你琢磨着她愿不愿意找个时候跟你对弈一局。

original: She can't be any worse than these pampered nobles.
translation: 她总不会比这些娇生惯养的贵族更差劲吧。

original: Celeste: Anyways, we should celebrate somewhere in town!
translation: Celeste: 不管怎样，咱们应该找个地方庆祝一下！

original: Celeste: Even if he [i]was[/i] a pushover,[p/][s/] you just beat one of the top-ranked chess players in the kingdom!
translation: Celeste: 就算他<u>是</u>个软柿子，[p/][s/]你刚刚也打败了王国的顶尖国际象棋选手之一呀！

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: To be honest,[p/] you had your reservations about returning to the city of Aurinax.
translation: 说实话，[p/]你原本对回到欧奥耐克斯城是有些顾虑的。

original: If you weren't facing one of the four pillars,[p/] you would have never come back here.
translation: 要不是因为能挑战四大支柱家族之一，[p/]你根本不会回来。

original: You'd rather leave this city as soon as possible.
translation: 你巴不得尽快离开这座城市。

original: Celeste: I saw a café while we were walking around.
translation: Celeste: 我在我们四处闲逛的时候看到了一家咖啡馆。

original: Celeste: The food smelled great![p/][s/] I'd really like to go there!
translation: Celeste: 那儿的食物闻起来很香！[p/][s/]我很想去看看！

original: Tyrion: ...We could always go to one of the cafés in the capital.[p/] There are plenty of places to choose from there.
translation: Tyrion: ……我们可以去首都的那些咖啡馆，[p/]那儿有的是地方可选。

original: Celeste: Trust me.[p/] I've traveled around the world.
translation: Celeste: 相信我。[p/]我可是环游过世界的。

original: Celeste: There's nothing better than food from a thriving port city.
translation: Celeste: 没有什么比得过繁荣的港口城市的食物。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: ...Alright,[p/] I suppose there's no harm in staying a little longer.
translation: Tyrion: 好吧……[p/]我想多呆一会儿也无妨。

original: She [i]does[/i] have a point.[p/] The city streets seem livelier than when you last saw them.
translation: 她说得<u>确实</u>有道理。[p/]城市街道比你上次来时更热闹了。

original: You see a lot of businesses that weren't here before.[p/] And they all seem to be very well off.
translation: 你看到很多以前没有的商铺，[p/]而且生意都很不错。

original: Despite being a port city,[p/] Aurinax used to look like a ghost town.
translation: 尽管是港口城市，[p/]欧奥耐克斯以前看起来像个鬼城。

original: Has the local nobility been investing in the city?
translation: 当地的贵族阶层开始投资这座城市了吗？

original: ...You find [i]that[/i] possibility very hard to believe.
translation: ……你感觉<u>这</u>不太可能。

original: You arrive at the café that Celeste told you about.
translation: 你来到了塞莱斯特跟你说过的那家咖啡馆。

original: As you enter,[p/] you're struck by a powerful aroma of freshly baked pastries and coffee.
translation: 你一进门，[p/]新鲜烘焙的糕点和咖啡的浓郁香气就扑面而来。

original: The scent of the baked goods swirls around you.[p/] You take a moment to inhale the enticing smells.
translation: 烘焙食品的香味在你周围萦绕，[p/]你花了一会儿时间尽情地闻着这诱人的气味。

original: You have to admit that it's making you very hungry.
translation: 你不得不承认这让你饥肠辘辘。

original: Mosourika: So…[p/] You seek to enter the domain of the death-bringer songstress.
translation: Mosourika: 所以……[p/]你想进入死神歌女的领域。

original: Mosourika: Well,[p/] if glory is what you seek,[p/][s/] then look no further!
translation: Mosourika: 嗯，[p/]如果荣耀是你所求，[p/][s/]那就不必再苦苦追寻！

original: Mosourika: For you stand before Mosourika Tudor:[p/][s/] Dark Lord of Aurinax!
translation: Mosourika: 因为你面前的就是莫苏里卡·都铎：[p/][s/]欧奥耐克斯的黑暗领主！

original: As you head further into the café,[p/] you're approached by a familiar face.
translation: 你往咖啡馆里面走时，[p/]遇见了一个熟悉的面孔。

original: Tyrion: ...!
translation: Tyrion: ……！

original: Tyrion: ...Rika?[p/] Is that you?
translation: Tyrion: ……里卡？[p/]是你吗？

original: Mosourika: Ha![p/][s/] It appears that my reputation precedes me!
translation: Mosourika: 哈！[p/][s/]看来我已声名远扬！

original: Mosourika: How good of you to-...!
translation: Mosourika: 你能认出我真是——！

original: Mosourika: ...
translation: Mosourika: ……

original: Mosourika: Wait,[p/] you're-...[p/][s/] Tyrion?!
translation: Mosourika: 等等，[p/]你是……[p/][s/]提利昂？！

original: Mosourika: Y-[p/]You're...[p/][s/] You're back!
translation: Mosourika: 你、[p/]你……[p/][s/]你回来了！

original: Tyrion: ...H-[p/]Hi.
translation: Tyrion: ……你、[p/]你好。

original: Mosourika: You...
translation: Mosourika: 你……

original: Mosourika: Why didn't you tell anyone that you were back in town?!
translation: Mosourika: 为什么你回城里都不和大家说一声？！

original: Mosourika: Do you have any idea how [i]worried[/i] we've all been?!
translation: Mosourika: 你知道我们有多<u>担心</u>吗？！

original: Celeste: Um...[p/] Do you two know each other?
translation: Celeste: 呃……[p/]你们俩认识吗？

original: Tyrion: R-[p/]Right...
translation: Tyrion: 是、[p/]是的……

original: Tyrion: Celeste,[p/] this is Mosourika Tudor.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特，[p/]这位是莫苏里卡·都铎。

original: Tyrion: I was friends with her when I lived here many years ago...
translation: Tyrion: 我很多年前还住这里时和她是朋友……

original: Celeste: Wait...[p/][s/] You used to live here?
translation: Celeste: 等等……[p/][s/]你以前住在这里？

original: Tyrion: ...Yeah.[p/] Aurinax is actually the town I grew up in.
translation: Tyrion: ……是的。[p/]我其实是在欧奥耐克斯长大的。

original: Celeste: What?![p/][s/] But you were in such a hurry to leave before!
translation: Celeste: 什么？！[p/][s/]那你还这么急着离开！

original: Mosourika: ...
translation: Mosourika: ……

original: Mosourika: ...You came here to eat, right?
translation: Mosourika: ……你是来吃饭的，对吧？

original: Mosourika: If you're still hungry,[p/] I can bring you some of our best dishes,[p/] on the house.
translation: Mosourika: 如果你还饿的话，[p/]我可以给你上几道招牌菜，[p/]免费的。

original: Tyrion: N-[p/]No.[p/] I couldn't possibly-
translation: Tyrion: 不、[p/]不用了。[p/]我总不能——

original: Mosourika: Come on![p/] Don't be like that.
translation: Mosourika: 拜托！[p/]别这样。

original: Mosourika: It's been years since I've seen you.
translation: Mosourika: 我们上次见面都是很多年以前了。

original: Mosourika: And you [i]know[/i] how good my food is.
translation: Mosourika: 你也<u>知道</u>我做的菜有多棒。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Okay,[p/] but only for a little while.
translation: Tyrion: 好，[p/]但我只坐一小会儿。

original: Rika sets a table for the three of you and calls over a waiter.
translation: 里卡为你们三个布置好一张桌子，然后叫来一个侍者。

original: You all place your orders.
translation: 你们都点了菜。

original: Mosourika: Now, tell me everything.
translation: Mosourika: 现在，把一切都告诉我。

original: Mosourika: I want to know all about what you've been doing since you left.
translation: Mosourika: 我想知道你离开后都干了些什么。

original: Mosourika: Tyrion, I [i]really[/i] don't know anything.
translation: Mosourika: 提利昂，我<u>真的</u>什么也不知道。

original: Tyrion: After what I've heard...[p/] I find that hard to believe.
translation: Tyrion: 在听过那些事情后……[p/]我不太相信这一点。

original: Mosourika: Well,[p/] you'll have to do better than [i]that[/i] if you want to defeat me!
translation: Mosourika: 嗯，[p/]要是你想打败我，可得拿出点儿<u>真</u>本事来！

original: It's difficult to argue with her when she gets like this.
translation: 她变成这副样子时很难进行辩论。

original: OK
translation: OK

original: Mosourika Tudor appears to be hiding something from you.
translation: 莫苏里卡·都铎似乎有事情瞒着你。

original: She clearly knows about the "bad crowd" that Justin fell in with.[p/] But she's hiding who they are and where you can find them.
translation: 她显然知道贾斯汀的那群狐朋狗友，[p/]但她在隐瞒他们是谁，以及在哪儿能找到他们。

original: You'll need to convince her to share that information with you.
translation: 你需要说服她对你分享这些信息。

original: Yes
translation: 是

original: No
translation: 否

original: Tyrion: Rika,[p/] you know about Justin's friends, don't you?
translation: Tyrion: 里卡，[p/]你知道贾斯汀的朋友们，对吧？

original: Tyrion: Just be honest with me.
translation: Tyrion: 跟我说实话。

original: Mosourika: I-[p/][s/]I'm not hiding anything!
translation: Mosourika: 我、[p/][s/]我没隐瞒什么！

original: Mosourika: I really don't know that much about him.
translation: Mosourika: 我对他真没有那么了解。

original: Mosourika: I may have delivered his food,[p/] but he was just a customer to me.
translation: Mosourika: 我可能是会给他送饭，[p/]但他对我来说只是个顾客。

original: Tyrion: I [i]might[/i] have believed that you delivered his food because he was a good customer.
translation: Tyrion: 我<u>或许</u>会相信你给他送饭是因为他是个好顾客。

original: Tyrion: But that wasn't [i]all[/i] you did for him.
translation: Tyrion: 但你为他做的可不只<u>这些</u>。

original: Tyrion: You saw that he was trying to turn his life around.
translation: Tyrion: 你看到他想改变自己的人生。

original: Tyrion: And you begged Dracogen to set him up with a job.
translation: Tyrion: 你还恳求德拉科根给他提供一份工作。

original: Tyrion: You wouldn't do that for a customer that you barely knew.
translation: Tyrion: 你不会为了不熟悉的顾客做这些事情。

original: Mosourika: Hrk!
translation: Mosourika: 噫！

original: Tyrion: Rika,[p/] you clearly know more about Justin than you're letting on.
translation: Tyrion: 里卡，[p/]你明显对贾斯汀的事有所隐瞒。

original: Tyrion: And [i]this[/i] proves it.
translation: Tyrion: 而<u>这</u>就是证据。

original: Mosourika: Uh...[p/] I don't think [i]that[/i] really proves anything.
translation: Mosourika: 呃……[p/]我觉得<u>它</u>什么都证明不了啊。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh...
translation: Tyrion: 噢、[p/]噢……

original: Rika is trying to say that she wasn't close to Justin.
translation: 里卡在努力表明她跟贾斯汀不熟。

original: But one of the things that she did for him contradicts that.
translation: 但为贾斯汀做的某件事让她露出了马脚。

original: Mosourika: W-[p/]Well,[p/] [i]that[/i] still proves nothing.
translation: Mosourika: 可、[p/]可是，[p/]<u>这</u>还是证明不了什么啊。

original: Mosourika: I am Mosourika Tudor,[p/][s/] High Archmage of the Cadmium Flame!
translation: Mosourika: 我是莫苏里卡·都铎，[p/][s/]镉之火焰的最高大法师！

original: Mosourika: Is it so hard to believe that I took pity on a stranger?
translation: Mosourika: 我可怜一个陌生人，有什么好稀奇的？

original: Mosourika: It would only be right for me to equip a commoner with the means to change his life!
translation: Mosourika: 我这么做，只是在给一个平民提供改变命运的手段。这是理所应当的！

original: Doubt [d="You're not a very good liar, Rika. You would have risked a lot by asking Dracogen to hire a stranger."/]
translation: Doubt [d="你撒的这个谎可不怎么高明，里卡。让德拉科根雇佣一个陌生人也会给你带来不小的风险。"/]

original: Tyrion: You're not a good liar, Rika.
translation: Tyrion: 你撒的这个谎可不怎么高明，里卡。

original: Tyrion: You would have risked a lot by asking Dracogen to hire a stranger.[p/] Especially a stranger with a dubious past like Justin.
translation: Tyrion: 让德拉科根雇佣一个陌生人也会给你带来不小的风险。[p/]尤其是像贾斯汀这样过去不太清白的陌生人。

original: Tyrion: What if Justin fell back into his old ways?
translation: Tyrion: 要是贾斯汀重蹈覆辙怎么办？

original: Tyrion: That would have surely brought about consequences on you [i]and[/i] your business.
translation: Tyrion: 那肯定会让你<u>和</u>你的生意都遭受严重后果。

original: Tyrion: You wouldn't take a risk like that unless you [i]knew[/i] him well enough to trust him.
translation: Tyrion: 除非<u>了解</u>到可以信任他的地步，你不会冒这个险。

original: Mosourika: ...
translation: Mosourika: ……

original: Agree [d="You are a generous person, Rika. And that type of generosity would make you privy to details of Justin's life."/]
translation: Agree [d="你<u>是</u>个慷慨的人，里卡。这种慷慨会让你了解贾斯汀生活中的细节。"/]

original: Tyrion: You [i]are[/i] a generous person, Rika.
translation: Tyrion: 你<u>是</u>个慷慨的人，里卡。

original: Tyrion: And that type of generosity would make you privy to details of Justin's life.
translation: Tyrion: 这种慷慨会让你了解贾斯汀生活中的细节。

original: Tyrion: I doubt that he'd continue to hide his past from you after you'd done so much for him.
translation: Tyrion: 你为他做了那么多，我不觉得他还会继续对你隐瞒自己的过去。

original: Tyrion: You [i]would[/i] have known who he associated with.
translation: Tyrion: 你<u>应该</u>知道他跟谁混在一起。

original: Mosourika: Tyrion...[p/] Not everyone wants to share their past with the people close to them.
translation: Mosourika: 提利昂……[p/]不是每个人都愿意跟亲近的人分享自己的过去。

original: Mosourika: ...You should know that better than anyone.
translation: Mosourika: ……你应该比任何人都清楚这一点。

original: ...She's got you there.
translation: ……她说得有道理。

original: Rationalize [d="You said earlier that he was a good person. How could you possibly know that if you didn't know him well?"/]
translation: Rationalize [d="你刚才说他是个好人。不怎么了解他的话，怎么可能知道这些？"/]

original: Tyrion: You said earlier that he was a good person.[p/] And that he fell in with a "bad crowd".
translation: Tyrion: 你刚才说他是个好人。[p/]然后才和一群“坏人”混在一起。

original: Tyrion: How could you possibly know that if you didn't know him well?
translation: Tyrion: 不怎么了解他的话，怎么可能知道这些？

original: Mosourika: There are plenty of people who would have said that about him.
translation: Mosourika: 有很多人会这么说他。

original: Mosourika: He didn't exactly keep it secret.[p/] I only knew about him because of rumors that were floating around town.
translation: Mosourika: 他也没刻意隐瞒。[p/]我知道他也只是道听途说。

original: ...That does make sense.[p/] Could she be telling the truth?
translation: ……这么解释确实有道理。[p/]她是在说实话吗？

original: No...[p/] When you read her thoughts earlier,[p/] you could tell that she was hiding something.
translation: 不对……[p/]之前读她心思的时候，[p/]你能察觉出她在隐瞒什么。

original: She has to be lying right now.
translation: 她现在肯定在撒谎。

original: Mosourika: Okay, fine![p/] I guess we [i]were[/i] friends.
translation: Mosourika: 好吧，行！[p/]我想我们<u>是</u>朋友。

original: Mosourika: But like I said before,[p/] he was trying to leave his old life behind.
translation: Mosourika: 但就像我先前说的那样，[p/]他试图摆脱过去的生活。

original: Mosourika: He didn't like talking about the person he was back then.
translation: Mosourika: 他不喜欢提及自己的过去。

original: Mosourika: He wanted to forget about it.[p/] And I never brought it up.
translation: Mosourika: 他想把它忘掉，[p/]我也从不提起。

original: Tyrion: I doubt that, Rika.
translation: Tyrion: 我不是很相信，里卡。

original: Tyrion: In fact,[p/] I'm sure that you were friends for at least a few years.
translation: Tyrion: 事实上，[p/]我敢肯定你们至少已经做了几年的朋友。

original: Tyrion: With a friendship that old,[p/] I'm sure he would have confided in you about his past.
translation: Tyrion: 有这么长时间的友谊在，[p/]他肯定会向你吐露自己的过去。

original: Celeste: ...W-[p/]What?
translation: Celeste: ……什、[p/]什么？

original: ...No.[p/] You need to stay focused.
translation: ……不。[p/]你要保持专注。

original: Tyrion: Rika,[p/] your statement doesn’t match with what you’re thinking.
translation: Tyrion: 里卡，[p/]你说的跟你想的不一样。

original: Mosourika: What I'm "thinking"?[p/] What's [i]that[/i] supposed to mean?
translation: Mosourika: 什么叫“我想的”？[p/]<u>那</u>是什么意思？

original: Tyrion: E-[p/]Er,[p/] well…
translation: Tyrion: 呃、[p/]呃，[p/]嗯……

original: You can’t exactly [i]tell[/i] her that you're reading her thoughts…
translation: 你总不能直接<u>告诉</u>她你在读她的想法……

original: Tyrion: Rika,[p/] I don't know why you thought you had to lie about this.
translation: Tyrion: 里卡，[p/]我不知道你为什么觉得需要在这件事上撒谎。

original: Tyrion: But I need to talk to Justin's former friends.
translation: Tyrion: 但是我需要和贾斯汀以前的朋友聊聊。

original: Mosourika: ...Is that really necessary?
translation: Mosourika: ……那真的有必要吗？

original: Tyrion: Yes.[p/] I need to know why he was behaving so strangely before the accident.
translation: Tyrion: 是的。[p/]我需要知道为什么他在事故发生前行为那么反常。

original: Tyrion: His friends might know something about him that you and Dracogen don't.
translation: Tyrion: 他的朋友可能知道一些你和德拉科根不知道的事。

original: Mosourika: But that doesn't make any sense.
translation: Mosourika: 但这说不通呀。

original: Mosourika: I think you're just overthinking this, Tyrion.
translation: Mosourika: 我觉得你就是想得太多了，提利昂。

original: You didn't want to overplay your hand before.[p/] But it looks like you don't have a choice now.
translation: 你之前不想操之过急，[p/]但现在看来你别无选择了。

original: Tyrion: Rika,[p/] Justin told you that he was heading to a scheduled meeting in Dracogen's office.
translation: Tyrion: 里卡，[p/]贾斯汀告诉你，他约好要和德拉科根在办公室会面。

original: Tyrion: But according to Dracogen,[p/] Justin wasn't even supposed to be in the refinery building yesterday.
translation: Tyrion: 但据德拉科根说，[p/]贾斯汀昨天根本就不该在精炼厂大楼里。

original: Mosourika: ...What?
translation: Mosourika: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: Rika...[p/] Justin might have lied to you.
translation: Tyrion: 里卡……[p/]贾斯汀可能对你撒谎了。

original: Mosourika: N-[p/]No...
translation: Mosourika: 不、[p/]不可能……

original: Mosourika: He would [i]never[/i] do that!
translation: Mosourika: 他<u>绝对不会</u>那么做！

original: Tyrion: I need to know why he was up there.
translation: Tyrion: 我得知道他为什么会在那儿。

original: Tyrion: And so far,[p/] the statements that I've gotten from you [i]and[/i] Dracogen don't explain that.
translation: Tyrion: 而且到目前为止，[p/]你<u>和</u>德拉科根给我的陈述都没能解释这一点。

original: Mosourika: ...
translation: Mosourika: ……

original: Tyrion: I need to talk to people who might know things about him that you don't.
translation: Tyrion: 我得跟那些可能知道内情的人谈谈。

original: Mosourika: ...Okay.
translation: Mosourika: ……好吧。

original: Mosourika: I'll tell you where you can find them...
translation: Mosourika: 我会告诉你哪儿能找到他们的……

original: Mosourika: ...Just promise me that you'll be safe, okay?
translation: Mosourika: ……但要答应我，你会注意安全，好吗？

original: You’ve successfully persuaded Mosourika Tudor.
translation: 你成功说服了莫苏里卡·都铎。

original: Tyrion: Rika,[p/] he was acting very strangely.
translation: Tyrion: 里卡，[p/]他的表现非常奇怪。

original: Tyrion: I need to talk to Justin's former friends so they can explain [i]this[/i].
translation: Tyrion: 我需要和贾斯汀以前的朋友聊聊，听听他们<u>对此</u>的解释。

original: Mosourika: I-[p/]I don't understand.
translation: Mosourika: 我、[p/]我不明白。

original: Mosourika: How would talking to his former friends explain that?
translation: Mosourika: 跟他的老朋友谈谈怎么就能解释清楚呢？

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh... I-[p/]I...
translation: Tyrion: 噢、[p/]噢……我、[p/]我……

original: You might want to PRESENT something else to prove your point.
translation: 你或许得 <size=1.5em>出示</size> 别的东西来证明你的观点。

original: Tyrion: So...[p/] Is it just me,[p/] or does this hallway look similar to the one in your family's tavern?
translation: Tyrion: 所以……[p/]是我眼花吗，[p/]还是说这条走廊跟你家酒馆里的那条很像？

original: Celeste: Well,[p/] most taverns use the same architecture.[p/] So, I don't think it's [i]that[/i] strange.
translation: Celeste: 嗯，[p/]大部分酒馆的建筑风格都差不多，[p/]所以我觉得这没有<u>那么</u>奇怪。

original: Tyrion: No,[p/] but it looks [i]exactly[/i] like the McCoy Tavern.[p/] It's uncanny.
translation: Tyrion: 不，[p/]但这跟麦考伊酒馆看起来<u>一模一样</u>。[p/]有点不可思议了。

original: Tyrion: It's as if whoever made this tavern decided to just reuse the same design.
translation: Tyrion: 就好像建这酒馆的人直接套用了同样的设计。

original: Celeste: Hey,[p/] making unique designs is difficult, Tyrion.[p/] [i]And[/i] it costs money.
translation: Celeste: 喂，[p/]做出独特设计很困难的，提利昂，[p/]<u>而且</u>得花钱。

original: Celeste: Do you really think developers should be spending resources on a location that you'll only see once?
translation: Celeste: 你真觉得开发人员应该把资源花在一个只会来一次的地方吗？

original: Tyrion: I don't know...[p/] It just seems kind of lazy.
translation: Tyrion: 我不知道……[p/]这样看起来有点懒。

original: Celeste: Well if it bothers you so much,[p/][s/] why don't [i]you[/i] pay for the assets required to make a new one?
translation: Celeste: 要是你这么在意，[p/][s/]那<u>你</u>出钱做新的不就行了？

original: You decide to drop the matter.
translation: 你决定不管这件事了。

original: According to Celeste's intuition,[p/] the innkeeper would have probably given Aster this room.
translation: 据塞莱斯特的直觉，[p/]店主很可能把这房间给了阿斯特。

original: You approach the door and firmly knock on it.
translation: 你走到门前，用力敲门。

original: Aster: Hello...?
translation: Aster: 你好……？

original: Someone [i]does[/i] come to answer the door.[p/] But they only open the door a fraction of the way.
translation: 有人<u>确实</u>来开门了，[p/]但他只开了一道小缝。

original: The crack in the door is less than an inch wide.[p/] You can't get a look at the person's face.
translation: 门缝还不到一英寸宽，[p/]你没法看到那人的脸。

original: Aster: I'm terribly sorry.[p/] But if your business isn't urgent,[p/] I'd like to be left alone.
translation: Aster: 真不好意思，[p/]但要是你没急事，[p/]我想一个人待着。

original: Tyrion: S-[p/]Sorry if I'm intruding.[p/] But are you Aster?
translation: Tyrion: 不、[p/]不好意思，打扰了。[p/]是阿斯特吗？

original: Aster: ...
translation: Aster: ……

original: Tyrion: My name is Tyrion Cuthbert.[p/] I'm the defense attorney of Stefanic Dracogen.
translation: Tyrion: 我叫提利昂·卡斯伯特。[p/]我是斯蒂芬尼克·德拉科根的辩护律师。

original: Aster: ...!
translation: Aster: ……！

original: Tyrion: From what I've heard,[p/] you witnessed the accident at the refinery yesterday.
translation: Tyrion: 我听说，[p/]你昨天目睹了精炼厂的那起事故。

original: Tyrion: I was wondering if I could ask you a few questions about what you saw.
translation: Tyrion: 我想问问你看到的情况。

original: Upon hearing your name,[p/] the man fully opens the door.[p/] And you're finally able to get a good look at him.
translation: 听到你的名字，[p/]那人把门完全打开，[p/]你终于能好好看看他了。

original: He definitely stands out from the other patrons of the inn.[p/] He must be the wealthy patron that you're looking for.
translation: 他确实跟酒馆里的其他客人很不一样，[p/]应该就是你要找的那个有钱人。

original: Aster: Tyrion Cuthbert…[p/] The protégé of the infamous Ruby Tymora.
translation: Aster: 提利昂·卡斯伯特……[p/]臭名昭著的鲁比·泰摩拉的徒弟。

original: Tyrion: ...So,[p/] you know who I am.
translation: Tyrion: ……看来，[p/]你知道我是谁。

original: Aster: I do...[p/] I know you [i]very[/i] well.
translation: Aster: 是的……[p/]我<u>非常</u>了解你。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Aster: I'm...
translation: Aster: 我是……

original: Aster: ...your biggest fan!
translation: Aster: ……你的超级粉丝！

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Aster: I can't believe it![p/][s/] The [i]infamous[/i] Tyrion Cuthbert is standing right in front of my tavern room!
translation: Aster: 难以置信！[p/][s/]<u>臭名昭著</u>的提利昂·卡斯伯特正站在我的酒馆房间前！

original: Tyrion: ...What?!
translation: Tyrion: 什么？！

original: Aster: I've read [i]all[/i] about your feats, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aster: 我读过关于你的<u>所有</u>事迹，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Aster: You successfully indicted the head of House Pierce!
translation: Aster: 你成功起诉了皮尔斯家族的首脑！

original: Aster: You didn't think twice about confronting a member of House Frega!
translation: Aster: 面对弗雷加家族的成员，你毫不畏惧！

original: Aster: [i]And[/i] you even defeated Lord von Sanctus in the chess tournament yesterday!
translation: Aster: <u>而且</u>你昨天还在国际象棋比赛中打败了冯·桑克图斯勋爵！

original: Celeste: ...I'm so lost right now.
translation: Celeste: ……我现在很迷茫。

original: Aster: And [i]you[/i]![p/][s/] You must be Celeste McCoy.
translation: Aster: 还有<u>你</u>！[p/][s/]你一定是塞莱斯特·麦考伊。

original: Aster: Tyrion's first client,[p/] and the Crimson Demon of the Eastern Kingdoms!
translation: Aster: 提利昂的第一位委托人，[p/]东方古国的绯红恶魔！

original: Celeste: ...How did you find out about that name?!
translation: Celeste: ……你怎么挖出来那个名字的？！

original: Tyrion: ...The Crimson what?
translation: Tyrion: ……绯红什么？

original: Celeste: Ugh...[p/] Don't ask.
translation: Celeste: 呃啊……[p/]别问。

original: Tyrion: A-[p/]Anyways,[p/] if you [i]are[/i] Aster, does that mean that you witnessed the accident with the harbourmaster yesterday?
translation: Tyrion: 总、[p/]总之，[p/]如果你<u>是</u>阿斯特，那你昨天是不是和港务长一起目睹了事故？

original: Aster: Y-[p/][s/]Yes![p/][s/] I did!
translation: Aster: 是、[p/][s/]是的！[p/][s/]我目睹了！

original: Aster: Are you going to interrogate me about what I saw?!
translation: Aster: 你要盘问我我看到的情况吗？！

original: Aster: I'll answer whatever questions you have!
translation: Aster: 我会回答你的任何问题！

original: You've never met a witness that has been [i]this[/i] eager to cooperate.
translation: 你从没见过<u>这么</u>积极合作的证人。

original: But hopefully, this means that he won't hide any details about what he saw.
translation: 希望这意味着他不会隐瞒看到的任何细节。

original: It's the door to Aster's room in the tavern.
translation: 这是酒馆里通往阿斯特房间的门。

original: The innkeeper gave him the room at the end of the hallway,[p/] presumably to keep away any prying eyes.
translation: 店主把走廊尽头的房间给了他，[p/]大概是想避免别人窥探。

original: Tyrion: You clearly know who I am.[p/] But I'm still unsure of who [i]you[/i] are, Aster.
translation: Tyrion: 你很清楚我是谁，[p/]但我还不清楚<u>你</u>是谁，阿斯特。

original: Aster: Ah...[p/] My apologies.
translation: Aster: 啊……[p/]不好意思。

original: Aster: But I would prefer to keep my full identity hidden for now.
translation: Aster: 但我现在还是想隐藏自己的身份。

original: He's within his right to do so.[p/] But you can't help but feel a little suspicious.
translation: 他有权这么做，[p/]但你难免会有点怀疑。

original: Tyrion: ...In any case,[p/] what is your business in Aurinax?
translation: Tyrion: ……总之，[p/]你是因为什么事来欧奥耐克斯的？

original: Aster: I was accompanying a ship transporting goods to Lord von Sanctus.
translation: Aster: 我搭乘一艘给冯·桑克图斯勋爵运送货物的船而来。

original: Tyrion: ...The same ship that was magically stolen?
translation: Tyrion: ……就是那艘被用魔法偷走的船吗？

original: Aster: I'm surprised you found out about that.
translation: Aster: 我很惊讶你还知道这回事。

original: Aster: The Kingsguard have been trying their best to keep that information hidden.
translation: Aster: 国王卫队一直在尽力隐瞒那个消息。

original: Aster: But I suppose I shouldn't expect anything less from you, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aster: 但我想对你的实力来说也是小菜一碟，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Flattery will get him nowhere.
translation: 花言巧语可帮不了他。

original: Celeste: What was on that ship?
translation: Celeste: 那艘船上有什么？

original: Celeste: It must be pretty valuable to be worth stealing.
translation: Celeste: 那船上的东西肯定很值钱，不然不会遭贼惦记。

original: Aster: Ah...[p/] I doubt that there was [i]anything[/i] on that ship worth drawing the ire of the entire kingdom.
translation: Aster: 啊……[p/]我很怀疑那船上能有<u>什么东西</u>让整个王国愤怒。

original: Aster: The truth is,[p/] during the time that my ship was stolen,[p/] [i]I[/i] was supposed to be on it.
translation: Aster: 实话告诉你，[p/]船被偷的时候，[p/]<u>我</u>本该在船上的。

original: Tyrion: I see...
translation: Tyrion: 我明白了……

original: Tyrion: The theft of the ship might have actually been an attempt to kidnap you.
translation: Tyrion: 把船偷走实际上是在尝试绑架你。

original: Aster: That's my current theory anyway.[p/] It wouldn't make sense otherwise.
translation: Aster: 这是我目前的推测，[p/]这之外的解释都说不通。

original: He seems awfully calm about this.
translation: 他对此似乎过于淡定了。

original: Tyrion: According to Morrison,[p/] you were also in the refinery that night.
translation: Tyrion: 据莫里森所说，[p/]那晚你也在精炼厂。

original: Tyrion: Did you witness the moment the victim fell into the vat?
translation: Tyrion: 你是否目击到了受害者掉入桶里的瞬间？

original: Aster: I did...
translation: Aster: 我看见了……

original: Celeste: Could you tell us exactly what you saw?
translation: Celeste: 能告诉我们你具体看见了什么吗？

original: Celeste: Every detail you can remember could be important.
translation: Celeste: 你记得的每项细节都很重要。

original: Aster: Well, it all began when I was visiting the refinery with the harbourmaster.
translation: Aster: 那都要从我和港务长去精炼厂开始说起。

original: Aster: I was inspecting the refinery's machines,[p/] when a girl frantically ran towards us.
translation: Aster: 我正在观察精炼厂的机器，[p/]这时一个女孩慌慌张张地朝我们跑来。

original: Aster: She was hysterical.[p/] It looked like she was trying to tell us something.
translation: Aster: 她歇斯底里，[p/]好像想跟我们说什么。

original: Aster: But we couldn't hear her over the noise of the machines.
translation: Aster: 但机器太吵，我们听不见。

original: Aster: When she realized that we couldn't hear her,[p/] she simply pointed at the walkway.
translation: Aster: 她发现我们听不见后，[p/]就只是指向走道。

original: Aster: That's when we saw Justin Waye fall off of it and into the vat.
translation: Aster: 我们就在那时看到贾斯汀·维耶从走道上掉进桶里。

original: Tyrion: This next question is very important.
translation: Tyrion: 下一个问题非常重要。

original: Tyrion: Did you see the victim break the guard rail by leaning on it?
translation: Tyrion: 你看到受害者靠在护栏上把它弄断的瞬间了吗？

original: Aster: Yes.[p/] He broke the guard rail before he fell.
translation: Aster: 看到了，[p/]他掉下去前把护栏弄断了。

original: His testimony matches exactly with what Morrison saw.
translation: 他的证词跟莫里森看到的情况完全一致。

original: Aster: The way he fell was very strange though...
translation: Aster: 不过他掉下去的方式很奇怪……

original: "Strange"?[p/] What could he mean by that...
translation: “奇怪”？[p/]他这是什么意思……

original: Tyrion: You mentioned the way that the victim fell was strange.
translation: Tyrion: 你说受害者掉下去的方式很奇怪。

original: Tyrion: ...Did you feel like the guard rail broke too easily?
translation: Tyrion: ……是因为你觉得护栏断的太容易了吗？

original: Aster: Why yes?[p/] How did you know?
translation: Aster: 对呀？[p/]你怎么知道的？

original: Tyrion: ...It matches with the statement that the harbourmaster gave us.
translation: Tyrion: ……这跟港务长对我们陈述的一致。

original: You don't want to reveal the traces of [b]transmutation[/b] that you found on the walkway.[p/] At least not yet.
translation: 至少现在，[p/]你还不想透露走道上发现的[b]形变术[/b]痕迹。

original: Aster: But yes.[p/] The guard rail broke the moment that Justin leaned on it.
translation: Aster: 但没错。[p/]护栏在贾斯汀倚靠上去的一瞬间就坏掉了。

original: Aster: And his body was extremely limp when falling too.
translation: Aster: 他掉下去的时候看起来身体瘫软无力。

original: Celeste: His body was "limp"?
translation: Celeste: 他的身体“瘫软无力”？

original: Aster: Normally,[p/] when falling from a great height,[p/] one would flail their arms, yes?
translation: Aster: 一般而言，[p/]从高处掉下时，[p/]人们都会因惊慌挥舞手臂吧？

original: Aster: But when I saw him falling,[p/] he wasn't moving at all.
translation: Aster: 但我看到的时候，[p/]他坠落期间一动也不动。

original: He wasn't moving...?
translation: 一动也不动……？

original: Tyrion: Did you see the expression on his face?
translation: Tyrion: 你有看见他脸上的表情吗？

original: Tyrion: He might have been unconscious.
translation: Tyrion: 他或许失去了意识。

original: Aster: I'm afraid I couldn't see [i]anything[/i] on his face.
translation: Aster: 很遗憾，我连他的脸是<u>什么样子</u>都看不清。

original: Aster: It was much too dark to make out his features.
translation: Aster: 当时光线实在太昏暗了。

original: Tyrion: Wait, you didn't actually [i]see[/i] his face?
translation: Tyrion: 等等，你当时并没<u>看清</u>他的脸？

original: Tyrion: How did you know it was actually him that fell in?
translation: Tyrion: 那你怎么知道掉下去的是他？

original: Aster: Well...[p/] Who [i]else[/i] could it have been?
translation: Aster: 这个……[p/]还能是谁？

original: Aster: No one else has been reported missing.
translation: Aster: 当时没有其他人失踪。

original: Celeste: They also found the remnants of Justin's body in the vat.
translation: Celeste: 他们也在桶里找到了贾斯汀的尸体残余。

original: Celeste: It was definitely him that fell in.
translation: Celeste: 掉下去的肯定是他。

original: That's true.[p/] You don't have much reason to believe that Justin might still be alive.
translation: 确实如此。[p/]贾斯汀还活着的可能性微乎其微。

original: There were traces of [b]transmutation[/b] magic at the crime scene...
translation: 犯罪现场留有[b]形变术[/b]魔法的痕迹……

original: And it appears that Aster is quite a high-profile individual.
translation: 阿斯特似乎也是个来头高贵的人物。

original: He's probably a mage...[p/] And aside from Rika,[p/] he was probably the only other mage at the refinery that night.
translation: 他大概率是个法师……[p/]也是除了里卡以外，[p/]精炼厂内当晚唯一一位法师。

original: If you ask him outright,[p/] you might able to see something incriminating through the Eye of Horus.
translation: 如果直截了当对他发问，[p/]荷鲁斯之眼也许能捕捉到一些可疑的线索。

original: Tyrion: Aster,[p/] we'll respect your privacy if you don't want to tell us who you are.
translation: Tyrion: 阿斯特，[p/]如果你不愿告诉我们真实身份，我们也会尊重你的隐私。

original: Tyrion: But could you at least answer one question for me?
translation: Tyrion: 但能不能至少回答我一个问题？

original: Aster: I can make no promises.[p/] But I'll do my best to tell you what I can.
translation: Aster: 我无法做什么承诺。[p/]但我会尽可能回答。

original: Tyrion: Are you a mage?
translation: Tyrion: 你是法师吗？

original: Aster: Oh?[p/] Is that all?
translation: Aster: 哦？[p/]就这个吗？

original: Aster: Yes,[p/] I am a mage.[p/] And I'm quite the practiced one at that.
translation: Aster: 是的，[p/]我是个法师。[p/]还是个非常熟练的法师。

original: Tyrion: You see.[p/] Celeste cast [b]Detect Magic[/b] to look at the scene of the accident.
translation: Tyrion: 是这样，[p/]塞莱斯特在事故现场使用了[b]法术探测[/b]。

original: Tyrion: And we found traces of [b]transmutation[/b] magic at the crime scene.
translation: Tyrion: 我们在现场找到了[b]形变术[/b]魔法的痕迹。

original: Tyrion: ...Namely on the guard rails that Justin fell through.
translation: Tyrion: ……贾斯汀跌落处的护栏上也有这种魔法痕迹。

original: Aster: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Aster: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！

original: Aster: I...
translation: Aster: 我……

original: Here it is.
translation: 正中红心。

original: Aster: I can't believe it!
translation: Aster: 我不敢相信！

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Aster: Are you telling me that a mage used [b]transmutation[/b] magic to weaken the rails?! [mind="It's a conspiracy!"/]
translation: Aster: 你是在说有法师使用[b]形变术[/b]类魔法对护栏动了手脚？！ [mind="这是个阴谋！"/]

original: Aster: Wait, does that mean this was actually a [i]murder[/i] made to [i]look[/i] like an accident?! [mind="It's like something out of the reports I read about him!"/]
translation: Aster: 等等，也就是说这其实是被<u>伪装</u>成事故的<u>谋杀</u>？！ [mind="和我从有关他的报告中读过的一样！"/]

original: You don't see anything incriminating...[p/] And you can see his thoughts clearly...
translation: 你没看到任何可疑的想法……[p/]这些想法也丝毫不加掩饰……

original: His feelings of happiness are a bit off-putting, though...
translation: 虽然他的愉悦感还是叫人有点不适……

original: Aster: And you asked me if [i]I[/i] was a mage...
translation: Aster: 你刚才问<u>我</u>是不是法师……

original: Aster: Does that mean that [i]I'm[/i] a potential suspect?!
translation: Aster: 就代表<u>我也是</u>潜在嫌疑人之一？！

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Aster: This is the greatest thing to ever happen to me!
translation: Aster: 真是我身上发生过最好的事！

original: This is the first time you've met someone that's happy to be suspected of murder...
translation: 你头一次遇见被怀疑涉嫌谋杀还这么开心的人……

original: Aster: S-[p/]Sorry, it's not right of me to get so excited about something this serious... [mind="He must think less of me now..."/]
translation: Aster: 抱、[p/]抱歉，我不该在这么严肃的事上激动…… [mind="他肯定要看不起我了……"/]

original: Aster: But it's like something right out of a mystery novel!
translation: Aster: 但这就像是悬疑小说里的情节一样！

original: ...That's not the reaction you were expecting.
translation: ……这和你预想的反应不一样啊。

original: Nevertheless,[p/] it doesn't look like there are any incriminating thoughts in his mind.
translation: 不管怎样，[p/]看起来他的意识里没有什么可疑的想法。

original: And the emotions that he was emanating were all positive.[p/] There wasn't a drop of fear in there.
translation: 他在散发的也都是积极情绪，[p/]里面一丁点恐惧都没有。

original: What could this mean...?
translation: 这意味着什么……？

original: Either way,[p/] it looks like you've found out everything you can from Aster.
translation: 总之，[p/]阿斯特身上的情报应该就这些了。

original: You should MOVE somewhere else.
translation: 你应该 <size=1.5em>移动</size> 到别处看看。

original: Aster: I can't believe I actually came face to face with the legendary Tyrion Cuthbert!
translation: Aster: 难以置信！我竟然会和传说中的提利昂·卡斯伯特见面！

original: Tyrion: ..."Legendary"?
translation: Tyrion: ……“传说中的”？

original: Celeste: I didn't know that defense attorneys could have fanboys.
translation: Celeste: 辩护律师也能有男粉丝啊。

original: Aster: He's not [i]just[/i] a defense attorney![p/][s/] He's a revolutionary!
translation: Aster: 他可<u>不仅仅是</u>辩护律师。[p/][s/]他掀起了一场革命！

original: Aster: He's gone after prolific nobles and plunged the kingdom's aristocracy into chaos!
translation: Aster: 他追杀那些富足的贵族，让王国显贵们陷入混乱！

original: That phrasing makes you sound like some kind of anarchist...
translation: 把你说得像什么无政府主义者……

original: Tyrion: So...[p/] What exactly [i]is[/i] a "Crimson Demon"?
translation: Tyrion: 所以……[p/]“绯红恶魔”到底<u>是</u>什么？

original: Celeste: Ugh...[p/] I thought that I'd finally gotten rid of that name.
translation: Celeste: 呜呃……[p/]我还以为这个名字不用再提了。

original: Celeste: It's a name people called me when I was working in the Eastern Kingdoms.
translation: Celeste: 是我还在东方古国工作时，人们给我起的别名。

original: Aster: Legends say that she cleared entire regions of bandits within days!
translation: Aster: 传闻说她只要几天就能扫荡整个地区内的匪徒！

original: Aster: The very gaze of her demonic glare drove fear into the most hardened of warriors.
translation: Aster: 即使是久经沙场的猛士，也会在她的恶魔之眼面前腿脚发软。

original: You snort out a small laugh as you hear that.
translation: 你听了忍不住发出轻笑。

original: Celeste: Oh, shut up.
translation: Celeste: 唔哦，别说了。

original: Aster: Wait...[p/] If [i]you're[/i] here...
translation: Aster: 等等……[p/]如果<u>你</u>在这里……

original: Aster: Is Ruby Tymora here too?!
translation: Aster: 鲁比·泰摩拉是不是也在？！

original: Tyrion: She isn't.[p/] I originally only came here for the chess tournament.
translation: Tyrion: 她不在。[p/]我原本是来这里参加国际象棋比赛的。

original: Tyrion: I didn't expect to be working a case while I was here.
translation: Tyrion: 我没想到要在这里处理案件。

original: In truth,[p/] you wanted to leave this city as soon as possible.
translation: 事实上，[p/]你巴不得赶紧离开这座城市。

original: Tyrion: The Kingsguard has locked the entire city down because of your missing ship.
translation: Tyrion: 因为你的船丢了，国王卫队已经把整座城封锁了。

original: Aster: *sigh*[p/] I asked them not to make such a big deal over this.
translation: Aster: *叹气* [p/]我跟他们说了不要这么大张旗鼓。

original: Aster: I've been quite troubled over all the people I've inconvenienced.
translation: Aster: 给这么多人添麻烦也让我不好意思。

original: Aster: I really wish that they'd just let it go.
translation: Aster: 我真希望他们能大事化小。

original: Aster: It's a terrible thing that happened...
translation: Aster: 发生的事情太糟糕了……

original: Aster: I can't imagine what Justin's last moments must have been like.
translation: Aster: 我无法想象贾斯汀生命的最后一刻会是怎样。

original: Tyrion: I didn't expect an aristocrat to remember the name of a commoner.
translation: Tyrion: 我没想到会有贵族能记住平民的名字。

original: Aster: ...
translation: Aster: ……

original: The comment came out harsher than you intended.
translation: 这话比你预想的要刺耳。

original: Aster: ...I suppose I deserve that.[p/] I haven't done much to help the commonfolk.
translation: Aster: ……这可能是我应得的评价。[p/]我没做过什么能帮助平民的事。

original: Aster: I have a long way to go before I can do that.
translation: Aster: 我还有很长的路要走。

original: It'd be best not to talk to him about the [b]transmutation[/b] traces that you found.
translation: 最好别告诉他有关[b]形变术[/b]魔法痕迹的事。

original: You're still not entirely sure if [i]he's[/i] the mage that used magic to weaken the guard rails.
translation: 你还不知道<u>他</u>是不是那个用魔法对护栏动手脚的法师。

original: Tyrion: What can you tell me about this, Aster?
translation: Tyrion: 阿斯特，关于这个你能告诉我什么？

original: Aster: Sorry.[p/] I'd love to help you.
translation: Aster: 抱歉。[p/]我很想帮忙。

original: Aster: But I can't say much about that...
translation: Aster: 但我没什么能说的……

original: Tyrion: Morrison said that Aster is staying in one of the rooms at this tavern.
translation: Tyrion: 莫里森说阿斯特暂住在这个酒馆的房间里。

original: Tyrion: But which room is it?
translation: Tyrion: 但具体是哪一间？

original: Celeste: We could always just check each room.
translation: Celeste: 我们可以全检查一遍。

original: Tyrion: That [i]might[/i] irritate the patrons though...
translation: Tyrion: 那赞助人<u>可能</u>要不高兴了……

original: Tyrion: And if Aster doesn't want to be found,[p/] we might alert him if we annoy too many people.
translation: Tyrion: 如果阿斯特不想被我们发现，[p/]我们也可能因此导致他提高警惕。

original: Celeste: Hm...[p/] I guess you're right...
translation: Celeste: 嗯……[p/]你说得有道理……

original: Tyrion: Your family owns a tavern, right?
translation: Tyrion: 你们家也是经营酒馆的吧？

original: Tyrion: If you had to put a VIP somewhere,[p/] which room would you choose?
translation: Tyrion: 如果有 VIP 客户光临，[p/]你们会给他哪间房？

original: Celeste: I guess it would probably be the one at the end of the hallway.
translation: Celeste: 是我的话就会选走廊尽头的房间。

original: Celeste: That's the one [i]I[/i] use at my family's tavern.
translation: Celeste: 这也是<u>我</u>在自家酒馆使用的房间。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: She's clearly not in the mood for conversation.
translation: 她明显没有对话的兴致。

original: Celeste: It's a statue of some kind of...[p/] daredevil?
translation: Celeste: 是某种……[p/]无畏者的雕像？

original: Tyrion: That's Ferdinand Dumont:[p/] a famous stunt performer and physicist.
translation: Tyrion: 这是 Ferdinand Dumont，[p/]知名的特技演员兼物理学家。

original: Tyrion: I heard he used to run shows here several decades ago.
translation: Tyrion: 听说他几十年前经常表演。

original: Tyrion: He'd always jump over large obstacles or crevices in some kind of wheeled vehicle.
translation: Tyrion: 他会乘着某种带轮载具跳跃大型障碍物或裂隙。

original: Tyrion: I heard he even tried creating flying machines near the end of his career.
translation: Tyrion: 我听说生涯末期，他还尝试过创造会飞的机械。

original: Celeste: Flying machines?!
translation: Celeste: 会飞的机械？！

original: Tyrion: Yeah.[p/] I heard he didn't even use magic to make them fly.
translation: Tyrion: 是的。[p/]甚至都没用到魔法。

original: Tyrion: It's a shame the kingdom hasn't tried to develop his research further.
translation: Tyrion: 很遗憾王国没有继续发展他的研究。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: She's clearly not in the mood for conversation.
translation: 她明显没有对话的兴致。

original: Tyrion: Several businesses have opened up since the last time I came here.
translation: Tyrion: 和我上次来相比，多了几家新店。

original: Tyrion: And they all seem to be pretty busy.
translation: Tyrion: 看起来都十分繁忙。

original: Celeste: The blockade is preventing people from leaving the city.
translation: Celeste: 封锁让人们无法离开城市。

original: Celeste: The local shops will probably be getting a lot more business until the Kingsguard lets us out.
